T09D4152:1b-1: ha ri bh'a n'a ma dz'a ta ka m'a la /
T09D4152:1b-3: seng ge zhabs 'bring pa'i skyes pa rabs kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba /
T09D4152:1b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag [dd] 'tshal lo //
T09D4152:1b-5: gang zhig ma lus pha rol phyin pa'i stobs kyis thong gyur pa'i //
T09D4152:1b-6: zhi ba'i go 'phang gis ni me tog tog can sdug bsngal mdzad //
T09D4152:1b-7: rnam par dag pa'i yon tan 'od zer dkyil 'khor can rmongs la //
T09D4152:1b-8: mun pa sel bar mdzad pa'i thub pa de la
T09D4152:1b-9: phyag 'tshal shog / slob dpon dpa' bos mdzad pa'i
T09D4152:1b-10: skyes pa'i rabs kyi rgyud rnams dang //
T09D4152:1b-11: gzhan dag mnyam pa nyid du rjes su 'gro phyir byed nus min //
T09D4152:1b-12: bsil ba'i 'od kyis ku mu da ni so sor byed nus kyi //
T09D4152:1b-13: skar ma'i tshogs gzhan gcig tu bsdus kyang mi nus pa nyid do //
T09D4152:1b-14: snyan dang gas mkhas chen rnams kyi snyan dngags nyid ni 'di shes pas //
T09D4152:1b-15: shin tu lung la mkhas par grags pa nyid du ngag 'gro sde //
T09D4152:1b-16: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod par grags pa la ni de ltar yang //
T09D4152:2a-0: rang don 'dod la mkhas pa bdag gis 'di dag nges @2a * //
T09D4152:2a-2: gal te 'jig rten bya ba la rgod bdag la 'dir skyon gang //
T09D4152:2a-3: 'on kyang ngo tsha med pas smra na bden par brjod med kyi //
T09D4152:2a-4: rang don bsgrub par 'dod pa yon tan dag la srid pa gang //
T09D4152:2a-5: thams cad bzod pa'i skyes bus 'byung ba'i phyir ni rig pa ste //
T09D4152:2a-6: zas gtsang sras kyi rig pa dang po bdag ni smra ba na //
T09D4152:2a-7: nges par yon tan grags pa la mkhas bdag gyur
T09D4152:2a-8: cig / goms pa bsags pa'i mkhas pa nyid kyis
T09D4152:2a-10: / ri mo mkhan gyi gzugs ltar 'jam po ci zhig mi 'dri 'am //
T09D4152:2a-11: lus dang ngag dang yid dag gis kyang dge ba yi ni las //
T09D4152:2a-12: skyes bu le lo can gyi yid kyis thob par nus ma yin //
T09D4152:2a-13: me tog du ma don gnyer 'bad med gal te 'gyur ba na //
T09D4152:2a-14: me tog las byung sbrang rtsi bung bas 'thung bar mi 'gyur ram //
T09D4152:2a-15: kye ma rgyal ba'i yon tan brjod pa chung yang dge ba'i phyir mi nus //
T09D4152:2a-16: de slad snyan dngags mkhan ni su zhig gus pa lhod par byed //
T09D4152:2a-17: rnyed pa chen po rnam par mthong na gtong ba chung ba ni //
T09D4152:2a-18: blo ni rgyu chen ldan pas tshong phyir thogs par mi rigs so //
T09D4152:2a-19: de phyir rnam pa gang gis mi lus thob pa rtogs byas nas //
T09D4152:2a-20: bstan pa 'di yang drang srong gi ni rab rib bsal mdzad de //
T09D4152:2b-0: yun @2b ring bos kyang mi 'dra'i bstod pa rdul gyis khyab pa yi //
T09D4152:2b-1: tshig ni sangs rgyas rtogs pa brjod pa'i chu rnams kyis ni bkru bar bya //
T09D4152:2b-2: gang gi phyir chos kyi gtam la mkhas pa 'di
T09D4152:2b-3: ni mdo sde'i rjes su brjod pas phyis byang chub
T09D4152:2b-4: sems dpa'i skyes rabs rjes su brjod de ri mo
T09D4152:2b-5: bris pa'i khang pa la mar me'i 'od dang 'dra
T09D4152:2b-6: bas bde blag tu gsal bar nyan pa po'i skye
T09D4152:2b-7: bo'i yid la dga' ba lhag par skyed par byed
T09D4152:2b-8: pa / khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams
T09D4152:2b-9: kyi sdug bsngal gyi rgud pa bsal bar bya ba'i
T09D4152:2b-10: phyir smon lam chen po yang dag par bskyed pa'i
T09D4152:2b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyod [*spyod?] pa rjes su brjod
T09D4152:2b-12: par 'gyur ba'i gnyid rmugs pa'i skyon bsal nas yid
T09D4152:2b-13: mnyam par gzhag pa'i nyan pa po rnams kyis bdud
T09D4152:2b-14: rtsi bzhin du 'thung bar 'dod pa rnams kyis 'khor
T09D4152:2b-15: ba'i sdug bsngal du ma 'dzad pa'i phyir du yang
T09D4152:2b-17: rnam pa sna tshogs nyon mongs sbrul lta bu'i //
T09D4152:2b-18: srid tshogs sa 'og nas ni 'gro don phyir //
T09D4152:2b-19: sangs rgyas nyid phyir smon lam rgya chen po //
T09D4152:2b-20: bdag nyid che min rnams la 'byung ba min //
T09D4152:2b-22: sngon 'das pa'i dus na rtag tu me tog 'byung
T09D4152:2b-23: ba'i skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba mtha' dang ldan
T09D4152:2b-24: pa skye bo'i tshogs mtha' med pa la kun nas
T09D4152:2b-25: mi gnod pa'i rtsig pa'i ngos bzhi dang tshong dus
T09D4152:2b-27: gser gyi ka ba'i phreng bas yid 'phrog par byed pa'i khang pa rnams kyis bar du chod pa /
T09D4152:2b-28: ston ka'i dus pas lhag pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i skar ma'i bdag po dang /
T09D4152:2b-29: skar ma'i tshogs kyis mngon par brgyan pa mtho ris
T09D4152:2b-30: dang 'dra ba'i 'od dang ldan pa 'od ldan zhes
T09D4152:2b-31: bya ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang byung bar gyur to
T09D4152:2b-32: // de la yang mtha' dag gis sa'i bud med
T09D4152:2b-33: la mu tig gi chun po'i srog shing du gyur
T09D4152:2b-34: pa'i nor bu dang 'dra bar dri ma med pa'i
T09D4152:2b-35: rab tu snang bas rab snang zhes bya ba'i rgyal
T09D4152:2b-37: gang gi khang pa'i nang du dri med shel gyi rtsig ngos la //
T09D4152:2b-38: rna bar me tog phreng dang thig le rab tu snang ba yi //
T09D4152:2b-39: bud med rnams kyi lag pa 'jam po rgyan gyi cho ga ltar //
T09D4152:2b-40: me tog 'dzin pas yongs su ngal ba'i sdug bsngal 'dzin mi 'gyur //
T09D4152:3a-0: gang zhig nye ba rnams ni chu 'dzin dang 'dra @3a * //
T09D4152:3a-2: sbyin pa'i chu yis yongs su 'phel ba'i sa bon ni //
T09D4152:3a-3: gang gi khro ba yis ni stobs dang ldan pa'i dgra rnams kyang //
T09D4152:3a-4: nyin mo glog gis byung ba'i me ltar bzod par mi 'gyur ro //
T09D4152:3a-5: dus gcig na de lta bu'i 'byor ba dang stobs
T09D4152:3a-6: 'byung ba nyi ma shar ba'i ri'i rtse mo dang
T09D4152:3a-7: 'dra ba'i dri ma med pa'i nor bu stong phrag
T09D4152:3a-8: gis rnam par shar ba'i logs gnyis su seng ge'i
T09D4152:3a-9: khri lhag par gnas pa'i sa'i bdag po de'i gnas
T09D4152:3a-10: ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs pa'i bram ze dang
T09D4152:3a-11: rgyal po dang blon po chen po dang //
T09D4152:3a-12: blon po dang pho nya'i tshogs dang ldan pa /
T09D4152:3a-13: tha mal pa'i skye bo yongs su dogs pa dang ldan pa sgo ba rnams kyis bkag bzhin pa /
T09D4152:3a-14: phyi rol du nges par bcings pa'i glang po che
T09D4152:3a-15: dang rta dang shing rta'i mchog gi 'dug sa la
T09D4152:3a-16: kun nas gzigs shing kun nas 'ongs te /
T09D4152:3a-17: zhugs pa rjes su gnang ba'i nags na rgyu ba
T09D4152:3a-18: rnams kyis sa'i steng du rnam par gzhag pa'i bus
T09D4152:3a-19: mo dang rang bzhin du yang ba'i yid dang ldan
T09D4152:3a-20: pa'i phyir brtabs pa dang tshig mi gsal ba dang
T09D4152:3a-21: dor ba'i tshig rnams kyis nges par zhus so //
T09D4152:3a-22: bdag cag gis ni nags mthug pa la glang po che yi tshogs nang na //
T09D4152:3a-23: glang po mthong ste ku mu ta yi tshogs ltar dkar ba yi ni gzugs //
T09D4152:3a-24: sar pa'i chu 'dzin tshogs kyis 'dor bar byas pa'i rtsa ba la //
T09D4152:3a-25: kha ba can gyi ri yi rtse mo dang mtshungs gzugs kyi bzhin dang ldan //
T09D4152:3a-26: de ni de 'dzin pa la lha tshad ma yin zhes bya'o //
T09D4152:3a-27: de nas gshol gyi rtse mos rmo bzhin pa'i mo
T09D4152:3a-28: sta'i 'bras bu dang ku sha'i rtsa yang yang dag
T09D4152:3a-29: par byung ba'i tsag tsag zhes bya ba'i sgra dang
T09D4152:3a-30: ldan pa 'ga' zhig tu zhing srung ma'i lag pa'i
T09D4152:3a-31: thal mo'i sgras rnam par bsres pa'i teb teb kyi
T09D4152:3a-32: sgras kun nas skrag pa'i yang dag par blangs pa'i
T09D4152:3a-33: ne tso'i gshog pas 'phangs pas rnam par bskyod pa'i
T09D4152:3a-34: yongs su gyur pa'i spre'u'i dum bu'i gos kyi dra
T09D4152:3a-35: ba can dang / 'bras khur ba'i yongs su tshol bar gyur ba'i zhing pa rnams dang /
T09D4152:3a-36: nye bar nges par 'brel ba'i skrag pa'i bya rgod can dang /
T09D4152:3a-37: rdzing gi chu rnyog pa can la gnas pa'i skyug
T09D4152:3a-38: ldad du gyur pa'i ma he mo'i rigs mthun pa'i
T09D4152:3a-39: phyogs kyi gdong gis bsgul bas bzlog par byas pa'i
T09D4152:3b-0: de'i yan lag @3b dang ldan pa dang /
T09D4152:3b-1: thos bzhin pa'i rab tu bskyod pa'i ba glang gi
T09D4152:3b-2: tshogs bskyod pa'i sil sil gyi sgra dang ldan pa
T09D4152:3b-3: dang / zhing gi padma rnams kyi sdong bu lhung bas dang skya dang /
T09D4152:3b-4: dur pa dang khrung khrung bza' gnyis dang ldan pa dang /
T09D4152:3b-6: grong khyer dang yang dag par 'brel ba'i zhing gis
T09D4152:3b-7: las shin tu 'das nas dmag gi tshogs kyis kun
T09D4152:3b-8: tu skrag pas rnam par byed bar gyur pa'i ri
T09D4152:3b-9: dags kyi tshogs kyis khyab pa dang /
T09D4152:3b-10: rta rnams kyi rmig pas gcod par gyur pa'i rtsva
T09D4152:3b-11: sar pa'i myu gu can de'i ri'i nags can de'i
T09D4152:3b-12: ston ka'i dus yang dag par byung ba na /
T09D4152:3b-13: glang po che 'dzin pas mngon par 'phel ba'i ltad
T09D4152:3b-14: mo dang ldan pa'i shing rta mchog la zhon pa
T09D4152:3b-15: gdugs dkar pos nyin mor byed pa'i 'od zer gyis
T09D4152:3b-16: yang dag par bzlog par byas pa'i rgyal po de
T09D4152:3b-17: nags gzhan du rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
T09D4152:3b-18: de nas glang po'i bdag po ring nas tshogs kyi dbus su der gnas pa /
T09D4152:3b-19: dri zhim bsil ba'i dri ldan me tog shing dag dum bu byed bzhin pa //
T09D4152:3b-20: sa yi bdag pos mthong bar gyur pa smyon chu'i ri mo nye bar gnas pa la //
T09D4152:3b-21: bung ba'i tshogs kyis bskor zhing rna ba cung zad bskyod pas sdebs par byed //
T09D4152:3b-22: de nas re zhig glang po'i bdag po 'di dang
T09D4152:3b-23: bdag cag gis glang po che smyon pa 'di 'thab
T09D4152:3b-24: pa blta bar bya'o zhes rnam par bsams nas rgyal
T09D4152:3b-25: po rab snang gis kun nas bsdams pa zhes bya
T09D4152:3b-26: ba'i glang po che 'dul ba la glang po'i mchog
T09D4152:3b-27: 'di ni gdong g-yogs rab tu bsal bar byas nas
T09D4152:3b-28: nags kyi glang po che dang lhan cig 'thab pa'i
T09D4152:3b-29: phyir yang dag par bskul bar gyis shig ces bsgo'o
T09D4152:3b-30: // ji ltar lhas bka' stsal pa bzhin du bya'o
T09D4152:3b-31: zhes sna brkyang bas 'thab pa la spro ba skyes
T09D4152:3b-32: pa'i glang po che gzhan gyi dmag tshogs ldog par
T09D4152:3b-33: byed pa de la mngon du phyogs pa glang po
T09D4152:3b-34: che 'dul bar byed pas byed par 'gyur ro //
T09D4152:3b-35: de nas phan tshun mthong ba'i khros pas shin tu
T09D4152:3b-36: lhag pa'i mngon par 'phel ba smyon chu'i thigs pa'i
T09D4152:3b-37: phreng bas kun nas brlan pa dang /
T09D4152:3b-38: dri zhim par byas pa'i sa'i rdul dang ldan pa
T09D4152:3b-39: kun nas lci ba'i mche bas yang dag par phrad
T09D4152:4a-0: 'di ni bros so bros so zhes dmag mi'i skye bos lta bar gyur pa @4a * //
T09D4152:4a-1: dag la yun ring por 'thab mo byung bar gyur to //
T09D4152:4a-2: phan tshun so sor 'thab pas tha dad gdong can kun nas zlum pa ser skya'i mig ldan pa //
T09D4152:4a-3: kun nas 'phangs pas rnam par brtags pa'i sna ldan dkar dang dkar min sprin gyi 'od ldan pa //
T09D4152:4a-4: khros pas sna ni gyen du bslang ba'i glang po dag la sbom pa'i bskyod pa'i chu ldan pa //
T09D4152:4a-5: cung zad 'dab ma dkar dang dmar ba'i gsal bar
T09D4152:4a-6: 'gro 'gyur de dag gi ni dkan gnyis dag /
T09D4152:4a-7: dkar ba'i gnyis 'thung ba dag po mche ba rnam
T09D4152:4a-9: yang dag 'byung ba'i me stag gis ni khyab par byas pa dang //
T09D4152:4a-10: de nas rgyal po'i glang po che de'i mche ba la brten pa'i //
T09D4152:4a-11: lcags kyis dkris pa yongs su glod pa 'byung bar gyur pa ste //
T09D4152:4a-12: glang po chen des ni sa yi bdag po'i glang po che ni bcom //
T09D4152:4a-13: 'dul byed de ni ngo tsha dang ldan thur du blta bar gyur //
T09D4152:4a-14: de yi tshogs la glang po'i dbang po de ni slar yang zhugs //
T09D4152:4a-15: zab mo sa yi bdag po yang ni ngo mtshar dang bcas gyur //
T09D4152:4a-16: des na rgyal po rab snang la blon po chen po rnams yang 'dus nas /
T09D4152:4a-17: lha glang po che rnams thams cad kyis kyang 'di ni bsgrub par dka' ba ste /
T09D4152:4a-18: sngags kyi bzlas pa dang sman gyi stobs rnams kyis
T09D4152:4a-19: du mas 'thung ba 'di dbang du bya'o zhes zhus
T09D4152:4a-20: so de bzhin du bya'o zhes rgyal po des brjod
T09D4152:4a-21: nas slar rgyal po'i pho brang du gshegs par gyur
T09D4152:4a-22: to // de rnams kyang thabs des spos kyi glang
T09D4152:4a-23: po de la glang mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor
T09D4152:4a-24: ba 'ongs nas glang po che'i ra bar zhugs par
T09D4152:4a-25: to // byas te / ka ba la bcings nas
T09D4152:4a-26: glang po che de 'ongs so zhes rgyal po la
T09D4152:4a-27: zhu ba byas par gyur to //
T09D4152:4a-28: de nas rgyal pos kun nas song ba zhes bya
T09D4152:4a-29: ba glang po che 'dul byed la bzang po de
T09D4152:4a-30: ltar 'di glang po che'i rgyal po dul bar bya
T09D4152:4a-31: ba ji ltar bdag la bzhon par rung bar 'gyur
T09D4152:4a-32: ba zhig ces bka' stsal to //
T09D4152:4a-33: des kyang mgos phyag 'tshal ba dang bcas pas rgyal
T09D4152:4a-34: po'i ngag gzung nas glang po che de 'dul ba
T09D4152:4a-35: la zhugs so // gang gang glang po 'dul ba des //
T09D4152:4a-36: bslab pa yang dag brtan gyur pa //
T09D4152:4a-37: blo ldan slob ma bzang po lngar //
T09D4152:4a-38: glang po de dang de ni gzung //
T09D4152:4b-0: de nas glang po chen po yang dag yongs @4b nas ni //
T09D4152:4b-1: glang chen rnams kyi nga rgyal rgyags pa phrog byed pa //
T09D4152:4b-2: rnam par 'dud pa'i spyi bo 'dul bas thal mor bcas //
T09D4152:4b-3: sa yi dbang phyug la ni glang po 'dul bar zhus pa'o //
T09D4152:4b-4: 'di ni dul bas skyong ba'i glang po che //
T09D4152:4b-5: shin tu sa skyong gzhan la zlog par byed pa de //
T09D4152:4b-6: glang po'i dbang po'i bslab pa thob nas de ltar ni //
T09D4152:4b-7: rgyags pa yang ni de ltar min na mgu mi byed //
T09D4152:4b-8: lcags kyu med pas kyang ni smyug ma med pas kyang //
T09D4152:4b-9: rnam par 'gyur ba 'gro min dus sogs med pas kyang //
T09D4152:4b-10: bdag gis longs shig ces bya slar ni bskul byas pa //
T09D4152:4b-11: glang po 'di ni 'bar ba'i lcags kyi ri lu za //
T09D4152:4b-12: de nas de'i steng du rgyal po zhon nas rtog
T09D4152:4b-13: / glang po'i dbang po 'di ni kha ba'i ri
T09D4152:4b-14: dang 'dra // 'on kyang rang nyid rin po che ni rtog la mkhas //
T09D4152:4b-15: ngo mtshar skyes pa nyid kyis 'di ni brtag par gyis //
T09D4152:4b-16: de nas rgyal po rab snang glang po che'i mchog
T09D4152:4b-17: de la zhon nas ston ka'i dus ltar dkar ba'i
T09D4152:4b-18: nyin mor byed pa sprin la zhon pa ltar btsun
T09D4152:4b-19: mo'i 'khor gyis bskor ba dang bcas pa bag med
T09D4152:4b-20: pas nags su rtse ba nyams su myong ba'i don
T09D4152:4b-22: de nas mtsho nang sgeg bcas chu ni yan lag la ni gtor byed pa //
T09D4152:4b-23: gsal ba 'dud pa bcag pa'i pad ma'i rtsa ba dum bur byed pa ni //
T09D4152:4b-24: glang mo mthong bas glang po'i rgyal po sgeg pas kyang ni 'gro 'gyur te //
T09D4152:4b-25: pad mas pad ma bcag par gyur pa mngon par bzod par byed pa yi //
T09D4152:4b-26: pad ma'i nags tshal gyi ni dbus su glang mo de ni des mthong nas //
T09D4152:4b-27: glang po'i bdag po chags pa'i gzugs dngos kyi ni sems la khyab //
T09D4152:4b-28: 'chal pa rtsub pa'i dag gis 'dul bar byed pas bzlog par gyur pa yang //
T09D4152:4b-29: shin tu mgyogs par rgyug pa de yang 'jigs pas rab tu 'gro bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:4b-30: glang po rjes su 'gro ba rab tu zhugs pa glang po de la ni //
T09D4152:4b-31: ri mo'i mdog ni dmar po lus kyis rnam par 'byed pa yang //
T09D4152:4b-32: mgyogs par rjes su song ba'i rta rnams kyis ni rlung gis 'chag pa ni //
T09D4152:4b-33: bzhon pa bzhin du 'gram la gnas pa'i bran gyis cung zad mthong bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:4b-34: khyod kyis bdag ni nam yang btang ba yin te //
T09D4152:4b-35: khyod kyis brtse ba med pa ci zhig 'di lta bu //
T09D4152:5a-1: rkang pa drug pa'i phrang ba yud tsam zhig /
T09D4152:5a-2: sgra 'byin de yi lam la rjes su 'gro bar
T09D4152:5a-3: 'gyur // glang po'i dpral ba'i dbyes la lcags kyus btab kyang de //
T09D4152:5a-4: 'dul bar byed pas de ni phyir ldog mi nus te //
T09D4152:5a-5: skyes pa yang ni 'dul bar bya ba nus ma yin //
T09D4152:5a-6: ci zhig dud 'gro 'dod pa'i don la dman pa'i blo //
T09D4152:5a-7: de na myur ba nyid du ma he'i ra dang
T09D4152:5a-8: dri ma dang bcas pa'i nags kyi me'i du bas
T09D4152:5a-9: mi gsal ba'i ri'i tshang tshing gi nang shin tu
T09D4152:5a-10: mi mnyam pa'i sa'i cha dang ldan pa'i phyogs gcig
T09D4152:5a-11: na glang po che tshogs kyis shing rtsa ba nas
T09D4152:5a-12: bton pa'i rtse mo nas 'phur ba'i 'dab chags rnams
T09D4152:5a-13: kyi tshang nas sgong nga lhung ste chag pa'i dum
T09D4152:5a-14: bu rnams kyi bsres pa dang ldan pa /
T09D4152:5a-15: stag rnams kyis nye bar longs spyod cing zos pa'i
T09D4152:5a-16: rlan gyis shin tu gos pa la bya rgod dang
T09D4152:5a-18: ce sbyang rnams za ba dang ldan pa /
T09D4152:5a-19: shing bya'i sgra shin tu rtsub pas 'jigs par byed pa /

T09D4152:8a-27: gtong ba dang khrel yod pa dang bzod pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams lhag par gnas pa /

T09D4152:8a-29: du gyur pa'i skye bo rnams kyi yid du 'ong
T09D4152:8a-30: ba'i di de dpon shin tu dga' ba zhes bya
T09D4152:8a-31: ba'i byang chub sems dpa' byung bar gyur to //
T09D4152:8a-32: dus kun du ni thams cad nyid //
T09D4152:8a-33: kun gyi phyir ni sbyin bya zhes //
T09D4152:8a-34: sems can kun la brtse ba yi //
T09D4152:8a-35: de yi dam bca' byung bar gyur //
T09D4152:8a-36: 'jig rten sdug bsngal bcad pa'i phyir //
T09D4152:8a-37: shin tu byas pa'i sems rnams kyi //
T09D4152:8a-38: sems can la che dam bca' ni //
T09D4152:8a-39: chen po nyid rnams la ni skye //
T09D4152:8a-40: gtong bas skye bo rab dga' byed //
T09D4152:8a-41: des na sems dpa' dag par 'gyur //
T09D4152:8a-42: ston ka'i dus na zla ba bzhin //
T09D4152:8a-43: chen po shar bas mun pa sel //
T09D4152:8b-1: longs spyod bsod nams stobs kyis rnyed //
T09D4152:8b-2: don du gnyer rnams rdzas rnams la //
T09D4152:8b-3: de yi bdag 'dzin de ltar dmigs //
T09D4152:8b-4: nges par legs pa'i blo glos 'di yi smon lam sa bon ni //
T09D4152:8b-5: yid kyis 'di la ni rgyal ba nyid kyi 'bras bu'i phyir //
T09D4152:8b-6: sngon ni sbyin ba'i pha rol phyin pas bsod nams kyi ni las //
T09D4152:8b-7: de ni phrad pas dga' ba bzhin du myur du sprad nas 'khyud //
T09D4152:8b-8: de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bsags pas sbyin pa chen po la zhugs pa /
T09D4152:8b-9: sems can gyi don gyi phyir snying rje'i lcag gis
T09D4152:8b-10: yid kyi rta yang dag par bskul par byas pa
T09D4152:8b-11: / nges pa'i shing rta la lhag par zhon pa'i byang chub sems dpas /
T09D4152:8b-13: sbyin ba'i pha rol phyin pa zhes //
T09D4152:8b-14: lhag ma pha rol phyin rnams de'i //
T09D4152:8b-15: phrad 'dod lta bur gnas par gyur //
T09D4152:8b-16: de nas bdag nyid chen po de so ga'i dus
T09D4152:8b-17: kyi nyin mor byed pa'i 'od zer ltar chu'i snod
T09D4152:8b-18: kyis chu kun nas 'thung bar gyur pa nyid dam
T09D4152:8b-19: re rer don du gnyer ba rnams kyis lhag ma
T09D4152:8b-20: cung zad tsam mdzod kyi snying po mthong nas /
T09D4152:8b-21: slong mo pa'i skye bo'i re ba 'bras bu med
T09D4152:8b-22: par byed pa mi nus pas rin po che'i gling
T09D4152:8b-24: sna tshogs pa'i zong gis yongs su gang ba /
T09D4152:8b-25: mthon po'i rlung ras la 'jam pa'i rlung lhung ba dang /
T09D4152:8b-26: shin tu mkhas pa'i skya chen 'dzin pa rnams kyis skya ba 'dzin pa rnams dang /
T09D4152:8b-27: yid ches pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo rnams kyis lhag par gnas pa'i gzings su zhugs nas /
T09D4152:8b-28: tshong pa'i skye bo du mas yongs su bskor ba /
T09D4152:8b-29: aa ta sa yi me tog kha bye bkram pa ngang 'dra ba'i //
T09D4152:8b-30: nam mkha'i chu nyid du ni kun nas 'ongs pa 'dra ba ste //
T09D4152:8b-31: 'od ldan lto 'phye'i nor bu mar me stong gi nang nas ni //
T09D4152:8b-32: zab cing bgrod par dka' ba'i chu ldan rgya mtsho 'khrug par byas //
T09D4152:8b-33: gzings 'gro ba'i dbang gis chu mtho ba'i 'gram gyi
T09D4152:8b-34: shing rnams bum pa ltar skad cig nyid du ni
T09D4152:8b-35: yang dag par mthong nas rlung gi stobs kyis 'byung
T09D4152:8b-36: bar gyur pa'i rlabs chen po rnams kyis mi mnyam
T09D4152:8b-37: pa mdun du rgyug pa dang 'dra bar rim gyis
T09D4152:8b-38: rgya mtsho chen bo la brgal nas rin po che'i
T09D4152:8b-40: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che rnams blangs
T09D4152:8b-41: nas tshong pa de rnams dang lhan cig tu gegs
T09D4152:9a-0: @9a * // med par shin tu dga' bas slar
T09D4152:9a-1: log ste 'gron po thang gi lam nas khrid pa
T09D4152:9a-3: 'di la brten nas don gnyer tshogs ni rgyab phyogs ma song ste //
T09D4152:9a-4: 'di yi sems ni dgra dang bu la'ang mnyam par 'jug pa zhes //
T09D4152:9a-5: de ltar yon tan rnams ni brjod cing yon tan 'dod pa yis //
T09D4152:9a-6: de yi 'gron po rkun mo'i tshogs kyis kyang ni choms mi 'gyur //
T09D4152:9a-7: tshul khrims gtsang mas brgyan pa'i skye bo la //
T09D4152:9a-8: 'gro ba'i don du so sor 'brel ba'i sems //
T09D4152:9a-9: 'on kyang chos la rgyab phyogs skye bo ni //
T09D4152:9a-10: bshes pa bzhin du bzang ba nyid du 'gro //
T09D4152:9a-11: de nas bdag nyid chen po de b'a r'a na
T09D4152:9a-12: s'ir nye bar 'ongs nas dga' ba'i yid can gnyen
T09D4152:9a-13: 'dun rnams kyis mthong bar gyur te rang gi khyim
T09D4152:9a-14: du rjes su zhugs nas rin po che'i gling nas
T09D4152:9a-15: rnyed pa la rang dbang du spyod pa nges don
T09D4152:9a-16: du gnyer ba'i skye bo rnams la yang nyin re
T09D4152:9a-17: bzhin du 'gyed par byas par gyur to //
T09D4152:9a-18: bdag nyid chen po des ni gzhan don phun sum tshogs //
T09D4152:9a-19: rgya che'i sems dang ldan pas sbyin pa rab sbyin cing //
T09D4152:9a-20: 'bras bu dang bcas don gnyer mang po 'ongs pa yi //
T09D4152:9a-21: don gnyer rnams kyis khyim gyi sgo ni stongs ma gyur //
T09D4152:9a-22: de nas bdag nyid chen po de dus gcig gi
T09D4152:9a-23: tshe mal cha mchog la gnas shing nub mo 'di
T09D4152:9a-25: nor 'di yang skye bo don du gnyer ba la
T09D4152:9a-26: so sor mchod pa'i phyir nus pa nyid ma yin
T09D4152:9a-27: snyam mo // slar ni sbyin pa'i 'bras bu ji lta bu bsgrub par bya /
T09D4152:9a-28: gang gis bdag la rtag tu sbyin pa rgyun ma
T09D4152:9a-29: chad pas yid tshim pa don du gnyer ba rnams
T09D4152:9a-31: gzhan yang mtshan mo 'di myur du 'da' ba ni
T09D4152:9a-32: gang gi phyir bdag gis don du gnyer ba'i tshogs
T09D4152:9a-33: rnams la ji ltar dgye bar bya zhes bsams so
T09D4152:9a-34: // skye bo thams cad na ba'i dus su gnyid 'dod de //
T09D4152:9a-35: sems ni bde ba'i phyir ni ngal bas gdungs pa'am //
T09D4152:9a-36: 'di ni sbyin ba'i bdag po ster ba'i gegs byed ces //
T09D4152:9a-37: dam pa de ni gnyid log pas ni sdug bsngal gyur //
T09D4152:9a-38: de nas sems dpa' chen po de gnyid kyi dbang
T09D4152:9a-39: du nye bar song ba na rmi lam du 'od
T09D4152:9a-40: zer dri ma med pa 'khor yug la mngon par
T09D4152:9a-41: 'byung ba'i 'obs lam na lus nus pa bung ba'i
T09D4152:9a-42: tshogs kyis shin tu nag pa lhod pa'i skra'i tshogs
T09D4152:9b-0: kyis @9b dpung pa phyogs gcig bkab par byas te
T09D4152:9b-1: / pad ma'i 'dab ma ltar shin tu dmar zhing yangs pa'i mig dang ldan pa /
T09D4152:9b-2: gser gyi bum pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i nu
T09D4152:9b-3: ma'i steng du khyab pa'i mu tig gi chun po
T09D4152:9b-4: dang nor bu'i 'od kyis kun nas gsal bar byas
T09D4152:9b-6: me tog ban du dzi ba sar pa ltar shin tu dmar ba'i mchu dang ldan pa /
T09D4152:9b-7: gsus gnyer gsum ni skas kyi gdang bu la 'dzegs
T09D4152:9b-8: pas rab tu srab pa'i spu'i phreng ba 'khyog zer
T09D4152:9b-9: bar byas pa / zla ba'i mdzes pa gzugs dang
T09D4152:9b-10: ldan pa ltar rna ba'i rgyan gyi nor bu'i 'od
T09D4152:9b-11: kyis mkhur tshos kyi smug rtsi 'dor ba /
T09D4152:9b-12: srab pa dang dkar ba'i stod g-yogs kyis yan lag sbas pa /
T09D4152:9b-13: ston ka zla ba tshes pa'i 'od kyis kun nas
T09D4152:9b-14: khyab pa'i gser gyi sku gzugs ltar rjes su mthun
T09D4152:9b-16: des kyang mngon bar gsal bar gyur pa'i so dang nor bu'i 'od kyis bzhin snang bar byas te /
T09D4152:9b-17: gsal ba dang 'jam pa'i tshig gis 'di skad ces gsungs so //
T09D4152:9b-18: sbyin la shin tu chags pas mdzod kyi phun tshogs ni //
T09D4152:9b-19: khyod kyis 'di ni rim gyis srab pa nyid du 'gyur //
T09D4152:9b-20: mtshan mo mdzes bas zla ba'i mdzes pa zad pa ste //
T09D4152:9b-21: rgya mtsho'i rlabs ni nges par bzlog par 'gyur ba ltar //
T09D4152:9b-22: de nas khyod la shar ba song ba 'gro 'gyur te //
T09D4152:9b-23: lta ba bzlog cing don du gnyer la rgyab phyogs pa //
T09D4152:9b-24: skad dang bral ba yid 'ong dngos ni lhung ba yi //
T09D4152:9b-25: ston ka'i dus ni sprin la yun rings rma bya bzhin //
T09D4152:9b-26: de ltar 'dzad par 'gyur ba'i mdzod kyi phun tshogs la //
T09D4152:9b-27: khyod ni don gnyer rnyed nas mya ngan 'gro 'gyur te //
T09D4152:9b-28: khyod kyi sbyin 'dod 'di ni shin tu grags pa ni //
T09D4152:9b-29: nam zhig kyang ni rnam par 'gyur bar 'gro mi 'gyur //
T09D4152:9b-30: shing ni zad pa'i song bar g-yo ba'i 'od zer gyis //
T09D4152:9b-31: me ni 'bar ba zad par yang ni rab 'gro ste //
T09D4152:9b-32: phal cher goms pas rnam par 'phel ba'i skye bo ni //
T09D4152:9b-33: chen po rnams kyi sbyin 'dod rgud kyang de lta min //
T09D4152:9b-34: 'di ni nor rnams yongs su zad kyang don gnyer rnams //
T09D4152:9b-35: slong la brten pa'i 'jigs pa 'jigs par mi byed de //
T09D4152:9b-36: de ltar gsal bar byas pa'i nges pa skyed rnams kyis //
T09D4152:9b-37: skye ba dka' ba la yang rgya chen nyid mi spong //
T09D4152:10a-2: srid pa rnam par gcod pa'i go 'phang tshul byed pa //
T09D4152:10a-3: bya ba nyung ba nyid ni myur du bcings nas su //
T09D4152:10a-4: 'jig rten rnams la 'byor phyir rgya shug gling du gshegs //
T09D4152:10a-5: bdag gis nye bar bstan pa de nyon cig /'gro
T09D4152:10a-6: ba sa 'dzin klu dang gnod sbyin gyis 'jigs pa
T09D4152:10a-7: // rgya mtsho mang ba rnams kyis kyang ni 'gag 'gyur ba //
T09D4152:10a-8: de ni shin tu sgrub pa'i don du khyod nyid nus //
T09D4152:10a-9: ri bo ma la ya la 'dzeg byed bdud rtsi zhes //
T09D4152:10a-10: brtson pa btang na gtsang ba'i dri ldan sman yod de //
T09D4152:10a-11: dgang blugs yongs su smin nas de zo shig /
T09D4152:10a-12: ngal dang skom pa sel dang bkres pa sel ba'i
T09D4152:10a-13: phyir // gling rnams brgya phrag lnga dang 'jigs pa'i
T09D4152:10a-14: chu ldan chu bo de dang de rnams 'das nas
T09D4152:10a-15: phyir // ni // chu gter rnams la bsod nams
T09D4152:10a-16: dang ni brtson 'grus kyis ni gzings rnams dbus nas
T09D4152:10a-17: phyir // ni // rgal nas kyang / sa 'dzin
T09D4152:10a-18: mthon po'i steng na chen mo ming gi tshogs ni
T09D4152:10a-19: chen po zhes bya sman yod de //
T09D4152:10a-20: de ni blangs nas lto 'phye chen po'i dug ni
T09D4152:10a-21: chad par bya phyir der ni khyod song cig /
T09D4152:10a-22: lcang ngar gyis phug par byas pa'i spa'i nags rgal
T09D4152:10a-23: bar byas nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram dus 'dzin gyi phug
T09D4152:10a-24: gi nang na gnas pa skar ma'i mig ces bya
T09D4152:10a-25: ba srin po khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur te /
T09D4152:10a-26: gnyid log pa las sad pa bzhin du 'bar ba'i mes 'bar ba //
T09D4152:10a-27: gang gis mig dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i 'bras bu can //
T09D4152:10a-28: kun nas ser ba'i rdzi mas yongs bskor lam gyi pri ka can //
T09D4152:10a-29: gnyid sangs pa la bskum pa dang 'dra bar ni 'dzums med pa //
T09D4152:10a-30: de ni gnyid log pa na mthug pa'i dbugs kyi rlung gis ni //
T09D4152:10a-31: shing rnams kyi ni me tog dkar po rab tu rnyings par 'gyur //
T09D4152:10a-32: 'di yi lce ni g-yo ba rnam par 'gyur te kha yi sbyor ba las //
T09D4152:10a-33: 'jigs pa'i sgra yi chu 'dzin pa las glog 'gyu'i rgyun bzhin no //
T09D4152:10a-34: de nas gnod sbyin dang lto 'phye rnams zhi ba'i
T09D4152:10a-35: don du 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa'i
T09D4152:10a-36: mdo'i tshig rnams 'don cing khyod kyis 'gro bar byas
T09D4152:10a-37: te song nas kyang shin tu ring ba ma yin
T09D4152:10a-38: pa ni skyed mos tshal rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
T09D4152:10a-39: me tog rnams kyis dri zhim pa'i rlung dang ldan
T09D4152:10a-40: pa rin po che du mas rab tu snang bar
T09D4152:10b-0: byas pa'i @10b rgya mtsho'i 'gram na sa 'dzin rnams
T09D4152:10b-1: kyis rab tu byas pa du ma tha dad pa'i
T09D4152:10b-2: skye bo rnams kyis yang dag par gnon pa'i skyes
T09D4152:10b-3: bu'i lam shi ba med pa'i grong dang 'dra ba'i
T09D4152:10b-4: ro hi ta zhes bya ba'i grong khyod kyis mthong
T09D4152:10b-5: bar 'gyur ro // der yang zla ba nya ba
T09D4152:10b-6: ltar yid du 'ong ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
T09D4152:10b-7: yon tan gyi tshogs dang ldan pa ded dpon ma
T09D4152:10b-8: gha zhes bya ba yod de //
T09D4152:10b-9: de ni rgya shug gi gling gi lam khyod la nye bar ston par 'gyur ro //
T09D4152:10b-10: ded dpon chen po de yang nad shin tu drag
T09D4152:10b-11: po nyid kyis seng ge dang stag gis 'jigs su
T09D4152:10b-12: rung ba'i ri bo dang nags kyis khyab pa'i dpag
T09D4152:10b-13: tshad mang por song ste dus dus kyi lam gyis
T09D4152:10b-15: khyed kyang der sdug bsngal mi bya'o //
T09D4152:10b-16: snying rjes rab tu bskul ba ni //
T09D4152:10b-17: sems can phan phyir bstan pa rnams //
T09D4152:10b-18: spro ba dang 'brel rang bzhin chos //
T09D4152:10b-19: 'dod pa yang dag sgrub pa yin //
T09D4152:10b-20: phyi nas lha'i mthu dang bsod nams kyi mthus ring por 'da' bar bya ste ;
T09D4152:10b-21: kha ba can gyi ri'i rtse mor rjes su byed
T09D4152:10b-22: pa'i ra bas yongs su bskor zhing dngul gyi grong
T09D4152:10b-23: khyer sga bcad pa khyod kyis mthong ber 'gyur zhes
T09D4152:10b-24: bya ba'o // der yang khyod kyis mdo'i tshig de rnams nyid gdon par bya'o //
T09D4152:10b-25: de nas sgo glegs de rang nyid kyis phye ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T09D4152:10b-26: de yi rjes su mi 'am ci mo bzhi ni nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te lci ba yi //
T09D4152:10b-27: nu ma'i bum pa'i khur gyis shin tu ngal zhing dgod pa'i dbang gis so yi 'od ni gsal //
T09D4152:10b-28: smin ma'i ri mo che bar ldan zhing autpal 'dab ltar sngo ba'i mig ldan pa //
T09D4152:10b-29: srab cing dkar ba'i lha las 'byung ba'i gos kyi na bza' 'dzin par byed pa mo //
T09D4152:10b-30: 'jam pa'i rgod pas zur mig gis lta ba dang
T09D4152:10b-31: smin mtshams sgeg pas 'dod pa'i lha gsal bar byas
T09D4152:10b-32: pa de rnams la yang khyod kyis sring mo'i 'du
T09D4152:10b-34: de rnams kyang khyod la rgya shug gi gling gi lam ston par byed par 'gyur ro //
T09D4152:10b-35: de nas rgya shug gi gling gi bdag po mi
T09D4152:10b-36: 'am ci'i rgyal po rnams kyis rab tu spro ba
T09D4152:10b-37: skyed de khyod la yid bzhin nor bu sbyin par
T09D4152:10b-38: 'gyur ro // der yang bee d'urya'i rang bzhin gyi
T09D4152:10b-39: grong khyer dang nye bar skyes pa skyed mos tshal
T09D4152:10b-40: du yongs pa ma rmos par btab pa'i lo thog
T09D4152:10b-41: gi 'bras bu sbun pa med par za zhing ston
T09D4152:11a-1: skyes pa ltar rta'i rgyal po khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T09D4152:11a-2: des khyod la nam mkha'i lam gyis don byas pa'i
T09D4152:11a-3: b'a r'a na s'ir 'gugs par 'gyur ba yin no
T09D4152:11a-4: zhes bya ba smras nas lha mo de mi snang
T09D4152:11a-5: bar gyur to // byang chub sems dpa' yang dge
T09D4152:11a-6: ba'i rmi lam mthong bas rab tu dga' ba mchog
T09D4152:11a-7: 'dzin cing nges par bdag rgya shug gi gling du
T09D4152:11a-8: phyin pa'i 'bras bu rnyed par 'gyur zhes bya ba
T09D4152:11a-9: rnam par bsams nas lha rnams mchod par byas te
T09D4152:11a-10: bar gyur to // / dge sbyong dang bram ze
T09D4152:11a-11: dang sdug phongs rnams la sbyin pa byin nas ji
T09D4152:11a-12: ltar lha mos nye bar bstan pa'i lo bcu gnyis
T09D4152:11a-13: rgya shug gi gling du phyin te mi'am ci'i bdag
T09D4152:11a-14: po'i drung nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu de thob
T09D4152:11a-15: nas ci nas kyang rta'i bdag po de 'ong ngam
T09D4152:11a-17: bsod nams las can de las kyang ni rnam bsams pa //
T09D4152:11a-18: gzhan don sgrub ba la ni nges par 'brel sems kyis //
T09D4152:11a-19: zla ba'i 'od zer rnams skyi spro ba'i spungs pa ltar //
T09D4152:11a-20: rta yi rgyal po de yang kun nas myur du 'ongs par gyur //
T09D4152:11a-21: kun nas 'ongs te mi yi skad du des smras pa //
T09D4152:11a-22: gos kyi skud pa'i rnam pa mthun pa'i ze'u sogs can //
T09D4152:11a-23: grong khyer 'di las ri dang rgya mtshos bgrod dka' ba'i //
T09D4152:11a-24: rang yul las phyogs nam mkha'i lam las su bdag khyer //
T09D4152:11a-25: rab tu dga' ba yon tan la dga' yon tan can gyis dbyen //
T09D4152:11a-26: rta mchog zla ba'i 'od zer ltar ni dkar ba de la smras //
T09D4152:11a-27: bung ba rgyas pa rnams kyis khyab pa'i skyed mos tshal gyi nang //
T09D4152:11a-28: bdag gi p'a r'a na s'ir rta rgyal khyod kyis
T09D4152:11a-29: myur khrid cig / de nas rta yi rgyal pos
T09D4152:11a-30: bstan pa'i sems can de la smras //
T09D4152:11a-31: bdag gi rgyab 'di la ni zhon nas yan lag brtan par shog //
T09D4152:11a-32: rang gi gos la dag pa'i 'od zer rin po che bcings nas //
T09D4152:11a-33: de ni bya yi rgyal po dang mnyam sprin la zhon par gyur //
T09D4152:11a-34: rmig pa rnams kyis thug med chu 'dzin 'bigs shing 'ga' zhig tu ;
T09D4152:11a-35: / glog ni kun du snang bas yan lag kun nas ser byas pa //
T09D4152:11a-36: nam mkhar phyin nas g-yo med rgya mtsho'i chu ltar sngo ba yi //

T09D4152:14b-18: tog tog sgra ni 'byung gyur pa //
T09D4152:14b-19: me yi nang du 'jug pa ni ;
T09D4152:14b-20: / lus po 'di ni dag gyur cing //
T09D4152:14b-21: 'di ni su zhig blta bar nus //
T09D4152:14b-22: rnam pa gnyis su byed 'gyur ba'i //
T09D4152:14b-23: gling bu rnams kyi dus tshigs sgra //
T09D4152:14b-25: ji ltar sgra ni gsal thos 'gyur //
T09D4152:14b-26: rlung gis chags pa 'di rnams ni //
T09D4152:14b-27: bskyod pas 'dab ma lhags rnams kyis //
T09D4152:14b-28: 'di ni sreg par ma byed cig / shing rnams me la bzlog bzhin byed //
T09D4152:14b-29: sdug bsngal chus ni mig dmar ba'i //
T09D4152:14b-30: ha ha zhes pa'i yig gcig ngag /'di yis gnyen 'dun sdug bsngal ba'i //
T09D4152:14b-31: bdag cag yid ni rnam par gdung //
T09D4152:14b-33: / don du gnyer la 'dir nor sbyin //
T09D4152:14b-34: de ltar dam pa'i grogs 'di rnams //
T09D4152:14b-35: mchi ma dang bcas ston par 'gyur //
T09D4152:14b-36: nye bar min par bdag cag gi / yid ni sdug bsngal sreg par byed //
T09D4152:14b-37: grogs po'am ni gnyen rnams ni //
T09D4152:14b-38: srog chags ji ltar 'dzin par byed //
T09D4152:14b-39: de bas na shin tu snying rje ba'i drag po'i
T09D4152:14b-40: las bya dka' ba 'di lta ba 'di nus pa
T09D4152:14b-41: ma yin no zhes bya ba mngon par brjod nas
T09D4152:14b-42: bud med kyi skye bo de khyim la mngon par
T09D4152:14b-43: phyogs te rab tu song bar gyur to //
T09D4152:14b-44: de nas byang chub sems dpas smon lam 'di ltar byas par gyur te /
T09D4152:15a-0: bdag ni brgya byin go 'phang dge @15a * //
T09D4152:15a-1: bas rnyed pa don mi gnyer //
T09D4152:15a-2: rig 'dzin bdag po nyid kyang min te rgyal srid kyang ma yin //
T09D4152:15a-3: dge ba skyes pa 'di yis 'gro ba 'di la bde gshegs nyid //
T09D4152:15a-4: thos nas sdug bsngal zad pa'i don du 'byung bar
T09D4152:15a-5: 'gyur bar shog / de ltar brjod nas bdag nyid
T09D4152:15a-6: chen po des bdag nyid dor te dor ma thag
T09D4152:15a-7: tu me de 'bar ba'i tshogs dang du ba'i tshogs
T09D4152:15a-8: nye bar zhi nas dri zhim pa'i padma kha phye
T09D4152:15a-9: ba'i dris dri zhim par byas pa'i phyogs kyi dbus
T09D4152:15a-10: su padma dang lo ma sngon po la gnas pa'i
T09D4152:15a-11: dri ma dang bral ba'i chu'i thigs pa dang ldan
T09D4152:15a-12: pa / shel dang 'dra ba'i thigs pas khyab pa'i
T09D4152:15a-13: mar gad kyi brag dang rjes su mthun pa'i tshogs
T09D4152:15a-16: chu skyar rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa padma'i 'byung gnas nyid du 'gro bar gyur to //
T09D4152:15a-18: rlom pa'i sems kyi padma la //
T09D4152:15a-19: de yang blo ldan rnams kyi mchog /
T09D4152:15a-20: bdag nyid gnas pa mthong bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:15a-21: zhabs dang nye bar myos pa'i bung ba'i 'khor ba ni //
T09D4152:15a-22: zhi ba'i chos 'dod pa la chos ni gsungs gyur pa //
T09D4152:15a-23: padma'i 'dab ltar rgyas pa'i sbyan [*spyan?] ni pad gnas pa //
T09D4152:15a-24: padma'i skye gnas mdzes pa shin tu 'dzin par gyur //
T09D4152:15a-25: 'di ni rmi lam yin te 'on te 'di sgyu ma //
T09D4152:15a-26: me ni 'di gang gang du 'di ni chu skyes nyid //
T09D4152:15a-27: de ltar ngo mtshar phangs pa'i sems ldan pa //
T09D4152:15a-28: de la mthong zhing skye bo de rnams ngag tu smra //
T09D4152:15a-29: skye bo de rnams de ni mthong bar gyur pa la //
T09D4152:15a-30: chu skyes dbus su gnas par 'dod pa mthong ba ni //
T09D4152:15a-31: dga' ba'i mchi ma yang dag 'byung ba'i skad cig gis //
T09D4152:15a-32: khro bas mya ngan mchi ma'i chu ni gtong ba ltar //
T09D4152:15a-33: de nas nam mkha' las ni ze'u 'brus khyab pa'i dri ldan lhung ba ltar //
T09D4152:15a-34: bung ba'i phreng rnams kyis ni kun nas rjes su 'gro ba me tog char //
T09D4152:15a-35: bdud kyang me tog gis byas gzhu ni bzung nas logs su 'byung 'gyur te //
T09D4152:15a-36: mya ngan nye bar 'dzin cing lag pa rnam par gnas pa'i 'khor lo can //
T09D4152:15a-37: de nas bram ze de 'bar ba'i sol ba'i dbus
T09D4152:15a-38: su gnas pa dang 'dra ba'i bdag nyid kyi dbugs
T09D4152:15a-39: dri bas mngon par tsha ba'i bzhin gyi bar dang
T09D4152:15a-40: ldan pa bdag nyid rnam pa gang gis kyang 'dzin
T09D4152:15b-1: sa yi bug pa zab mo la ni yongs su spro byed pa //
T09D4152:15b-2: me dang 'dra bar mdun du che ba dag ni mthong ba ste //
T09D4152:15b-3: 'di la rim gyis yongs su bsdigs byed shin tu sdug bsngal gyis //
T09D4152:15b-4: sa la bdag gi gzugs ni rnam par nub pa lta bur byed //
T09D4152:15b-5: drag po'i me ldan dmyal ba 'dir ni bdag ni lhung gyur pa //
T09D4152:15b-6: chos 'dod khyod ni de ring 'dir ni bdag gi
T09D4152:15b-7: skyabs gyur cig /'dod pa mthon po gzhan la phan
T09D4152:15b-8: par byed pa chen po rnams //
T09D4152:15b-9: khyed cag lta bu grogs po dang ni dgra la mnyam sems ldan //
T09D4152:15b-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de la snying brtse
T09D4152:15b-11: bas bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs byas par gyur te
T09D4152:15b-12: / bden pa gang gis sems can don //
T09D4152:15b-13: byang chub spyod pa bdag spyod pas //
T09D4152:15b-14: dmyal ba 'bar ba'i me ldan par //
T09D4152:15b-15: des ni bram ze ma song cig / de ltar
T09D4152:15b-16: byang chub sems dpas bram ze de la gnas pa'i
T09D4152:15b-17: skad cig de nyid du ha ri tsan dan gyis
T09D4152:15b-18: rjes su byugs pa dang 'dra bar bdag nyid rab
T09D4152:15b-20: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas //
T09D4152:15b-21: 'gro ba'i don la mkhas pa la //
T09D4152:15b-22: sdig pa byas pa rnams kyi yang //
T09D4152:15b-24: de nas byang chub sems dpa' la rab tu dga'
T09D4152:15b-25: ba'i yid dang ldan pa'i grogs po dang gnyen bshes
T09D4152:15b-26: dang don du gnyer ba rnams kyis kun la snang
T09D4152:15b-27: bar gyur pa'i sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la sogs
T09D4152:15b-28: pa yang dag pa'i gzi brjid kyi don du chos
T09D4152:15b-29: dang mthun pa'i gtam byas par gyur to //
T09D4152:15b-30: lus dang rjes su dpag pas kyang //
T09D4152:15b-31: gnyi ga ma nges rgyu phyir ni //
T09D4152:15b-32: khyad par nges par skyed pa'i phyir //
T09D4152:15b-33: mngon sum shin tu stobs dang ldan //
T09D4152:15b-34: yongs su gtong ba chen po 'di ni ngo mtshar bcas //
T09D4152:15b-35: yun rings rnam mthong bdag la me lce 'phro ba ni //
T09D4152:15b-36: me 'di mngon sum lus can rnams la thams cad du //
T09D4152:15b-37: rab rgyas padma'i 'byung gnas nyid du nye bar song //
T09D4152:15b-38: de nas rgya ni che ba'i las kyi mthu 'di dang //
T09D4152:15b-39: ngo mtshar chen po yang dag par ni mthong nas ni //
T09D4152:15b-40: dge mi dge yi 'bras bu bde dang sdug bsngal yod pa ste //
T09D4152:15b-41: 'di ni rnam par bsams nas lam ni ngan pa spongs //
T09D4152:15b-42: bdag med nyid kyis rnam par btsums pa'i bdag nyid kyi //
T09D4152:16a-1: rnams kyi rab sad nye bar mkho ba ste //
T09D4152:16a-2: mkhas pa rnams ni gsal bar blo yi mig rnams la //
T09D4152:16a-3: rab sad yod ba la ni ci zhig rab tu sad //
T09D4152:16a-4: phan pas mngon par phyogs rnams la yang chos ngag gis //
T09D4152:16a-5: dam pa rnams ni shin tu rab sad skyed par byed //
T09D4152:16a-6: lcag gis yang dag bskul bas rab tu 'gro ba yi //
T09D4152:16a-7: rta rnams la ni 'gros kyi khyad par 'byung bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:16a-8: g-yo sgyu mang ba'i khyim gyi gnas ni skyong byed pa'i //
T09D4152:16a-9: blo ldan rnams la cung zad kyang ni yid brtan med //
T09D4152:16a-10: rab tu grag pa'i mche gnyis myos pa 'dzeg rnams la //
T09D4152:16a-11: lcags kyu ma btab par ni gnyid ni mi rigs so //
T09D4152:16a-12: bu chung smra ba dang ni khyim ni phun sum tshogs ldan pa //
T09D4152:16a-13: sgeg dang gzugs byad rnam par mdzes pa'i bud med rnams //
T09D4152:16a-14: rab tu chags can blo med rnams kyi 'di thams cad //
T09D4152:16a-15: zhi ba rjes su mthun la lam ni 'gag par byed //
T09D4152:16a-16: rnam pa gang gis mi khom brgyad po dang bral ba'i //
T09D4152:16a-17: mi lus shin tu rnyed dka' 'thob nas kyang //
T09D4152:16a-18: gang zhig bag med bsten pas zhi ba'i don mi myur //
T09D4152:16a-19: 'di ni ba glang rnams kyi gral du rnam par sbyar //
T09D4152:16a-20: 'di ni thob dang thod ni thob bya ma yin pa //
T09D4152:16a-21: 'di ni byas dang 'di ni byed 'gyur mi rnams la //
T09D4152:16a-22: de ltar yid kyi sna tshogs pas zad pa //
T09D4152:16a-23: yid kyi shing rtas 'jug pa 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
T09D4152:16a-24: yul rnams la ni nye bar longs spyod mthar ni rtsub pa ste //
T09D4152:16a-25: sbrul gyis dkris pa'i tsan dan bzhin du yongs su 'khyud pa ni //
T09D4152:16a-26: bde ba zhes bya yang dag ma yin kun rtog rjes 'gro ba'i //
T09D4152:16a-27: skye bo rnams ni sdug bsngal dra ba mang la lhag par nyal //
T09D4152:16a-28: kye ma ma rig pas ni 'gro ba ma lus 'og tu byas //
T09D4152:16a-29: glo bur skyes pa'i dri ma rnams kyis dri mar bcas pa smad //
T09D4152:16a-30: gang zhig 'di ni bsdus byas 'chi ba'i sgra yi spyod yul ni //
T09D4152:16a-31: glang po che ni nyal ba bzhin du babs nas gnas par 'gyur//
T09D4152:16a-32: g-yo sgyu can gyi sgrib pa'i sgra rnams kyis ni
T09D4152:16a-33: lam bzang 'phrog / mi rtag pa yi 'jigs pa
T09D4152:16a-34: rtag tu rnam par bsam par ma byas shing //
T09D4152:16a-35: bde bar gshegs pa'i rjes su bstan pa'i gru ni spangs byas nas //
T09D4152:16a-36: 'gro ba sdug bsngal rgya mtsho la ni rnam par nub par 'gyur //
T09D4152:16b-0: skad cig re rer @16b srog ni nye bar zad par 'gyur ba ste //
T09D4152:16b-1: du ba'i lam can rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs bzhin du //
T09D4152:16b-2: de bas rtag tu yul rnams la ni rtag tu rgyab kyis phyogs pa 'di //
T09D4152:16b-3: myur ba dang bcas phan pa'i phyir ni blo gros dang ldan mdzod //
T09D4152:16b-4: de ltar tshig ni rigs pa ma ldan gal te bdag gis smras pa ni ;
T09D4152:16b-5: / ji ltar 'dod pas 'dod pa'i bde ba'i chos 'brel nyams su myong bar gyis //
T09D4152:16b-6: 'on te 'di ni yon tan dang ldan dam pa rnams kyis bsams byas kye //
T09D4152:16b-7: yul la sred pa 'gag par byed pa'i zhi ba mchog ni bsten par mdzod //
T09D4152:16b-8: de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad nas byang chub sems
T09D4152:16b-9: dpa' grogs po'i skye bo dang bcas pa khyim du
T09D4152:16b-11: de ltar legs par spyod pa la mkhas pa'i bcom
T09D4152:16b-12: ldan 'das des srog rnams kyis kyang legs par bshad
T09D4152:16b-13: pa rnams nyo bar mdzad do zhes bya ba bsams
T09D4152:16b-14: nas dus rtag tu sdug bsngal gcod par 'dod pa'i
T09D4152:16b-15: shes rab can gyi chos kyi gtam nyan pa la
T09D4152:16b-17: dge ba'i bshen [*bshes] gnyen la brten pa yang mngon
T09D4152:16b-18: par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'grub par byed par 'gyur
T09D4152:16b-19: bas na // de'i phyir de dang rjes su 'jug pas gnas par bya zhes bya'o //
T09D4152:16b-20: chos 'dod pa'i skyes pa'i rabs zhes bya ba ste skyes pa'i rabs gsum pa'o /
T09D4152:16b-22: // / dam pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas son rnams kyang //
T09D4152:16b-23: gzhan don srog ni kun nas gtong ba ste //
T09D4152:16b-24: su zhes bya ba skyes par gyur pa ste //
T09D4152:16b-25: nor tsam la ni su zhig chags par byed //
T09D4152:16b-27: g-yo ba med pa nges par thim pa'i ne tso'i tshogs dang ;
T09D4152:16b-28: rtsva sngon pos nye bar khyab pa'i sa'i cha rnam
T09D4152:16b-29: pa sna tshogs pa'i ri'i rtse mor shing rnams kyi
T09D4152:16b-30: grib ma nye bar 'dug cing skyug ldad byed par
T09D4152:16b-31: gyur pa'i ri dvags kyi tshogs dang ldan pa dang
T09D4152:16b-32: / bung ba'i tshogs kyis bskor zhing nye bar sgra
T09D4152:16b-33: 'byin par gyur pa'i me tog skyes pa'i ljon shing
T09D4152:16b-34: rnams la yang dag par reg pas dri zhim pa'i
T09D4152:16b-35: rlung gis bskyod par gyur pa'i ri las 'bab pa'i
T09D4152:16b-36: chus dag par byas pa'i brag gis rgyab kyi mtha'
T09D4152:16b-38: thub pa'i skye bo rnams kyi yid dang rjes su mthun pa dang /
T09D4152:17a-0: rigs dang ldan pa'i shing dang ljon shing rnams kyi ze'u 'bru lhung bas chu bo'i rlabs @17a * //
T09D4152:17a-1: kyis kun nas gdungs pa'i ku mu da ltar dkar
T09D4152:17a-2: ba'i dbu ba'i tshogs kyis brgyan par byas pa'i chu
T09D4152:17a-4: mchog gi chu dang 'dab chags rnams kyi sgra 'byin
T09D4152:17a-5: pa'i padma'i nags dang ldan ba'i ri bo'i nags 'ga'
T09D4152:17a-6: zhig gi nang du byang chub sems dpa' ri bong
T09D4152:17a-8: der lhan cig gnas pa'i yon tan las mngon par
T09D4152:17a-9: 'phel ba'i grogs bshes rab tu zhi ba nye bar
T09D4152:17a-10: bsags pa'i dbang po'i tshogs nye bar zhi ba /
T09D4152:17a-11: grong pa'i chos kyi nye bar longs spyod pa la rgyab tu phyogs pa'i yid dang ldan pa /
T09D4152:17a-12: ri dags kyi pags pa dang sbyi [*spyi] blugs tsam
T09D4152:17a-13: yongs su 'dzin zhing dka' thub kyis gdungs pa'i dka'
T09D4152:17a-14: thub pa de'i grogs su byung bar gyur to //
T09D4152:17a-15: zhi dang chos ni mtshungs pa dang //
T09D4152:17a-16: bde sdug bskyed pa mnyam pa dang //
T09D4152:17a-17: de dag phan tshun ma mthong zhing //
T09D4152:17a-18: grogs ba shes mchog dag dga' mi 'gyur //
T09D4152:17a-19: byis pa'i dus na ri bong dang bral ba //
T09D4152:17a-20: cung zad dus na dro min 'od zer 'byung //
T09D4152:17a-21: ri bong rnam pa des ni brgya lam na //
T09D4152:17a-22: brtul zhugs can des legs par byas pa min //
T09D4152:17a-23: gom pa bdun du dor ba'i grogs bshes nyid yin te //
T09D4152:17a-24: rang bzhin gyis dag sems ldan dam pa rnams la ni //
T09D4152:17a-25: phan tshun yon tan gtam gyis yid ni ches gyur pa'i //
T09D4152:17a-26: nges par 'brel pa'i bsam ldan rnams la smos ci dgos //
T09D4152:17a-27: skyes pa ting 'dzin gnas pa rnams kyi blo la ni //
T09D4152:17a-28: chos kyi don du gsal ba nyid ni 'byung ba ste //
T09D4152:17a-29: rab tu yang ba'i yid ldan dud 'gro rnams la ni //
T09D4152:17a-30: chos la rtsom pa'i 'du shes ci phyir gyur pa yin //
T09D4152:17a-31: kye ma ri bong skyes pa 'di ni gang du skye //
T09D4152:17a-32: gang du tshig brtan 'di ni zhi ba 'di gang du //
T09D4152:17a-33: 'di ltar lha rnams la ni byung bar gyur pa yin //
T09D4152:17a-34: ri bong nyid la ngo mtshar ba dang bcas pa'i sems //
T09D4152:17a-35: de nas dus nam zhig na chu med pa nyid
T09D4152:17a-36: kyis kun skya ba dang phrag dog dang bcas pa'i
T09D4152:17a-37: zhing ba'i skye bo rnams kyis mthong bar gyur pa
T09D4152:17a-38: dang / glog gi rgyun gyi sgeg pa rnam par zlog pa dang /
T09D4152:17a-39: rlung gi stobs kyi tshogs rnam par chad pa'i sprin
T09D4152:17a-40: gyi tshogs yod pa la nyin mor byed pa'i 'od
T09D4152:17a-41: zer rnams kyis bskams pa'i chu lhag ma dang bcas
T09D4152:17b-0: pa dang / snying po yongs @17b su rnyings pas
T09D4152:17b-1: yang ba'i lo tog rnams kyis bkab pa'i zhing rnams
T09D4152:17b-2: yod pa la lan cig chu rnam par chad pas
T09D4152:17b-3: rab tu gram pa'i chus rnam par grol ba shin
T09D4152:17b-4: tu rgya che ba'i chu'i 'gram na chag pa dang
T09D4152:17b-5: pa dang / / gan rkyal du nya phyis gnas pa'i chu bo rnams yod pa dang /
T09D4152:17b-6: rdul babs bas rdul gyis ma nus pa'i rnam par
T09D4152:17b-7: 'brel ba'i dbugs kyis rab tu bskyod pa'i mgrin pa
T09D4152:17b-8: dang ldan pa myos pa'i dus la yang gar gyi
T09D4152:17b-9: bya ba rnam par bzlog pa'i mgrin pa sngon po
T09D4152:17b-10: can rnams yod pa la dma' bar skyes pa'i rtsva
T09D4152:17b-11: sar pa'i myu gu bskams pas sa la rtsva za
T09D4152:17b-12: ba ma rnyed pa nyid kyis kun nas dkris pa'i
T09D4152:17b-13: lto ba dang ldan pa dal gyis 'gro bas bskyod
T09D4152:17b-14: pa dang lkog shal 'phyang zhing lhod pa can 'o
T09D4152:17b-15: ma zad pas nu 'bur chung ba /
T09D4152:17b-16: kun nas stobs chung ba'i ba be'u dang ldan pa yod pa'i dus na /
T09D4152:17b-17: sngo dang 'dra ba'i nas ngan pa 'tshal bas rid
T09D4152:17b-18: pa dang rtsub pa'i yan lag can dbul po'i skye
T09D4152:17b-20: mu ge'i skyon gyis don du gnyer ba la bkur
T09D4152:17b-21: sti rgyab tu phyogs par byas pa'i grong dang ldan
T09D4152:17b-22: pa / skabs skabs su bsgrub pa'i sgra thos bzhin
T09D4152:17b-23: pa'i ba glang gi ra ba rnams yod pa'i dus
T09D4152:17b-24: pa / su / dka' thub pa des ri bong
T09D4152:17b-25: de la kye ma phan par byas pa la yang
T09D4152:17b-26: phongs pa'i dus su rang bzhin gyis dman pa'i srog
T09D4152:17b-27: chags rjes su 'jug pa ma yin te zhes bya
T09D4152:17b-28: pa / su / ba smras so // khyod kyis blta bar gyis shig gang gi phyir 'di ni //
T09D4152:17b-29: chu rgyun 'bab pas rnam 'byed zla ba'i nor bu can gyi sgro tshogs dga' bas rgyas byed cing //
T09D4152:17b-30: gar gyis sgeg par ldan pa sngon du rnam bsams skad kyis gang zhig la ni bstod bzhin pa //
T09D4152:17b-31: rma bya chu med pa yi sprin de nyid la mig gnyis blta ba la ni le lo can //
T09D4152:17b-32: phal char skal ba dang ldan nyid la rang gi don la mkhas pa'i skye bo rten par byed //
T09D4152:17b-33: chu dang bral ba'i chu 'dzin rnams ni so sor 'gyur te dbang po'i gzhu ni rnam par chad //
T09D4152:17b-34: ri yi phug rnams dang ni 'brel pas zab mo'i tshig rnams rma bya rnams kyis thos min te //
T09D4152:17b-35: dngos po thams cad rang bzhin gyis ni 'jig ces bsams bzhin mya ngan gyis ni yun ring por //
T09D4152:17b-36: glog gi gar mkhan mas ni 'jam ba'i sgeg pas gar byed pa yang yongs su dor bar byed //
T09D4152:18a-1: nags ni 'bras zad 'gyur te ljon shing rnams ni skam par 'gyur //
T09D4152:18a-2: rim gyis padma'i rtsa ba rnams ni rnyings pas padma'i rtsa ba'i 'dab ni sra 'gyur ba //
T09D4152:18a-3: 'dir ni bdag gi shing lo'i khang par gang zhig rgya shug dang ni ae gu dhi 'bras tshogs //
T09D4152:18a-4: de yang zad de shin tu bya dka'i dka' thub don du ltad mo ci ltar byed par 'gyur //
T09D4152:18a-5: kha zas med pas skad cig re rer lus po 'di ni nus pa med par 'gro ba ste //
T09D4152:18a-6: nus pa med pas rnal 'byor rnams kyi sems la rab tu 'joms phyir ting 'dzin ga la brtan //
T09D4152:18a-7: ting 'dzin dman pa'i yid can shes rab can yang de nyid mngon du phyogs par ci phyir 'gyur //
T09D4152:18a-8: de nyid ma mthong bas kyang gti mug rab rib bcings pa phyis ni don med ngal bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:18a-9: de phyir pags pa'i spyi'u blugs shing shun gos rnams dor byas nas //
T09D4152:18a-10: rang gi khyim du gnyen 'dun skye bo lhan cig gnas par bgyi //
T09D4152:18a-11: mu ge'i skyon las thal bar gyur nas slar ni nags nang du //
T09D4152:18a-12: byams pa 'dir ni khyod dang lhan cig yun rings gnas par bgyi //
T09D4152:18a-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' yun ring por lhan
T09D4152:18a-14: cig tu gnas pas mngon par 'phel ba'i gnyen bzhin
T09D4152:18a-15: pas brlan pa'i snying gtam drang srong de la smras
T09D4152:18a-16: pa / 'ching ba'i sdong po bton nas bde ba mngon 'dod cing //
T09D4152:18a-17: rnam pa gang gis mche gnyis pa ni nags mthar song //
T09D4152:18a-18: slar ni lcags kyu 'debs pa'i sdug bsngal ma dran pas //
T09D4152:18a-19: mi shes pa ni skye bo'i nang nyid 'gro bar 'dod //
T09D4152:18a-20: zhi dang shes rab nyid dang dka' thub yon tan dang //
T09D4152:18a-21: shes bya la ni ji bzhin rjes 'gro'i thos pas kyang //
T09D4152:18a-22: khyod ni thub pa gzhan rnams zil gyis mnan nas gnas //
T09D4152:18a-23: nyi mas mar me bzhin du ring ba'i 'od zer gyis //
T09D4152:18a-24: mun pa med pa'i rnam par dben pa'i mig gis ni //
T09D4152:18a-25: de ltar khyod kyi bstan bcos nges par yang ni mthong //
T09D4152:18a-26: spyod yul las 'das yul la rab tu zhugs 'dod pa //
T09D4152:18a-27: ji ltar bag med byed bzhin zhes bya mtshon pa yin //
T09D4152:18a-28: mun pa rnam par 'byed cing ji ltar gsal byed pa //
T09D4152:18a-29: lus can rnams la yid ni dang ba bskyed pa ste //
T09D4152:18a-30: rmongs pas mkhas pa rnams kyi legs bshad mi shes pas //
T09D4152:18b-0: dmus long za ba'i dkyil 'khor @18b gsal bar byed pa bzhin //
T09D4152:18b-1: legs par blo yi mar me med pas dka' thub ma //
T09D4152:18b-2: bde ba rjes chags 'dor byed ces bya gtam gang yin //
T09D4152:18b-3: khyim pa nyid la gang zhig yid ni dga' byed pa //
T09D4152:18b-4: rnam par dag pa'i bsam ldan de ni che mi rigs //
T09D4152:18b-5: thun gsum du ni mar gyi sreg blugs dris bsgos pa'i //
T09D4152:18b-6: rgya shug dang ni aem gu dhi 'bras nang zhugs pa //
T09D4152:18b-7: chu la brten pa'i ngang skya dang ni sa ra sas //
T09D4152:18b-8: zhing la nye bar sbas pa'i shing lo'i khang pas brgyan //
T09D4152:18b-9: dka' thub can gyi bu mos blugs pa'i bum chu yis //
T09D4152:18b-10: rab tu gtor zhing 'byung ba'i shing ni chung ba rnams //
T09D4152:18b-11: 'gram du shing gi grib mas chu rnams 'gag pa ni //
T09D4152:18b-12: kun nas dbugs 'byung me tog dri zhim rlung ldan pa //
T09D4152:18b-13: dka' thub can gyi bu rnams yongs 'khor rjes 'gro ba'i //
T09D4152:18b-14: ri dags rnams kyi myur bar dam byas 'ga' zhig tu //
T09D4152:18b-15: bzlas pas kha spu 'gul zhing mgrin pa rengs pa yi //
T09D4152:18b-16: dka' thub nor can rnams kyis ri bo tshad tshing rten //
T09D4152:18b-17: kye ma mnyes gshin brtan pas nges par 'brel ba'i sems //
T09D4152:18b-18: dam min bde ba myong ba'i cha dang rjes chags pas //
T09D4152:18b-19: chags can shes rab med pa rnams kyi sems 'di ni //
T09D4152:18b-20: ri rtse'i sa rnams chags pa bskyed par mi 'gyur ram //
T09D4152:18b-21: mi dge'i skye bo rnams kyis brten bya lam ngan thob nas gti mug gis //
T09D4152:18b-22: nges par mi shes pa ni mnyes gshin zhags pa ma spangs nyams par 'gyur //
T09D4152:18b-23: legs par byas pa rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i lam yang yang dag 'dzin //
T09D4152:18b-24: gang phyir rdul bral lam ni gnas par mi 'gyur 'di ni 'dir ma thob //
T09D4152:18b-25: khyim na gnas ba'i sdug bsngal gyi skyon mang po dang ldan ba'o zhes bya bar shes nas /
T09D4152:18b-26: zhi ba dang rjes su mthun pa rnam par grol
T09D4152:18b-27: ba'i lam gsal bar byed pa'i rab tu byung ba
T09D4152:18b-28: nyid 'di spangs nas bde ba cung zad tsam gyi
T09D4152:18b-29: phyir 'jigs pa chen po'i sdug bsngal gyi sa 'og
T09D4152:18b-30: tu zhugs pa'i phyir khyod nyid 'dod pa ste /
T09D4152:18b-31: gang yang khyod kyis mngon par brjod pa ni /
T09D4152:18b-32: slar yang bdag dka' thub kyi don du nags su
T09D4152:18b-33: 'ong bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni dad par
T09D4152:18b-36: gang gi phyir khyim na gnas pa ni gegs mang ba ste /
T09D4152:18b-37: dbang po'i don la dbang du song ba'i 'dod can ma//
T09D4152:19a-0: @19a * // mthong bar byed cing dgod pa'i sgeg pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
T09D4152:19a-1: ma smras 'bras bu ster ba'i dka' thub can ri la //
T09D4152:19a-2: gzhan yang drang srong chen po yul rnams la rjes
T09D4152:19a-3: su 'jug pa'i srog chags ni sdug bsngal chen po
T09D4152:19a-4: nyams su myong ba yin te /
T09D4152:19a-5: ltos shing rngon pa'i glu yis ri dags ni //
T09D4152:19a-6: mda' yis 'ben du khyer ba ltar //
T09D4152:19a-7: yul rnams myong bar 'dod rnams kyi //
T09D4152:19a-9: so chag pa ni nyi mar ltung ba shi bar 'gyur ba ste //
T09D4152:19a-10: lci ba tsha ba'i sdug bsngal nye bar nyams su myong nas ni //
T09D4152:19a-11: ji ltar yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs la sems dang bcas rnams kyi //
T09D4152:19a-12: sdug bsngal la ni chags pa rnams kyi drung du mi 'gyur ram //
T09D4152:19a-13: gal te mchil pa la gnas sha ni bzung bar mi 'gyur ram //
T09D4152:19a-14: lus can 'di ni chu las su zhig gis ni 'don par byed //
T09D4152:19a-15: bde ba la ni chags pa'i blo can mdun du rjes 'brel ba'i //
T09D4152:19a-16: rmongs pa'i skye bo yis ni 'jigs par rnam par mthong mi byed //
T09D4152:19a-17: zum pa'i padma la ni bung ba gnas par byed pa ste //
T09D4152:19a-18: shin tu dri la chags pa dka' ba kun nas thob 'gyur te //
T09D4152:19a-19: glang po ches ni nags nas glang mo'i rjes su 'brang byed cing //
T09D4152:19a-20: shin tu rno ba'i lcags kyu'i sdug bsngal chen po bzod par 'gyur //
T09D4152:19a-21: chung ba'i blo can rnams ni rnam rmongs rgud pa'i rten yin la //
T09D4152:19a-22: blo brtan bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis kun nas spong ba ste //
T09D4152:19a-23: gal te rtag 'byung ba de la 'dod pa khyed rnams la ni yod //
T09D4152:19a-24: de phyir dug bzhin yul gyi sbrul gyi spyod yul spong bar mdzod //
T09D4152:19a-26: gnod pa la sogs du ma dang skyon gyi mda'
T09D4152:19a-27: rnams kyi 'ben du gyur pa ni khyim na gnas
T09D4152:19a-28: pa ste / bde ba cung zad myong bas rmongs
T09D4152:19a-29: par byas pa'i bdag nyid can rnams kyis yongs su
T09D4152:19a-30: dor ba'i don du nus pa ma yin te 'on
T09D4152:19a-31: pa ste / kyang / shin tu snying grogs ri bong tshul khrims rgya mtsho can //
T09D4152:19a-32: khyed nyid kyi ni yon tan rnams ni de lta bu //
T09D4152:19a-33: bdag gi sems ni 'phro bar gang rnams kyis 'gyur ba //
T09D4152:19a-34: zhi ba 'dod pas slar yang 'dir ni 'ong bar byed //
T09D4152:19a-35: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
T09D4152:19a-36: gal te khyod gdon mi za ba nyid du mngon
T09D4152:19a-37: par 'gro ba 'dod pa de lta na yang nyi
T09D4152:19b-0: ma gcig po 'di 'dir @19b gnas par byas te
T09D4152:19b-1: / nang par rang gi 'dod pa khyed kyis rjes
T09D4152:19b-2: su 'grub par gyis shig / de nas thub pa
T09D4152:19b-4: nges par bdag la 'di spyan drang bar 'dod pa'o snyam mo //
T09D4152:19b-5: 'dzam bu'i tshal ni 'bras bu rnams kyis mngon dga' 'ga' zhig 'dis //
T09D4152:19b-6: mthong bar gyur tam 'on te ts'u ta'i shing 'dir 'bras skyes shing //
T09D4152:19b-7: smin zhing shin tu dmar ba 'jam pa'i 'bras bu'i dri ldan pa //
T09D4152:19b-8: au dum b'a ra'i shing ngam ri gzhan 'ga' zhig tu ni mthong //
T09D4152:19b-9: de nas ri bong mtshan mo de 'das pa dang
T09D4152:19b-10: tho rangs kyi dus su nags de thams cad la
T09D4152:19b-11: yongs su bskor zhing rtsa ba dang 'bras bu ma
T09D4152:19b-12: rnyed pa la sems shing gnas so //
T09D4152:19b-13: lto stong dang ldan bkres pa dang bcas yan lag rid pa 'di //
T09D4152:19b-14: zhi ba'i thub pa bde sdug mnyam pa grogs bzang yod pa la //
T09D4152:19b-15: bdag ni rtsva sngon nags kyi nang du ji ltar za bar byed //
T09D4152:19b-16: bsil bar dri ma med pa'i chu ni ji ltar btung bar bgyi //
T09D4152:19b-17: yang na don du gnyer ba'i skye bo re bsgrub
T09D4152:19b-18: par byed nus pa'i lus 'di yod pa la bdag
T09D4152:19b-19: nus pa med pa dang 'dra bar yid mi bde
T09D4152:19b-20: bas ci'i phyir gnas par byed //
T09D4152:19b-21: de nas drang srong de'i drung du song nas smras pa //
T09D4152:19b-22: drang srong chen po re zhig yud tsam bzhugs shig
T09D4152:19b-23: ji srid bdag gis kha zas kyi tshogs cung zad
T09D4152:19b-24: dbul bar bgyi'o // de nas thub pa de 'di
T09D4152:19b-25: ltar ldum gyi rtsa ba dang 'bras bu kun nas
T09D4152:19b-26: zad pa'i nags 'dir slar kha zas nye bar sdud
T09D4152:19b-27: pa'i nus pa ji lta bu 'di la yod par
T09D4152:19b-29: de nas bdag nyid chen po des sol ba'i phung
T09D4152:19b-30: po 'bar bar mthong nas smon lam 'di ltar mngon
T09D4152:19b-32: ji ltar don gnyer bkres pa zhi phyir sdug bsngal dang bral ba //
T09D4152:19b-33: bdag gis sreg blugs za ba 'bar zhing 'khrungs la srog rnams dor //
T09D4152:19b-34: de ltar 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa ni //
T09D4152:19b-35: shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i stobs bcu nyid ni thob par bgyi //
T09D4152:19b-36: gzhan gyi don la rang gi bdag nyid dor ba
T09D4152:19b-37: rab tu dga' ba'i yid des de ltar bsam byas
T09D4152:19b-38: nas // nyon mongs bcas par bya phyir zhi ba'i
T09D4152:19b-39: go 'phang mngon par 'dod cing srog chags rnams kyi
T09D4152:20a-0: nas // gnyen du ni // nags kyi me de rnams kyang 'bar ba'i @20a * //
T09D4152:20a-1: tshogs ni nye bar zhi gyur de yi bsod nams mthu yis te //
T09D4152:20a-2: sgeg pa'i chu rlabs ri mo can dang rab bskyod
T09D4152:20a-3: bung ba'i tshogs ldan padma'i 'byung gnas nyid du gyur
T09D4152:20a-4: // de nas thub pa des sdug go zhes brjod
T09D4152:20a-5: nas me zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chus gang ba'i
T09D4152:20a-7: de'i drung du nye bar song nas bdag nyid chen
T09D4152:20a-8: po de rnam par kha bye ba'i padma dkar po'i
T09D4152:20a-9: dbus su nye bar gnas bzhin pas chos ston par
T09D4152:20a-10: mdzad pa mthong bar gyur to //
T09D4152:20a-11: ri bong des ni shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa ni //
T09D4152:20a-12: chu nang padma dkar po des ni mdzes par gyur //
T09D4152:20a-13: ston dus gsal ba'i nam mkha' la ni rab gsal ba //
T09D4152:20a-14: ri bong gis mtshan gzugs ni gsal bas mtshan pa ltar //
T09D4152:20a-15: de nas padma dkar po'i nang du gnas pa'i ri
T09D4152:20a-16: bong de mthong nas thub pa de ngo mtshar ba'i
T09D4152:20a-17: yid dang ldan pas bstod pa 'di rab tu smra
T09D4152:20a-18: bar gyur to // ae ma gzhan gyi don ni sgrub pas bkra shis pa //
T09D4152:20a-19: grags pa'i gter khyod kyi ni phrin las 'di ngo mtshar //
T09D4152:20a-20: bsam byas bdag nyid chen po'i khyad par yang dag bsten //
T09D4152:20a-21: blo gros chen po su dag ri bong ltar khyed spyod //
T09D4152:20a-22: rlung gis kha lo sgyur ba rab 'bar 'di gang du //
T09D4152:20a-23: padma'i nags tshal nyid ni 'di 'dra gang du yang //
T09D4152:20a-24: bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi bsod nams stobs kyis ni //
T09D4152:20a-25: byin gyis brlabs pas dug shing 'di yang sman shing 'gyur //
T09D4152:20a-26: de nas bdag nyid chen po de padma dkar po
T09D4152:20a-27: las babs nas thub pa de dang lhan cig tu
T09D4152:20a-28: shing lo las byas pa'i khang par zhugs te //
T09D4152:20a-29: byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad pa shes pas ngo mtshar
T09D4152:20a-30: ba'i yid dang ldan pa'i lha'i dbang pos kun nas
T09D4152:20a-31: mig sman gyi ri bo ltar sngo ba'i chu 'dzin
T09D4152:20a-32: gyi tshogs kyis nyin mor byed pa bsgribs pas yun
T09D4152:20a-33: ring po ma yin pa'i 'od kyi gsal bas kun
T09D4152:20a-34: nas dmar ba'i phyogs kyi bar dang ldan pa'i nam
T09D4152:20a-36: de nas rab tu bskyod byas chu yis bsil ba'i rlung rnams ni //
T09D4152:20a-37: kun nas shing los byas pa'i khang pa byed cing rgyu bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:20a-38: ri bong lhan cig byed pa'i shing la ne tso rnams brten pa //
T09D4152:20a-39: yang dag 'byung ba'i phred can 'bras bu dang bcas rnam mdzes gyur //
T09D4152:20a-40: bung ba'i gling bu rnams kyi sgra ni kun nas 'byung ba dang //
T09D4152:20b-0: @20b chu yi ri ni 'bab chu dang bcas rdza rnga bzhin du sgra sgrogs dus //
T09D4152:20b-1: ri yi steng du gnas pa'i rma bya dang 'bral nam mkha' la //
T09D4152:20b-2: sprin ni sad pa rnam par ldang bar byed cing gar byed 'gyur //
T09D4152:20b-3: lha dbang yid ni 'phrog par byed pa'i gzhung ni rgyas byas nas //
T09D4152:20b-4: gang zhig mang ba bsil ba'i char chu 'bab par byas pa ni //
T09D4152:20b-5: chu 'dzin rnams ni so ga rnam par ldang bar zad byas pa //
T09D4152:20b-6: spro zhing yun mi ring ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis rnam par rgyas //
T09D4152:20b-7: kun nas 'khor ba'i bung ba nges par ltung bas khros pa ni //
T09D4152:20b-8: kun nas dbugs bung rab tu bzhon pa'i ke ta'i shing gnas pa //
T09D4152:20b-9: dbugs ni bung ba rang gi ngo bo 'khyil pa'i lus 'dzin pa //
T09D4152:20b-10: yang dang yang du lto 'phyes gdengs ka rgyas par byed par 'gyur //
T09D4152:20b-11: bud med med par ba yi mthong bar spro bas spro //
T09D4152:20b-12: ri lam shing la brten pa'i lam pa yis //
T09D4152:20b-13: chu rgyun nang na spyod pa'i nyung ba ni //
T09D4152:20b-14: 'tshed byed rnams kyi ngag ni kun thos 'gyur //
T09D4152:20b-15: ngo bo lam pa'i bud med rnams kyis 'phrog par
T09D4152:20b-16: byed pa'i glog / mthong ste chu rnams gtong la
T09D4152:20b-17: zur gyis blta ba'i mig / mche ba gnyis pa'i
T09D4152:20b-18: steng du rlung gis bskyod pa ni //
T09D4152:20b-19: rgyal mtshan la bcings ba dan gur kum gyis btsos bzhin //
T09D4152:20b-20: rma bya'i sgro dang bsres pa'i ka sha'i nyag ma ni //
T09D4152:20b-21: 'ga' zhig bskor zhing kun nas bskor ba'i si len dra //
T09D4152:20b-22: chu bo rnams kyi chu ni rnyog can 'gyur ba ste //
T09D4152:20b-23: 'gram du 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu lhung bas dbu ba 'byed //
T09D4152:20b-24: chu bo'i 'gram rnams 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu rnams kyis 'brel pa ste //
T09D4152:20b-25: ne'u gsing 'jam po dang 'brel nyams dga' mdzes pa lta bar gyis //
T09D4152:20b-26: chu yi thigs pa lhung bas sgra sgrogs shing lo'i khang pa na //
T09D4152:20b-27: thub pa de ni ri bong lhan cig gnas shing rab dgar gyur //
T09D4152:20b-28: de nas de la dris pa ste //
T09D4152:20b-29: rnam par rtog pa chen po 'dis //
T09D4152:20b-30: lha yi bde ba 'dod pa khyod //
T09D4152:20b-31: lha dbang gnas ni 'dod dam ci//
T09D4152:20b-32: ri bong brtan pa'i sems ldan pa'i //
T09D4152:20b-33: dka' thub can de la ni smras //
T09D4152:20b-34: srog chags sdug bsngal zhi bya'i phyir //
T09D4152:20b-35: bdag ni sangs rgyas nyid 'dod do //
T09D4152:20b-36: de nas de la thub pas smras //
T09D4152:20b-37: gang tshe sangs rgyas khyod 'gyur ba //
T09D4152:21a-0: de tshe bdag slob bdag gyur cig / des kyang de la khas blangs @21a * //
T09D4152:21a-2: / de ltar dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa
T09D4152:21a-3: na yang bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub sems dpa'
T09D4152:21a-4: rnams kyi spyod pa la spyod cing srog rnams kyis
T09D4152:21a-5: kyang gzhan rnams la phan pa mdzad pa ste /
T09D4152:21a-6: de bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dang
T09D4152:21a-7: ba dang rtse gcig pas gnas par bya zhes bya
T09D4152:21a-8: ba ni / ri bong gi skyes pa'i rabs te /
T09D4152:21a-11: // / byang chub sems dpa'i mgo bo yongs su gtong ba ste //
T09D4152:21a-12: su zhig ngo mtshar bar ni gang phyir ma gyur tam //
T09D4152:21a-13: yang na 'bras bu dang ni rjes su mthun pa ni //
T09D4152:21a-14: phal cher chen po rnams kyi kun nas rtsom pa rnams //
T09D4152:21a-16: sreg blugs 'dzin pa'i grogs po'i stobs kyis yang dag
T09D4152:21a-17: par skyes pa'i rlabs chen po dang ldan pa'i 'o
T09D4152:21a-18: ma'i rgya mtsho'i rjes su byed pa'i kha ba can
T09D4152:21a-19: gyi ri dang 'dra ba'i mu tig gi phreng bas
T09D4152:21a-20: mngon par brgyan par byas pa'i lus ngan gyi phyogs
T09D4152:21a-21: kyi bud med la rab tu dga' ba'i yid can
T09D4152:21a-22: lha'i bzo bo bi shva karmas smug rtsi dang 'dra

T09D4152:21a-24: bos kun nas gnod par byas pa rlung gis rnam

T09D4152:21a-26: rnams kyi dris dri zhim par byas pa'i phyogs rnams
T09D4152:21a-28: rtag tu lo legs pa'i phyir mdzod dang bang mdzod
T09D4152:21a-29: yongs su gang ba can grong khyer gyi ngo bos

T09D4152:21a-34: rgyal po'am rgyal po'i blon po chen po gzhan 'pham
T09D4152:21a-35: par byas pa / chu bo rnams rgya mtsho dang
T09D4152:21a-36: 'dra ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi rten

T09D4152:21a-43: grogs po'i skye bo ku mu da rnams la ni bde ba skyed byed pa //

T09D4152:21b-3: skye bo ma lus pa nyid ngo mtshar bar byed
T09D4152:21b-4: pa'i dam bca' 'di byung bar gyur to //

T09D4152:21b-9: brgya phrag bcu'i nor la skya rengs dang 'dra bar

T09D4152:21b-17: phan chun rnam par 'bral ba can //

T09D4152:21b-24: sen mo ltar 'khyog pa dang rno ba'i sen mo

T09D4152:21b-27: lcags kyi ka ba ltar grims pa dang che ba'i lag ba dang brang dang ldan pa /
T09D4152:21b-28: ri bong can gyi cha ltar 'khyog pa'i mche ba

T09D4152:21b-34: gtsug gi nor bu rnams par lhung ba mthong bar
T09D4152:21b-35: gyur to // gnyid sad nas yid mi bde bas 'di ltar bsams par gyur to //
T09D4152:21b-36: kye ma bdag gi rmi lam rnam par smin pa rtsub pa 'di mthong ngo //
T09D4152:21b-37: bdag cag gi rje bo'i lus kyang blangs na don
T09D4152:21b-38: du gnyer ba la bdag gis sbyin par bya'o zhes
T09D4152:21b-39: dam bcas te / de bas na ji srid du
T09D4152:21b-40: mi'i bdag po nge'i mgo bo su zhig slong bar
T09D4152:21b-41: mi byed pa de srid du du ma rin po
T09D4152:21b-42: che'i rang bzhin gyi mgo bo rnams bzo bo rnams
T09D4152:21b-43: la byed du gzhug go snyam mo //
T09D4152:22a-0: de rnams nyid kyis kyang mgo bo slong @22a * //
T09D4152:22a-1: ba su zhig la phyi rol nyid du so sor mchod nas gtang bar bya zhes te /

T09D4152:22a-5: skye bo ma lus gso bar byed //
T09D4152:22a-6: de nas zla ba chen po blon po rnams kyi
T09D4152:22a-7: gtso bos rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi mgo rnams
T09D4152:22a-9: phyi rol nyid du slong ba pa'i skye bo rnams
T09D4152:22a-10: la gang gis don grub ces bya ba rnam par

T09D4152:22a-18: sbrul ltar rang bzhin gyis drag pa /

T09D4152:22a-21: zla 'od ces bya ba'i rgyal po thams cad gtong ba ste /

T09D4152:22a-34: bdag po myang ba byas pa dang ni 'dra //
T09D4152:22a-35: dus ma yin pa yal ga can rnams las //
T09D4152:22a-36: me tog sngo skya ge sar can 'byung ste //
T09D4152:22a-37: rdul tshogs 'byung ba'i rlung rnams ldang ba ni //
T09D4152:22a-38: gtsug phud cha yis rjes su 'gro ba ltar //
T09D4152:22a-39: rgyu dang mi rgyu dang bcas sa 'byung ste //
T09D4152:22a-40: dri bcas rid pa'i skye bos khyab cing khyab //
T09D4152:22a-41: mtshan mo kun nas dud pa'i skar ma can //
T09D4152:22a-42: nub dang nye bar song ba'i zla ba bzhin //
T09D4152:22a-43: nags kyi bdag po rnams kyang rtsva 'jam pa //
T09D4152:22b-0: ba rnams 'o ma skad cig gis zad @22b 'gyur ;
T09D4152:22b-1: / gtsang bar gyur kyang zhugs pa'i sreg blugs can //
T09D4152:22b-2: mchod sbyin byed pa'i me ni de mi 'bar //
T09D4152:22b-3: de nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshan ma ngan
T09D4152:22b-4: pa mthong nas bzang po'i brag la gnas pa'i skye

T09D4152:22b-27: skom pa sel na rgya mtsho sa dgos pa ci zhig smros //
T09D4152:22b-29: rags pa'i 'o ma'i nu 'jing ldan zhing sprin dkar
T09D4152:22b-30: ltar ni 'od ldan pa rnams be'u bcas mi 'dod

T09D4152:22b-32: bung ba'i tshogs myos pa yi glang po'i dbang po
T09D4152:22b-33: de // rnams mi 'dod // rgyan yang gsal ba
T09D4152:22b-34: gsal ba'i 'od zer ldan pa'i nor bu rnams dang
T09D4152:22b-35: gos kyang khyad par can mi 'dod //

T09D4152:22b-37: bdag ni sa skyong 'di las mgo bo slong bar
T09D4152:22b-39: dam pa rin chen rang bzhin mgo bo 'di rnams ni //
T09D4152:22b-40: dad pa rtse gcig pas ni bdag gis khyed la 'bul //
T09D4152:22b-41: gal te 'di rnams kyis ni khyed la don med na //
T09D4152:22b-42: da lta nyid du bdag gi mgo bo khyer bar mdzod //
T09D4152:22b-43: rje bo'i don du srog 'dzin pa'i//
T09D4152:23a-1: de yi don du 'grub gyur pa //
T09D4152:23a-2: gal te de rnams don byas nyid //
T09D4152:23a-4: yang dang yang du smras pa 'dis ci zhig bya //
T09D4152:23a-5: mngon spyod kyi las la sa'i bdag po'i mgo bos bdag la dgos pa yod do //
T09D4152:23a-6: de nas rgyal po zla 'od lha'i mig gis mgo
T09D4152:23a-7: bo slong ba po de phyi rol na gnas pa
T09D4152:23a-8: mthong nas langs te dga' ba'i grogs po dang 'dra
T09D4152:23a-9: bar blon po'i gtso bo de la smras pa /
T09D4152:23a-10: mang pos smras pas chog ste don du gnyer bar

T09D4152:23a-15: rgya mtsho rgal bar 'dod pa las //

T09D4152:23a-20: spro ba nyid du bya ba ste //
T09D4152:23a-21: chos kyi gegs ni mi rigs so //
T09D4152:23a-22: gal te don gnyer 'di lta bu //
T09D4152:23a-23: thar pa'i rgyu ni med gyur na //
T09D4152:23a-24: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa 'di //
T09D4152:23a-25: byang chub sems dpas ji ltar rdzogs //
T09D4152:23a-26: de ltar blangs te ral gri blangs //
T09D4152:23a-27: mi bdag 'dis ni bram ze la //

T09D4152:23a-29: bram ze gang du sems ni snying rje med pa gang du ste //

T09D4152:23a-32: bram ze'i brang la ngo tsha dang bcas 'dra bar gnas par gyur //

T09D4152:23a-36: gcig pus mgo gcod par nus pa ma yin te

T09D4152:23a-38: de nas rgyal po des mna' dang bcas par sdug
T09D4152:23a-39: bsngal gyi chus kun nas gdungs pa'i mig dang ldan

T09D4152:23b-0: smre sngags kyis kun nas bslang ba'i yi ge @23b
T09D4152:23b-1: smras pa / kye ma mi yi bdag po mgo bo med pa ni //
T09D4152:23b-2: de ring su zhig gis ni nges par lta bar nus //
T09D4152:23b-3: mchod sbyin byed pa'i nus pa nye bar nyams pa ni //
T09D4152:23b-4: mchod sbyin srin po rnams kyis nye bar nyams pa ltar //
T09D4152:23b-5: sa ni skyod ba med par de ring grong khyer 'dir //
T09D4152:23b-6: shin tu phongs par rnams par snang ba nyid 'gyur te //
T09D4152:23b-7: bud ba'i tshogs kyis bskor bas khyab pa'i chu nas ni //
T09D4152:23b-8: glang por nams kyis padma rgyas pa 'don pa ltar //
T09D4152:23b-9: de bas ji srid mi yi bdag po 'di ni shi ba ma thos par //

T09D4152:23b-11: de ltar rnam par bsams nas ting 'dzin stobs kyi blo ldan de //

T09D4152:23b-13: skyes bu de nyid don byas bde ba yang dag thob nas ni //

T09D4152:23b-16: gang zhig thog ma nyid du lus kyi 'jig pa thob par gyur //

T09D4152:23b-18: skyed mos tshal du zhugs pa'i rgyal po la de'i
T09D4152:23b-19: btsun mo'i 'khor du 'o dod 'bod pa'i sgra chen

T09D4152:23b-23: pa la bdag gis ral gri rdeg par nus pa

T09D4152:23b-26: ba'i tsam pa ka'i shing 'di la bdag bcing bar

T09D4152:23b-30: smras so // 'gro ba'i gnyen du gyur pa yi //

T09D4152:27a-42: mthong nas yud tsam ngo mtshar bas //
T09D4152:27a-43: sor mo'i 'dab ma bskyod cing 'dug /'jig rten 'di yang de la smras //
T09D4152:27b-0: khyod kyi phrin las 'di yis @27b ni ;
T09D4152:27b-1: / ser sna can gyi sems kyang ni //
T09D4152:27b-2: nges par gtong la rab spro byas //
T09D4152:27b-3: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa gang //
T09D4152:27b-5: 'jig rten phan phyir de ni khyod //
T09D4152:27b-6: ngas par gzugs dang ldan par gnas //
T09D4152:27b-7: bud med nyid ni gang du blo rno 'di gang du //
T09D4152:27b-8: gtong ba 'di ni gang du 'jam nyid 'di gang du //
T09D4152:27b-9: dam pa 'di yis kun nas gtong ba sngon 'gro ba'i //
T09D4152:27b-10: gtong bas gtong ba dang ldan gzhan dag ngo tshar byas //
T09D4152:27b-11: de nas gzugs ldan ma'i khyim thab des bden ba'i byin rlabs 'di ltar byas par gyur to //
T09D4152:27b-12: ji ltar skyes pa gzhan gyi yang //
T09D4152:27b-14: / de ltar myur du bden pa des //
T09D4152:27b-15: bdag gi nu med nu 'byung shog //
T09D4152:27b-16: bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs byed pa'i //
T09D4152:27b-17: de ltar khyim bdag des smras pa //
T09D4152:27b-18: nu ma'i khur gyis mi nus pa //
T09D4152:27b-19: de yi brang la slar skyes gyur //
T09D4152:27b-20: sbyin pa'i chu yis 'jig rten skom pa sel byed cing //
T09D4152:27b-21: so yi 'od zer ze 'brus yid 'phrog zhal gyi padma can //
T09D4152:27b-22: grong khyer de la lci ba'i nu 'jing gi ni ngang skya can //
T09D4152:27b-23: gzugs ldan ma ni slar yang padmo kun nas snang bar gyur //
T09D4152:27b-24: de nas lha'i bdag pos 'jig rten pa thams cad
T09D4152:27b-25: kyi gtong ba las lhag par gyur pa'i gtong ba
T09D4152:27b-26: 'dis gzugs ldan ma bdag lha'i grong khyer las lhung
T09D4152:27b-27: bar byas nas rang nyid kyi bdag po nyid byed
T09D4152:27b-28: 'dod par slar ci zhig 'gyur ram zhes bya ba
T09D4152:27b-30: dogs pa dang bcas pa'i yid dang ldan pas dgongs pa de'i shes par 'dod bzhin pas //
T09D4152:27b-31: rab tu brgyad bar byas pa'i chu 'dzin pa'i tshogs
T09D4152:27b-32: kyis shin tu sngo ba'i bar snang la 'dug ste
T09D4152:27b-33: / autpa la dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang
T09D4152:27b-34: du zhugs nas padma'i sdong po'i skud pa ltar dkar
T09D4152:27b-35: ba'i mchod phyir thogs kyis brang gi dbus su mngon
T09D4152:27b-36: par brgyan par byas pa dang ldan ba dang /
T09D4152:27b-37: mgrin par btags pa'i phreng ba dang ldan pa dang //
T09D4152:27b-38: bud med kyi mig dang 'dres pa ltar /

T09D4152:27b-42: slong mo don du gnyer ba zhes bya ba gzugs
T09D4152:27b-43: ldan ma'i khyim du phyin par gyur to //
T09D4152:28a-1: mas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bza' ston blangs nas
T09D4152:28a-2: bram ze gnyis skyes kyi brgya byin la byin no
T09D4152:28a-3: // gnas skabs la bab pa sngon du 'gro bar /
T09D4152:28a-4: lha yi bdag pos 'di la smras //
T09D4152:28a-5: khyed kyis nu ma yongs btang bas //

T09D4152:28a-7: bcag pa'i dung ltar dkar ba yi //

T09D4152:28a-9: dka' thub 'dis ni ci zhig khyod //

T09D4152:28a-11: bzang mo ngo mtshar dbang gis khyod //
T09D4152:28a-12: nyid la bdag ni 'dri bar byed //
T09D4152:28a-13: de nas lha yi bdag po la ni ji bzhin des smras pa //
T09D4152:28a-14: sa gsum zhi ba'i don du rgyal ba nyid ni bdag 'dod de //
T09D4152:28a-15: bram ze bdag gi bden pa 'dis ni de ltar 'gro ba la //
T09D4152:28a-16: yon tan rnams kyi rten gyur des ni skyes pa'i
T09D4152:28a-17: dngos por shog / tshig ni de ltar smras pa
T09D4152:28a-18: des ni skyes pa nyid gyur te //
T09D4152:28a-19: dga' ba'i sems ldan brgya byin yang ni rang gi grong khyer song //
T09D4152:28a-20: 'gro ba la ni ngo mtshar ba de 'byung bar shes nas ni //
T09D4152:28a-21: 'jig rten pa yang shin tu brten pa'i ngo mtshar can du gyur //
T09D4152:28a-22: kha spu 'byung ba rnam bskyod mig sman phye ma ltar gnag pa //
T09D4152:28a-23: skyes par gyur ba nye bar mthong nas de zhal zla ba la //
T09D4152:28a-24: nyid du glang po'i 'phral sgong ltar tsho nu 'bur gnyis po ni //
T09D4152:28a-25: yangs pa'i brang la ngo tsha ltar nyid kyis ni mi snang gyur //
T09D4152:28a-26: byang chub sems dpa' la yang gzugs dang ldan pa
T09D4152:28a-27: zhes bya ba 'jig rten du ming du grags par
T09D4152:28a-28: gyur to // de nas autpa la ldan pa'i rgyal
T09D4152:28a-29: po'i pho brang la dus gcig gi tshe na rgyal

T09D4152:28a-31: gyur to // bar gyur te / rgyal po grongs
T09D4152:28a-32: par gyur pa sga gcan gyis gzung ba'i mtshan mo
T09D4152:28a-33: byed pa'i mtshan mo ltar grong khyer de mdzes par
T09D4152:28a-34: gyur to // bar gyur te / ma gyur to
T09D4152:28a-35: // rgyal po zhig pas mngon par 'phel ba'i mya
T09D4152:28a-36: ngan dang ldan pa'i blon po rnams la nyams pa
T09D4152:28a-37: 'ga' zhig la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi skye bo la
T09D4152:28a-38: dbugs dbyung bar byas nas grong khyer ba'i tshogs la
T09D4152:28a-40: gtso bo med pa'i phyir yul 'dir brgya lam na
T09D4152:28a-41: dgra rnams 'ongs te rang gi nor dang bral bar
T09D4152:28a-43: de bas na khyim rab tu 'bar ba bsal ba'i
T09D4152:28a-44: don du khron pa rab tu rko ba dang 'dra
T09D4152:28a-45: bar dus 'das pa sdug bsngal gyi rgyu bdag cag
T09D4152:28b-1: de bas na 'dir dus thob pa 'di 'dir gzhon
T09D4152:28b-2: nu gzugs ldan 'di la rgyal po'i mtshan ma lus
T09D4152:28b-3: pa tshang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i yon tan rnams
T09D4152:28b-4: kyis phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa ste /
T09D4152:28b-5: de bas na 'di nyid bdag por bya ba'i phyir dbang bskur bar bgyi'o zhes zer ro //
T09D4152:28b-6: de nas gzhan la phan pa'i don du yid ni brtan byas te //
T09D4152:28b-7: de la dga' ba skyes pa'i grong khyer bas ni dbang bskur byas //
T09D4152:28b-8: rnga yab gnyis dang lan cig tu ni yid ni mngon dga' ba'i //
T09D4152:28b-9: gdugs dkar po ni 'khor gyi skye bos kun nas gzung bar gyur //
T09D4152:28b-10: tshong dus sar ni rta babs steng du me tog phreng bas 'brel //
T09D4152:28b-11: ri bo'i bung ba rnams kyi gar gyis yid ni mngon par dga' //
T09D4152:28b-12: dri yi chu yis spangs pas dri zhim byas pa'i lam nas 'gro //
T09D4152:28b-13: grong khyer pa rnams lus ngan grong khyer dang mtshungs grong khyer byas //
T09D4152:28b-14: chu 'dzin rnams ni dus su shin tu char pa sbyin gyur to //
T09D4152:28b-15: nye bar 'tsho bas nam yang sdug bsngal byed par mi 'gyur ro //
T09D4152:28b-16: der ni khrims kyis sa ni skyod bar byed pa'i sa bdag la //
T09D4152:28b-17: skye bos sdug bsngal 'di 'dra nam yang thos par mi 'gyur ro //
T09D4152:28b-18: ma rmos par ni 'bras bu che ba'i zhing ni byung gyur te //
T09D4152:28b-19: shing rnams rtag tu me tog dang ni 'bras mang ster bar gyur //
T09D4152:28b-20: rgyal po bzang po des ni rgyal srid skyong ba srid sgrub ltar //
T09D4152:28b-21: rnga mo rnams kyang rang nyid kyis ni 'o rgyun mang po 'jo //
T09D4152:28b-22: mi 'chad sbyin pas yongs su rdzogs pa'i yid kyi re ba ni //
T09D4152:28b-23: nus pa gsum ni 'byung bar ldan pa dbang po rnams rgyal ba //
T09D4152:28b-24: sna tshogs yon tan rnams kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lus ldan pa'i ;
T09D4152:28b-25: / sa skyong des ni rgyal po dang ni ldan pa'i sar ni gyur //
T09D4152:28b-26: de nas nor bu rnams kyis yid 'ong seng ge'i khrir bzhugs nas //
T09D4152:28b-27: mi dbang seng ge mi skyong rnams kyis zhabs pad 'dud byas pa //
T09D4152:28b-28: padma 'dra ba'i zhal ldan rab tu shes rgya'i chos dang ldan //
T09D4152:28b-29: skye bo'i don du 'bras bu don dam chos ni ston par mdzad //
T09D4152:28b-30: sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa che ba 'di ni blta bar bgyi //
T09D4152:28b-31: bdag gis 'di nyid du ni gang gis bud med nyid spangs te //

T09D4152:29a-1: shing las me tog tsam zhig 'dir ni rab tu skyes //
