T09D4152:29a-3: 'di na lan grangs du mar spyad nas don gnyer sa la ni //
T09D4152:29a-4: tshul khrims dri med ma lus sbyin pa'i gter ni nges par mdzad //
T09D4152:29a-5: yon tan chu brlan med gyur na ;
T09D4152:29a-6: / gal te don gnyer zhing sa rnams //
T09D4152:29a-8: sbyin pa'i sa bon gang du gdab //
T09D4152:29a-9: grags dang bsod nams rab sbyin pa'i //
T09D4152:29a-10: gang zhig gnyen rnams las lhag pa //
T09D4152:29a-11: don gnyer rnams ni shes rab can //
T09D4152:29a-12: smin bskyod lto 'phyes su zhig skrag //
T09D4152:29a-13: gcig ni bstod pa mang po dang ldan ngag ni smra ste gcig kyang rtsub pa'i yi ge can //
T09D4152:29a-14: gcig ni nus pa dang bcas lta ste gzhan ni nor gyi nga rgyal gyis ni brnyas bcas dang //
T09D4152:29a-15: gcig gis bsod nams grags pa dag ni legs par ster la gzhan ni dngos po gcig nyid do //
T09D4152:29a-16: ring por sbyin bdag bdag ltos yon tan 'di rnams kyis ni slong ba po ni rnam par rgyal //
T09D4152:29a-17: gal te phyogs rnams yon tan me tog phreng bas dri zhim pa ni byed 'gyur na //
T09D4152:29a-18: gal te slar yang snying dga'i 'bras bus longs spyod phyir ni 'dod pa mi chung yod //
T09D4152:29a-19: grags pa chen po'i grib ma can ni nor gyi shing rnams skye bar 'gyur ba ni //
T09D4152:29a-20: de bas don du gnyer ba'i skye bo'i sa la nyi ma re rer gdab par mdzod //
T09D4152:29a-21: de nas drug cu'i lo rnams 'jig rten pa la rjes bstan nas //
T09D4152:29a-22: yon tan ldan pa'i don gnyer rnams la yang yang bde byas te //
T09D4152:29a-23: ku mu da ltar dkar ba'i grags pas phyogs rnams snang byas nas //
T09D4152:29a-24: stobs chen mi skyong de ni skye ba gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:29a-25: de ltar bud med nyid du gyur pa na yang
T09D4152:29a-26: bcom ldan 'das des rang gi sha rnams kyang sbyin
T09D4152:29a-27: par mdzad na mi'i lus thob par gyur pa su
T09D4152:29a-28: zhig ces bya ba'i phyi rol gyi dngos po la
T09D4152:29a-29: ltos pa byed par gyur zhes de bas na gtong
T09D4152:29a-30: ba po'i skye ba rab tu spro ba bskyed pa'i

T09D4152:29a-34: // / phyi rol gyur ba'i rdzas kyang dka' ba yis //
T09D4152:29a-35: dman pa rnams kyis yon tan can la dbul //
T09D4152:29a-36: dam pa rnams kyis dga' ba'i lus kyang ni //
T09D4152:29b-0: dud 'gro rnams la yang ni gtong bar @29b mdzad //
T09D4152:29b-1: 'di ltar rjes su thos bzhin pa yid 'phrog cing mthong bzhin pa ngo mtshar bar byed pa /
T09D4152:29b-2: byang phyogs su snying por gyur pa padma dang autpa
T09D4152:29b-3: la rnam par phye ba'i tshogs kyis skyed mos tshal
T09D4152:29b-4: mngon par brgyan par byas pa /
T09D4152:29b-5: rlung gis rnam par bskyod bzhin pa'i lha'i nye 'khor
T09D4152:29b-6: na rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang autpa la dang
T09D4152:29b-7: ldan pa'i rgyal po'i khab na /
T09D4152:29b-8: lha'i grong khyer gzhan dag gi shing pa ri dz'a
T09D4152:29b-9: ta ka skyes par gyur pa dang 'dra bar byang
T09D4152:29b-10: chub sems dpa' tshong dpon gyi rigs mdzes par gyur
T09D4152:29b-11: to // de nas tshong dpon gtso bo'i rgyu skyes
T09D4152:29b-12: pas rab tu dga' ba rnyed pas dga' ston gyi
T09D4152:29b-13: khyad par sna tshogs pa la 'jug pa'i khang pa'i
T09D4152:29b-14: phyogs gcig na rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rol cha
T09D4152:29b-15: rnams kyi sgra thos pas gar byed pa'i rma bya
T09D4152:29b-16: rnams kyis mngon par brgyan pa dang /
T09D4152:29b-17: sbrang rtsi byed pa kun nas 'dzag pa'i sbrang rtsi'i
T09D4152:29b-18: smyon chu bud med rnams kyi 'gram pa la mngon
T09D4152:29b-19: par chags par gyur pa dang /
T09D4152:29b-20: nor bu'i rang bzhin rta babs rnams la rnam pa
T09D4152:29b-21: sna tshogs pa'i dri zhim pa'i me tog gi phreng
T09D4152:29b-22: ba bcings par gyur pa dang /
T09D4152:29b-23: dga' bas smras pas 'khor gyi skye bo'i dga' ba dang ldan pa /
T09D4152:29b-24: grogs po rnams dang gnyen 'dun gyis kye bo rnams
T09D4152:29b-25: kun nas tshim par byas pa'i rang gi khang par
T09D4152:29b-26: don du gnyer ba rnams la sbyin gtong chen po
T09D4152:29b-28: tshong dpon bu yi 'phro bar byed pa'i 'od kyis ni //
T09D4152:29b-29: bsil ba'i 'od zer can gyi 'od ni kun nas
T09D4152:29b-30: 'phrog / gal te de bas rang gi skye bos
T09D4152:29b-31: rjes mthun pa // 'di yi ming ni zla 'od nyid ces btags par gyur //
T09D4152:29b-32: ri bong can sar bzhin du nyi ma re rer
T09D4152:29b-33: kun nas nye bar bsags bzhin pa'i 'od kyi mdzes
T09D4152:29b-34: pa dang ldan pa de thos pa dang tshul khrims
T09D4152:29b-35: la sogs pa'i yon tan gsal zhes bya ba'i bla
T09D4152:29b-36: ma gzhan dag la bstan bcos dang snyan dang gas
T09D4152:29b-37: kyi cha gzung ba'i don du phas gtad cing 'dug
T09D4152:29b-38: go // de nas de yi drung gnas la //
T09D4152:29b-39: thos pa dang ni shes rab kyis //
T09D4152:29b-40: yun mi ring ba'i dus nyid na //
T09D4152:29b-41: dbang po rnams rgyal de rgyal gyur //
T09D4152:29b-42: de yi shes rab mthong nas ni //
T09D4152:29b-43: slob ma kun pas khyad par can //
T09D4152:29b-44: legs smras rtsa gcig 'dri ba la //
T09D4152:29b-45: bla ma ngo mtshar dang bcas gyur //
T09D4152:29b-46: mun pa'i tshogs ni 'byed byed pa //
T09D4152:30a-1: dang lam min gsal byed pa //
T09D4152:30a-2: der ni rig pa lhag par mdzes //
T09D4152:30a-3: ku mu da 'byung zla chas bzhin //
T09D4152:30a-4: lha yi mig gis mthong nas ni //
T09D4152:30a-5: gter ni gang gang des thob pa'i //
T09D4152:30a-6: de de ma lus don gnyer la //
T09D4152:30a-7: dge ba thob pas sbyin par gyur //
T09D4152:30a-8: rang gi brtan pa 'dra ba des //
T09D4152:30a-9: de ltar sbyin pa sbyin par gyur //
T09D4152:30a-10: ji ltar don gnyer rnams kyi tshig / byin cig ces bya slar ma thos //
T09D4152:30a-11: de nas bla ma de'i slob ma brgya phrag lnga
T09D4152:30a-12: tsam po de rnams kyis zla 'od la 'di skad
T09D4152:30a-13: ces ae ma don du gnyer ba rnams kyi steng
T09D4152:30a-14: du khyod kyi brtse ba chen po bdag cag gis
T09D4152:30a-16: gal te khyod la don du gnyer ba su zhig
T09D4152:30a-17: srog rnams kyang bslangs par gyur na nges par de
T09D4152:30a-18: la de rnams khyod kyis sbyin par 'gyur zhes smras
T09D4152:30a-19: so // byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
T09D4152:30a-20: de ltar ma yin te slong ba po nyid ni
T09D4152:30a-21: brtse bas sbyin pa po las khyad par du 'phags
T09D4152:30a-23: gang zhig bdag nyid gnod byas nas //
T09D4152:30a-24: sbyin pa dge bar byed 'dod pas //
T09D4152:30a-25: slong ba'i sdug bsngal bzod pa ste //

T09D4152:30a-27: 'dir ni grags dang pha rol du //

T09D4152:30a-29: nor tsam ster ba'i sbyin pa po //

T09D4152:30a-31: don gnyer byin cig ces brjod cing //
T09D4152:30a-32: chung zhes bya bar mngon par brjod //
T09D4152:30a-33: sbyin bdag med ces rjod byed cing //
T09D4152:30a-34: des ni shin tu chung bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:30a-35: phan pa'i phyir ni mthar 'gro bas //
T09D4152:30a-36: sbyin bdag dpag bsam shing 'drar byed //
T09D4152:30a-37: gsal byas 'bras bus sngags pa ni //
T09D4152:30a-38: don gnyer nyid de ci ltar chung //
T09D4152:30a-39: gal te 'gro ba la ni rnam par sbyar phyir yod mi 'gyur //

T09D4152:30a-41: sbyin bdag rgya mtsho rnams ni 'byung ba ma yin te //

T09D4152:30a-44: ci zhig khyod sbyin bdag chen po'i 'bras bu 'dis ni mchod sbyin brgya byas pa'i dpal 'dod dam /
T09D4152:30a-45: 'o na sgyur ba nyid 'dod ces re zhig smra
T09D4152:30a-46: bar gyis shig / byang chub sems dpas smras pa
T09D4152:30a-47: / bdag gi blo ni rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa'i
T09D4152:30b-0: go 'phang mngon par @30b 'dod pa ma yin te
T09D4152:30b-1: / / re zhig khyed cag rnams kyis blta bar

T09D4152:30b-3: / / gi gzugs // 'du byed bzo bo rnams kyis byas gyur pa //

T09D4152:30b-6: chags dang sdang la rgyab phyogs pa'i //
T09D4152:30b-7: gdug pa'i bdag nyid 'chi bdag la //
T09D4152:30b-8: srid pa'i rtser yang 'gro bya min //
T09D4152:30b-9: srog chags rnams kyi tshe'i gnas pa //
T09D4152:30b-10: bskyod bzhin pa yang zad par 'gyur //
T09D4152:30b-11: ri mo'i las la rnam bkod pa //
T09D4152:30b-12: skad cig re rer skya ris bzhin //
T09D4152:30b-13: drag po mi rtag pa thob nas //
T09D4152:30b-14: dpal ni yun ring 'bar ba min //
T09D4152:30b-15: bzhi mdor gnas pa'i mar me yi //
T09D4152:30b-16: rtse mo rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin //
T09D4152:30b-17: yid byung rmongs pa kha cig ni //
T09D4152:30b-18: mi rtag seng ge mo bzhin mthong //
T09D4152:30b-19: de nyid blos byas gzhan dag ni //
T09D4152:30b-20: 'jigs pa med pas sbyang mo bzhin //
T09D4152:30b-21: bsod nams byas pa'i blo ldan gyi //
T09D4152:30b-23: gdugs kyi grib mas bsgribs pa ni //
T09D4152:30b-24: lam zhugs nyi mas gdung mi byed //
T09D4152:30b-25: rgyags dang nga rgyal mun pa'i phyir ni 'di dag rnams //
T09D4152:30b-26: thos pa'i sbrul ltar thob par dka' ba rtag tu nyid //
T09D4152:30b-27: skye dgu rnams kyi longs spyod skad cig gis 'jig pa //
T09D4152:30b-28: rjes su 'brel ba'i sgra yi bstan bcos bsten pa ltar //
T09D4152:30b-29: de ltar 'gro ba rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas shes nas //
T09D4152:30b-30: chu yi shugs kyis 'jig pa'i dbu ba'i tshogs ltar don med ba //
T09D4152:30b-31: rgyags dang nga rgyal gti mug tshogs ni bzlog pa la //
T09D4152:30b-32: skye med don du skyes rnams re zhig 'bad pa mdzod //
T09D4152:30b-33: de bas na bdag khyab pa nyid du 'jig rten
T09D4152:30b-34: pa'i sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i bla na med
T09D4152:30b-35: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod do
T09D4152:30b-36: // de nas slob ma de rnams rab tu dga'
T09D4152:30b-37: ba'i yid dang ldan pas slar 'di skad ces smras
T09D4152:30b-38: // so // mang pos smras pas ci zhig bya ste /
T09D4152:30b-39: smin ma'i dbus nas 'od zer 'phro ba mdzod spu'i ri bong mtshan ma 'dzin byed pa //
T09D4152:30b-40: mun pa rnam par rgyal ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis dkyil 'khor kun nas rgyas mdzad cing //
T09D4152:30b-41: 'byung 'gyur gzugs can bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan chen po khyod la mthong ba ste //
T09D4152:30b-42: gser ni bcad ltar 'od ldan lus 'dzin rnams la grol ba'i lam ni gsal byed 'gyur //
T09D4152:31a-0: bdag cag kyang rnam pa thams cad du @31a * //
T09D4152:31a-1: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub thob pa khyed kyi slob mar gyur cig ces zer ro //
T09D4152:31a-2: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
T09D4152:31a-3: dgon pa chen po sbrul mang ba //
T09D4152:31a-6: thabs ni su zhig 'dod mi byed //
T09D4152:31a-7: bdag nyid chen po 'dis bdud rtsi bgos skal bdag
T09D4152:31a-8: cag la zhal gyis bzhes so zhes bya ba rnam
T09D4152:31a-9: par bsams nas / dga' ba skyes nas song ba'i
T09D4152:31a-10: slob ma de rnams rang gi gnas su song ba
T09D4152:31a-11: par bsams nas / dang / dus gcig na tshang
T09D4152:31a-12: tshing du nye bar song ba'i byang chub sems dpas
T09D4152:31a-14: bdag gis don du gnyer ba'i skye bo'i don shin tu byas te /
T09D4152:31a-15: da ni rang gi sha dang khrag gis dud 'gro
T09D4152:31a-16: rnams tshim par bya'o zhes rnam bar bsams nas mtshon
T09D4152:31a-17: cha dang sbrang rtsi dang mar blangs te /
T09D4152:31a-18: gnyen 'dun rnams la ma smras par mtshan mo chen
T09D4152:31a-19: mo'i gos dang rjes su mthun pa'i thun mtshams su
T09D4152:31a-20: / yol bas mi 'dor bar byas pa'i phyogs gzhan
T09D4152:31a-21: la mthug par gyur pa'i mun pas mi snang bar
T09D4152:31a-22: gyur pa'i 'gro ba la khyim gzhan du rab tu
T09D4152:31a-23: 'bar bzhin pa'i mar me'i 'od kyis reg pa ngo
T09D4152:31a-24: gdong mdzes pa nyis 'gyur du gyur pa'i gzhon nu
T09D4152:31a-25: ma'i skye bo rnams yod pa dang /
T09D4152:31a-26: khyad par du rgyan 'dzin par byas pa sgeg pa
T09D4152:31a-27: dang bcas pa'i smin ma'i ljon shing gyen du byas
T09D4152:31a-28: pa mthong bas // rgod pa dang sgeg pa'i mchil
T09D4152:31a-29: mas bkug pa'i 'dod pa can skye bo'i snying gi
T09D4152:31a-30: nya dang ldan pa'i smad 'tshong ma rnams yod pa
T09D4152:31a-31: pa mthong bas // dang / grogs mo'i skye bos
T09D4152:31a-32: ster bzhin pa'i dus btab pa thos pas g-yeng ba
T09D4152:31a-33: med cing g-yo ba med pa'i mig dang ldan pa'i
T09D4152:31a-34: bar mi mo rnams yod pa dang /
T09D4152:31a-35: dga' ba'i skye bo rnams kyis dus btab pa la spro ba dang ldan pa yod pa dang /
T09D4152:31a-36: dri'i thig le byas pa de mthong ba la 'phros
T09D4152:31a-37: pas me long gi nang du lta ba rnam par
T09D4152:31a-38: rgod pa'i 'dod ma rnams yod pa dang /
T09D4152:31a-39: 'o ma'i rgyun gyi sgra thos bzhin pa'i ba glang
T09D4152:31a-40: gi rdzi mo rnams kyis be'us ldag pas g-yo bar
T09D4152:31a-41: byed pa'i dril chung lkog shal dang ldan pa'i ba
T09D4152:31a-42: rnams yod pa dang lam gyi bzhi mdor ldugs pa'i
T09D4152:31a-43: skyugs ldad kyis bde bar mig rnam par btsums par
T09D4152:31a-44: byas pa'i tshong dus kyi khyu mchog rnams kyis lam
T09D4152:31a-45: 'gags par gyur pa'i grong khyer gyi lam rnams yod
T09D4152:31b-0: pa la / rgyags pa dang bcas pa'i @31b thong
T09D4152:31b-1: gshol 'dzin pa'i 'gram pa dmar skya ltar dmar ba'i
T09D4152:31b-2: shar gyi ri bo'i rtse mor lhag par gnas pa'i
T09D4152:31b-3: ri bong can gyi mtshan ma yod pas /
T09D4152:31b-4: ku mu da'i tshogs rgyas pas skyed mos tshal dris bsgos pa'i mtshan mo'i dus su gyur pa na /
T09D4152:31b-5: gzhan dag khyim thab shi ba'i skra lo ltar mgo yegs pa dang /
T09D4152:31b-6: du bas 'od med par byas pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i shing dang ldan pa /
T09D4152:31b-7: gyen du lta ba'i sdig pa can gyi ce spyang
T09D4152:31b-8: mo rnams kyi skad kyis kha phye ba'i ngo gdong
T09D4152:31b-9: gi bu ga nas rnam par byung ba'i sreg blugs
T09D4152:31b-10: 'dzin pa'i snang bas gsal shing la gnas pa'i skyes
T09D4152:31b-11: bu rnams kyi dpung par nges par 'brel pa'i shas
T09D4152:31b-12: che bar gyur pa'i mi g-yo ba'i bya rgod dang
T09D4152:31b-13: kam ka gsal bar byas pa dang /
T09D4152:31b-14: shin tu drag pa'i bud med kyi tshogs kyis phyed
T09D4152:31b-15: tshig pa'i shing khang gi dbus su gnas pa'i skyes
T09D4152:31b-16: bu rnams kyis lus 'gags par byed bzhin pa dang
T09D4152:31b-17: / phyogs 'ga' zhig tu mtshan mo rgyu ba rnams
T09D4152:31b-18: la dogs par gyur pa'i me sha'i skra thos pas
T09D4152:31b-19: 'byung po'i tshogs kyi gdong nas kha chu'i thigs pa
T09D4152:31b-21: gzhan du mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi lag pa bdag
T09D4152:31b-22: gis bzung bar byas pa'i gri gug rnams kyis rnam
T09D4152:31b-23: par gcod bzhin pa'i skyes bu'i brla las rnam par
T09D4152:31b-24: 'dzag pa'i khrag gi rgyun gyis sa stengs kun nas
T09D4152:31b-25: bangs pa dang yang nas yang du sreg blugs 'dzin
T09D4152:31b-26: pa'i 'bar ba'i sor mo rnams kyis kun nas sdigs
T09D4152:31b-27: mdzub byed pa dang 'dra bar mun pa chen po
T09D4152:31b-28: bsal bar byas pa dang phyogs 'ga' zhig tu me
T09D4152:31b-29: tog kun da sar pa ltar dkar ba dang kun
T09D4152:31b-30: nas skya ba'i mgo bo'i thod pa dang ldan pa
T09D4152:31b-31: dang / phyogs gzhan du dur khrod gnas pa'i dge
T09D4152:31b-32: slong rnams kyis kun nas lta bzhin pa'i bud med
T09D4152:31b-33: rnams kyi lus la ce spyang gi tshogs kyis 'brel
T09D4152:31b-34: dang / ba dang / phyogs 'ga' zhig tu rig
T09D4152:31b-35: sngags smra ba rnams kyis bris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T09D4152:31b-36: mthar gnas pa'i phyogs skyong rnams la shubs nas bton
T09D4152:31b-37: pa'i dri ma med pa'i ral gri rnams kyi nang
T09D4152:31b-38: du son pa 'phro ba'i sreg blugs za ba'i gzugs
T09D4152:31b-39: brnyan gyis 'jigs su rung ba'i mthong ba dang ldan
T09D4152:31b-40: pa'i dur khrod chen por phyin par gyur to //
T09D4152:32a-0: byams pa'i sngags kyis lus bsrung bar byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la der @32a * //
T09D4152:32a-1: sha za ba'i bud med kyi skye bos tho 'tshams par ma nus so //
T09D4152:32a-2: bdag nyid chen po de yang dur khrod kyi phyogs
T09D4152:32a-3: gcig na ce sbyang rnams kyis bkug pas rnam par
T09D4152:32a-4: skyong ba'i lto ba'i rgyu ma'i dra ba dang sha
T09D4152:32a-5: dang rtsib ma'i mtshams dri ma can gyis gsal ba
T09D4152:32a-6: dang / rlung gis bskyod pa'i ro bsregs pa'i thal
T09D4152:32a-7: ba'i chas kun nas skya bar byas pa'i skra lo
T09D4152:32a-9: khras mchu 'thog pa nyid kyis snang bar gyur cing
T09D4152:32a-10: rnam par 'gyur ba'i so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa
T09D4152:32a-11: shi ba'i bud med mthong nas yid byung ba der
T09D4152:32a-12: song ba'i mi g-yo ba'i lta ba can gyis 'di
T09D4152:32a-13: skad ces / kye ma 'dod chags can rnams kyis ring po ma yin par mthong ba'i blo ste /
T09D4152:32a-14: gang rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i chags bral gyi bud
T09D4152:32a-15: med kyi lus la yang chags pa skye bar 'gyur
T09D4152:32a-16: zhes smras so // yid 'phrog rnam par mi g-yo'i mig can gang la ni //
T09D4152:32a-17: dga' ba'i skye bos sin dhu ra yi khyad par byas //
T09D4152:32a-18: da ring 'dir ni sgeg mo'i gdong can de nyid la //
T09D4152:32a-19: slar yang ce spyang gis ni rkang 'dzin byed //
T09D4152:32a-20: gang dag rgod pas cung zad 'od ni 'byung 'gyur ba //
T09D4152:32a-21: skye bo 'dod chags can gyi yid ni 'phrog byed pa //
T09D4152:32a-22: khyi dang khva tas gcod pa rnam par rnying ba'i mchu //
T09D4152:32a-23: so rnams de nyid rnam par 'gyur ba nyid du song //
T09D4152:32a-24: gang dag dga' bos rnam par mthong zhing dgar 'gyur te //
T09D4152:32a-25: rkang pa drug bcas chu skyes 'dab ma ltar ni mdzes //
T09D4152:32a-26: mig gnyis bya rnams kyis ni sha khrag 'phrog byas pa //
T09D4152:32a-27: de dag sbrul gyi tshang dang rjes su zlos pa can //
T09D4152:32a-28: yun ring gang dag lo ma ltar 'jam 'od ldan pa //
T09D4152:32a-29: smug rtsi dang bcas grogs mo'i skye bos byas gyur pa //
T09D4152:32a-30: 'gram pa'i rus pa lhag ma can ni de dag gi //
T09D4152:32a-31: ma dha ka ltar skya ba da ltar gang du song //
T09D4152:32a-32: de bas btsums par byas pa'i mig dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu ma'i //
T09D4152:32a-33: ba spu'i tshogs ni langs pa gang zhig dga' bos reg pa ni //
T09D4152:32a-34: nu 'bur gnyis ni 'gyur ba'i khrag gis shin tu dmar ba yi //
T09D4152:32a-35: de la khyi so rnams kyis de ring kun nas 'bigs par byed //
T09D4152:32a-36: dga' bo'i dbung rgyan gyis ni skra lo'i me tog lhung ba ni //
T09D4152:32a-37: gang zhig btsums par byas pa'i mig can 'khyud nas bde bar nyal //
T09D4152:32a-38: de ni dur khrod sa yi mal stan la ni nyal bzhin pa //
T09D4152:32b-0: glo bur @32b 'ongs nas shin tu dga' mar ci ste 'khyud mi byed //
T09D4152:32b-1: rgyus pa rus pa sha dang khrag dang rgyu ma'i rang bzhin las //
T09D4152:32b-2: bud med cas bya mang ba'i skyon gyi sbrul gyis khyab 'di la //
T09D4152:32b-3: yang dag ma yin kun tu brtags pas nyams pa'i skye bo 'di //
T09D4152:32b-4: 'dod chags dang bral dngos po la ni don med chags par 'gyur //
T09D4152:32b-5: de rnams skye ngan tshogs kyi rnon po'i mda' rnams kyis mi 'bigs //
T09D4152:32b-6: brtan pa de zhi ba de'i longs spyod de rnams nyid //
T09D4152:32b-7: bud med dug ni ljon shing gi ni rnam spangs nas //
T09D4152:32b-8: gang dag zhi ba'i 'bras bu can gyi dka' thub nags rnams gnas //
T09D4152:32b-9: de nas der du ba'i phung po mngon par 'thul ba'i mchod sbyin gyi shing dang ldan pa /
T09D4152:32b-10: mi'i rkang mar yongs pas dgang blugs nges par lhung
T09D4152:32b-11: zhing 'bar bar sol ba'i phung po rnams las sva
T09D4152:32b-12: ra sva ra'i sgra 'byung ba dang /
T09D4152:32b-13: bhanda ka'i bya'i skad mngon spyod kyi sngags brtsams pa'i
T09D4152:32b-14: las dang ldan pa'i dur khrod kyi mchod sbyin la
T09D4152:32b-15: mtshon cha rnon pos yan lag rnams kun nas bzhogs
T09D4152:32b-16: te / sbrang rtsi dang ni mar dag gis //
T09D4152:32b-17: 'dzag pa'i chu yi rgyun gyis brlan //
T09D4152:32b-18: grog sbur rnams kyis zos bzhin pa //
T09D4152:32b-19: bdag nyid bdag nyid kyis ni 'di //
T09D4152:32b-20: lnga bdag phyugs nyid du ni khyer //
T09D4152:32b-21: der yang dri mas rtsub pa'i ril bur byas pa'i
T09D4152:32b-22: go cha ltar dri mar bcas pa'i 'od glang po
T09D4152:32b-23: che'i khrag gis nye bar gos pa'i ri dags kyi
T09D4152:32b-24: bdag po'i sen mo ltar 'khyog cing dmar zhing rno
T09D4152:32b-26: lto 'phye khros pa'i mig dang 'dra ba'i mig can /
T09D4152:32b-27: lcags kyi tsher ma ltar rtsub pa'i sen mo rtsub
T09D4152:32b-28: cing dngar ba ma yin pa'i skad kyis bya'i chogs
T09D4152:32b-29: gzhan rnams kun nas skrag par byas pa /
T09D4152:32b-30: bya rnams kyis sra ba'i 'dab ma'i sgras 'gro ba kun du mtshon bzhin pa /
T09D4152:32b-31: mthon por 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i 'dab chags ni /
T09D4152:32b-32: ri bo ltar ni mthon po'i gzugs can de yi phrag par bya des ni //
T09D4152:32b-33: glo bur du ni mngon par 'dzeg par byas nas mtho yor ltar //
T09D4152:32b-34: autpa la chen po'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs mig ni gdon byas nas //
T09D4152:32b-35: khrag gis khyab pa'i mig rdzi'i ri mo slar yang lhung bar gyur //
T09D4152:32b-36: phrug pa rje skyong don du mnyes gshin pas ni reg byas ba //
T09D4152:32b-37: ri dags mo ni mngon par phyogs par stag la yang ni rab tu 'gro //
T09D4152:33a-1: snying rje zhes bya gzhan don sgrub pa'i phyir //
T09D4152:33a-2: skyed byed byang chub sems dpa' la ni ji ltar gnod par byed //
T09D4152:33a-3: de nas nam mkha' la 'gro ba des byang chub sems dpa' la dris par gyur to //
T09D4152:33a-4: nges par bdag gi 'don bzhin pa'i mig 'di la
T09D4152:33a-5: khyed kyi sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong ngam
T09D4152:33a-6: zhes so // byang chub sems dpas smras pa //
T09D4152:33a-7: gal te gang gis kyang mi dgos pa'i bdag gi
T09D4152:33a-8: lus zad par song bar gyur na de nas bdag
T09D4152:33a-10: da lta'i nye par dgos bar gyur ba sems can
T09D4152:33a-11: du ma rnams kyis mthong nas mchog tu dga' ba
T09D4152:33a-12: bdag gis nyams su myong zhes zer ro //
T09D4152:33a-13: gal te lus po 'di ni sdug bsngal rnams kyi rten //
T09D4152:33a-14: yan lag can rnams la ni 'grub pa nyid du 'gro //
T09D4152:33a-15: che ming mang 'dod rnams la de ltar rin chen ldan //
T09D4152:33a-16: 'di las gzhan du lto 'phye bzhin du skyon mang ngo //
T09D4152:33a-17: de nas byang chub sems dpas sha za rnams kyis
T09D4152:33a-18: ji ltar ba de bar bdag la zo shig ces
T09D4152:33a-20: bdag nyid ri dags dang 'dra bar ston zhing 'dug go //
T09D4152:33a-21: de na bya rnams yang dag 'ongs pa la //
T09D4152:33a-22: rgyun mi 'chad pa'i skad kyis 'jigs byas pa //
T09D4152:33a-23: de yi sha ni cig car zad 'gyur te //
T09D4152:33a-24: sems kyi brtan pa la ni rgyab phyogs min //
T09D4152:33a-25: de nas de yi lus ni yon tan me tog
T09D4152:33a-26: gi / dri yis lhag par dri zhim byas nas
T09D4152:33a-27: srog rnams kyis // ji ltar yang ni rnam par spangs te skyes pa yi //
T09D4152:33a-28: sdug bsngal gyis khyab bya rnams ltung ba'i gnas shing bzhin //
T09D4152:33a-29: de nas nus pa'i ri'i rtse mo nas shin tu
T09D4152:33a-30: ring bar kun nas longs spyod pa'i bung ba bzhin
T09D4152:33a-31: du kun da ltar dkar skar ma'i bdag po spangs
T09D4152:33a-32: nas mtshan mo song ba la /
T09D4152:33a-33: bzlas pa'i me tog rtse mo dang 'dra bar nyi
T09D4152:33a-34: ma'i gdong gis nye bar 'brel bar gyur pa'i shar
T09D4152:33a-35: gyi ri'i rtse mor nyi ma yod pa la nyin
T09D4152:33a-36: mor byed pa'i 'od zer rnams kyi lag pas yang
T09D4152:33a-37: dag par reg pa'i bde ba dang 'dra bar mngon
T09D4152:33a-38: par gsal bar gyur pa'i padma'i sdong bu'i tsher ma
T09D4152:33a-39: rnams kyis kha spu langs shing gnyid dang bral ba'i
T09D4152:33a-40: padma'i bud med rnams yod pa la srog chags ku
T09D4152:33a-41: ra ra rnams kyi skad rjes su byed pa'i rnam
T09D4152:33a-42: par grol bar gyur pa'i grong khyer gyi sgo dang
T09D4152:33b-0: sgo glegs yod pa la gnyid @33b sad nas /
T09D4152:33b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'dod pa'i dogs pas yid
T09D4152:33b-2: sdug bsngal bar gyur pa grogs po dang 'khor gyi
T09D4152:33b-3: skye bo dang / gnyen 'dun gyi chogs dang bcas
T09D4152:33b-4: pa bu tshol bas sems g-yengs pa de dang de
T09D4152:33b-6: bdag gi bu de mtshan mo kun nas 'khor zhing sbrul gyis sos btab gyur tam ci //
T09D4152:33b-7: 'on te snying rje dang bral so sor 'gugs byed rnams kyis rgyan rnams phrogs nas bsad //
T09D4152:33b-8: sa yi dbang phyug mche ba can gyi mche bas brang du kun nas brgyab pas zad par gyur //
T09D4152:33b-9: bcings pa'i ka ba bcag par byas nas gshin rje'i grong khyer ci zhig song bar gyur //
T09D4152:33b-10: rim gyis nya bar song nas dur khrod kyi phyogs
T09D4152:33b-11: gcig tu bya rgod rnams kyis sha la gcod par
T09D4152:33b-12: byed bzhin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa gang
T09D4152:33b-13: gis kyang mngon par shes nas skye bo des tshong

T09D4152:43a-10: di ring gzhon nu'i yon tan rjes mthun pa //

T09D4152:43a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dod mtshon rnams
T09D4152:43a-13: thams cad gsal bas kun nas mtshon bzhin pa'i 'bras
T09D4152:43a-14: bu chen po dang ldan pa /
T09D4152:43a-15: shing gzhon nu ltar skyed bzhin pa'i me tog drung
T09D4152:43a-16: ba nyi ma re re zhing don du gnyer ba'i
T09D4152:43a-18: longs spyod chen po'i snying po la nye bar longs spyod pa /
T09D4152:43a-19: byes su song ba zlog pa'i rim pas dga' bo'i
T09D4152:43a-20: grogs po ltar lang tsho sar pas kun nas khyab
T09D4152:43a-21: pa ni / 'jig rten sdug bsngal byed rnams la //
T09D4152:43a-22: sdug bsngal drag po byed 'gyur ba //
T09D4152:43a-23: lus kyi phyed ni skam byed pa'i //
T09D4152:43a-24: nad kyis 'di ni nyams par byed //
T09D4152:43a-25: de ni nad kyis cung zad cig / kun nas skye bo nyid du gyur //
T09D4152:43a-26: mtshan mo mun pa 'jigs pa la //
T09D4152:43a-27: phyed ni zad pa'i zla ba bzhin //
T09D4152:43a-28: ji lta ji ltar rim gyis de'i //
T09D4152:43a-29: lus kyi phyed ni zad 'gyur ba //
T09D4152:43a-30: de lta de ltar 'jig rten gyi //
T09D4152:43a-32: yon tan can rnams phun tshogs rgud //
T09D4152:43a-33: bde sdug byed par 'gyur rnams la //
T09D4152:43a-34: skye dgu ma ltar 'gro ba ste //
T09D4152:43a-35: bde sdug nyams su myong ba can //
T09D4152:43a-36: de nas rgyal po des mya ngan gyi zug rngus
T09D4152:43a-37: snying zad par nyi ma re re zhing lus phyed
T09D4152:43a-38: 'grib par gyur pa'i phan 'dod mthong nas sman pa
T09D4152:43a-40: gang gis bdag gi rigs rgyud 'di rnams rnam par
T09D4152:43a-41: chad par mi 'gyur ba de ltar 'bad par mdzod
T09D4152:43a-42: cig ; khyed rnams nyon cig / bdag gis dgra rnams thams cad pham par byas pa ste //
T09D4152:43a-43: nor rnams byin te grags pa yang ni rjes su bskyangs //
T09D4152:43a-44: 'dir yang mi skyong dpal ni sras la rnam bkod nas //
T09D4152:43a-45: bdag zhi ba yi ched du dka' thub nags su 'gro 'gyur ram //
T09D4152:43b-0: de nas byang chub @43b sems dpas nad dang rgas pa dang /
T09D4152:43b-1: 'chi ba dang yang 'brel ba'i gtam gyis nang mi'i
T09D4152:43b-2: tshogs dang bcas pa'i yab kyi yid skyo ba bskyed
T09D4152:43b-3: cing 'dug go // lto 'phye rnams kyi tshang pa yi //
T09D4152:43b-4: nad rnams kyis 'khrugs lus la ni //
T09D4152:43b-5: bde ba bsams bzhin ci phyir 'di //
T09D4152:43b-7: mi bde ba yi tshor ba kun nas khyab pa ni //
T09D4152:43b-8: mchi ma dang ldan gnyen rnams kyis ni mthong gyur pa //
T09D4152:43b-9: gang tshe nad kyi mda' rnams kyis ni 'bigs 'gyur ba //
T09D4152:43b-10: de tshe mi ni srid pa las ni skyong bar gyur //
T09D4152:43b-11: nad kyis btab pas rid byas yan lag srog shing ni //
T09D4152:43b-12: lam du kun nas 'dre zhing ldog pas khyab pa la //
T09D4152:43b-13: kha ba'i sman ni 'thungs pas mthong nas 'jigs ldan pa'i //
T09D4152:43b-14: skye bo'i yul gyi 'dod pa rnam par bzlog par gyur //
T09D4152:43b-15: dbang po rnams dang dran pa'i stobs ni nye bar gdung ba 'di //
T09D4152:43b-16: lus can rnams kyi spyi bor rkang pa rnam par bzhag nas ni //
T09D4152:43b-17: rab tu skye bar 'dod pa'i rtogs pas nga rgyal rgas pa la //
T09D4152:43b-18: skra dkar g-yo bas 'bad pa dang bcas rgod pa 'dra bar byed //
T09D4152:43b-19: dbang po rnams kyis sgrib pa chen po nye bar byed pa 'di //
T09D4152:43b-20: rgas pa rlung gi ri dags ltar ni ring po nas mthong nas //
T09D4152:43b-21: skyes bu'i lang tsho'i rgyags pa 'dod pa dang ni lhan cig tu //
T09D4152:43b-22: rab tu 'bros par 'gyur te 'jigs pas khyab pa'i ri dags bzhin //
T09D4152:43b-23: yan lag can rnams kyis ni lhod pa nyid du nye bar song ba 'di //
T09D4152:43b-24: yul rnams nye bar longs spyod kun nas stobs chung dbang por ldan //
T09D4152:43b-25: rgas pa 'dis ni kun nas lhag par zhon pa'i btsan thabs kyis //
T09D4152:43b-26: gzugs ni sgur bar byed de gzhu rgyud kyis ni gzhu bzhin no //
T09D4152:43b-27: tshul min gtso bo gang nyid du ni nges gnas byed pa zhes //
T09D4152:43b-28: kye ma lus 'di de nyid rgas pa nyid du ji ltar 'byed //
T09D4152:43b-29: gang gi yun ring 'og tu 'dug pa 'bras bu rnams ster ba //
T09D4152:43b-30: yal ga can de la ni su zhig dgra sta ltung bar 'dod //
T09D4152:43b-31: rnon po skyon gyi mda' rnams kyis ni ji ltar yang ni drag po'i yid la gdung byed pa'i //
T09D4152:43b-32: ring gnas gnad la byed ni nges gdung min nam gang phyir gson po bzhin du gnas par byed //
T09D4152:43b-33: gang du yang ni yun ring gnas pa'i shi ba'i rngon pas 'di ni rnam par rgyas byed pa //
T09D4152:44a-0: sems kyi ri dags khyed ni rgas pa'i snying @44a * //
T09D4152:44a-1: ni ril po las ni ji ltar 'da' bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:44a-2: de nas dman pa rnams kyis gnas dben pa la
T09D4152:44a-3: skyes bu'i seng ga dang 'dra bar ying [?] pa
T09D4152:44a-5: sman rnams yod par gyur pa rnams la yang 'dab
T09D4152:44a-6: chags shang shang de'u'i sha med pas mar chen po
T09D4152:44a-7: smin pa yang 'di nas rab tu zhi bar byed
T09D4152:44a-8: par nus par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T09D4152:44a-9: de bas na 'dir ci zhig bya zhes zer ro //
T09D4152:44a-10: de nas rgyal po des bya 'dzin pa la mkhas
T09D4152:44a-11: pa'i bya shor ba gnyis bos nas bka' bsgo ba
T09D4152:44a-12: / bya shang shang de'u gang nas kyang khyed cag
T09D4152:44a-13: gis long shig / de'i phyir nor chen po rab
T09D4152:44a-14: tu byin pas khyed cag la sbyar bar bya ste
T09D4152:44a-15: / / gzhan du na bya shor ba'i tshogs thams cad nyid bskrad par bya zhes zer ro //
T09D4152:44a-16: de nas bya shor ba de dag gis rgyal po de la zhus par gyur pa /
T09D4152:44a-17: lha lag rgya mtsho'i 'gram na yal ga can gzhan
T09D4152:44a-18: rnams kyi bdag po dang 'dra ba spre'u'i chu zhes
T09D4152:44a-19: bya ba'i shing chen po yod de /
T09D4152:44a-20: der yang mi skad smra ba'i shang shang de'u rnams
T09D4152:44a-21: so sor gnas pa ste de rnams kyang rgyal po
T09D4152:44a-22: la nye bar mkho ba'i tshogs pas 'dzin par nus
T09D4152:44a-23: kyi gzhan du ni ma yin zhes gsol to //
T09D4152:44a-25: gang dang gang gi dgos pa de dang de thams
T09D4152:44a-26: cad bdag gi mdzod 'di nas nye bar long shig
T09D4152:44a-27: ces zer ro // ji ltar lhas bka' stsal pa zhes rgyal po'i bka' thob nas //
T09D4152:44a-28: de nas bya ba yo byad 'dzin par byas pa de dag ni //
T09D4152:44a-29: de'i tshogs dang chu bo de dang de rnams rgal byas nas //
T09D4152:44a-30: yal ga can de'i yal ga 'bras bu can rnams 'dud pa che ba ni //
T09D4152:44a-31: rgya mtsho'i 'gram skyes gyen lta'i gdong can dag gis mthong bar gyur //
T09D4152:44a-32: rim gyis kyang kun nas der phyin nas gas pa'i
T09D4152:44a-33: nya phyis kha spyod kha phye nas byung ba'i mu
T09D4152:44a-34: tig gi rdog ma rnams kyis khyab pa'i dkar po'i
T09D4152:44a-35: 'gram dang ldan pa'i dbus su rab tu rgyug pa'i
T09D4152:44a-37: mig sman gyi phye ma'i tshogs ltar sngo ba'i chu dang ldan pa /
T09D4152:44a-38: rlabs chen po'i rgyun gyis la pa ka'i me tog
T09D4152:44a-39: bskul bas kun nas bsres pa'i dbu ba'i phreng bas
T09D4152:44a-40: bskor bar byas pa'i 'gram gyi ri mo can /
T09D4152:44a-41: shin tu myur ba'i gzings 'gro bas sgra bskyod pa /
T09D4152:44a-42: nang du chu srin kun nas 'khor bas kun nas chag pa'i gzhon nu ma'i byi ru can /
T09D4152:44b-0: @44b chu'i glang po rnams kyi snas mngon par brdungs
T09D4152:44b-1: pa'i g-yo ba'i dung gi tshogs dang ldan pa dang
T09D4152:44b-2: / sbrul mchog rnams kyi nor bu stong gi 'od rnams kyis sa 'og snang bar byas pa dang /
T09D4152:44b-3: mkha' lding gi gshog pa gnyis bskyod pas rlabs chen po'i tshogs rnam par 'khrug par byas pa /
T09D4152:44b-4: shin tu yid 'phrog pa'i na li ge la dang
T09D4152:44b-5: pa na sa dang ka pun ta dang ba ku
T09D4152:44b-6: la dang / pun na ka dang /
T09D4152:44b-13: n+ya gro dha'i shing gi nags rnams kyi mtha' mi mngon pa dang /
T09D4152:44b-14: mtha' med pa'i ngo mtshar sna tshogs pa'i gzhi dang /
T09D4152:44b-15: ke ta ka'i tshogs kyi me tog rnams reg pas
T09D4152:44b-16: dri zhim pa'i rlung gi stobs kyis tsan dan gyi
T09D4152:44b-17: shing rnam par 'khrugs pas nye bar sbas pa dang
T09D4152:44b-18: / ma la ya'i ri bo las 'bab pa'i dus
T09D4152:44b-19: kyi chus dag par byas pa'i brag gi dkyil na
T09D4152:44b-20: nye bar gnas pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa pho mo
T09D4152:44b-21: gnyis kyis lta bar gyur pa'i rgya mtsho chen po
T09D4152:44b-22: la lta bar byed pa'i bya ba gnyis kyis 'ongs
T09D4152:44b-23: / nas mthong ste / shing gi tshogs de la
T09D4152:44b-24: nges par 'brel ba'i shang shang de'u rnams yal ga
T09D4152:44b-26: padma rnams kyis bkab pa'i chu ni che ba la //
T09D4152:44b-27: 'gram gyi mtha' yi phyogs na dung rgyan rnams kyis ni //
T09D4152:44b-28: mal ni chen po gos kyis kun nas bskor byas pa'i //
T09D4152:44b-29: yid du 'ong ba dri zhim po ni bting bar gyur //
T09D4152:44b-30: rgya skyegs khu bas mtshan ma'i shel bzhin shin tu dmar //
T09D4152:44b-31: chang gi rlung gi rlabs ni 'byung bar byas pa ni //
T09D4152:44b-32: rgya chen gser gyi snod rnams la ni de dag gis //
T09D4152:44b-33: chang ni blugs shing 'dug pa nyid du gnas par gyur //
T09D4152:44b-34: der yang bya ba gnyis song ba la shing de
T09D4152:44b-35: las babs nas shang shang de'u gnyis ro myang bas
T09D4152:44b-36: bkug bzhin pa'i rnyi dang ldan pa /
T09D4152:44b-37: mal de la 'brel nas chang de myang zhing 'dug par gyur to //
T09D4152:44b-38: myangs nas kyang myos pa'i dbang gis dran pa rnam
T09D4152:44b-39: par rmongs pas kun nas 'phur mi nus shing de
T09D4152:44b-40: nyid du nyal bar gyur to //
T09D4152:44b-41: de nas sna tshogs gos can mal gyi dbus su nyal bzhin pa //
T09D4152:44b-42: cung zad btsums par byas pa'i mig can kun nas btud pa'i gdong //
T09D4152:44b-43: myur bar 'ongs nas bya 'dzin pa la mkhas pa de dag gis //
T09D4152:45a-0: rim gyis rtogs par byas nas bya ni gnyis @45a * //
T09D4152:45a-2: yul gyi bde ba la ni nges 'brel yid ldan pa'i //
T09D4152:45a-3: rang gi phan dang gnod pa 'jug pa rtog byed pa'i //
T09D4152:45a-4: mod la lci ba'i sdug bsngal rjes su 'brel ba'i rgyu //
T09D4152:45a-5: bag med ci zhig bzhin du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T09D4152:45a-6: de nas shang shang de'u de dag rim gyis chang
T09D4152:45a-7: 'thungs pa'i myos pa dang bral nas bya shor ba
T09D4152:45a-8: gnyis po de la smras par gyur pa /
T09D4152:45a-9: bzhin bzangs dag khyed cag gis bdag cag dgos pa
T09D4152:45a-10: ci zhig gi phyir 'dzin pa smra bar gyis shig
T09D4152:45a-11: / bya shor ba dag gis kyang gtam de smras
T09D4152:45a-12: par gyur to // de nas shang shang de'u gcig gis 'di skad ces smras so //
T09D4152:45a-13: bya shang shang de'u 'di bzung nas re zhig khyed
T09D4152:45a-14: gnyis sdod cig / ji srid du bdag gis so
T09D4152:45a-15: dha zhes bya ba'i sman bcud kyis len gyi gtso
T09D4152:45a-16: bor gyur pa yong par bya yis //
T09D4152:45a-17: des mar btso bar byas nas rgyal po'i sras de la sbyin par bya ste /
T09D4152:45a-18: de 'thungs pas kyang 'di shin tu skyes bu'i tshe dang ldan pa dang /
T09D4152:45a-19: gzugs dang stobs kyis pha rol rnam par gnon pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
T09D4152:45a-20: rgyal po de yang dge ba la sbyar bar 'gyur ro zhes khas blangs pas /
T09D4152:45a-21: bya shor ba de dag gi nang nas shang shang
T09D4152:45a-22: de'u cig song nas sman de blangs te myur bar
T09D4152:45a-23: 'ongs te bya shor ba de dag la gtad cing
T09D4152:45a-24: 'dug go // de nas kyang bya de dag der
T09D4152:45a-25: 'di skad smras nas de sman de blangs nas rgyal
T09D4152:45a-26: po'i gan du nye bar 'ongs te shang shang de'u'i
T09D4152:45a-27: phrin de smras nas sman de sman pa rnams la
T09D4152:45a-29: rgyal po des kyang nor sbyin pa chen pos bya
T09D4152:45a-30: shor ba de dag yang dag par mgu bar mdzad
T09D4152:45a-31: do // de nas 'byung po'i rig pa la yongs
T09D4152:45a-32: su mthong ba nye bar spyod pa chen pos sman
T09D4152:45a-33: pa de rnams kyis bcud kyis len te /
T09D4152:45a-34: kun nas btsos te byang chub sems dpa' la dngul
T09D4152:45a-35: gyi snod du bzhag nas btung ba'i phyir nye bar
T09D4152:45a-37: grong khyer de dang shin tu ring ba ma yin
T09D4152:45a-38: par dbugs byung ba'i ri dags kyi tshogs kyis lhag
T09D4152:45a-39: par gnas pa'i shing lo'i khang pa'i nye 'khor dang
T09D4152:45a-40: ldan pa dang / shing du ma'i me tog rnams
T09D4152:45a-41: kyis dri zhim par byas pa'i rlung gis rnam par
T09D4152:45a-42: bskyod pa'i padma'i tshogs dang ldan pa dang /
T09D4152:45b-0: dka' thub kyi nor can gyi skye bos khyab pa'i dka' thub kyi nags @45b chen po yod de /
T09D4152:45b-1: der yang rang sangs rgyas so sor gnas pa des lha'i mig gis byang chub sems dpa' mthong ste /
T09D4152:45b-2: gzhon nu phan 'dod pa 'di sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par 'dod pa ste /
T09D4152:45b-3: bdag la yang nad 'di nyid yod de bas na
T09D4152:45b-4: bcud kyis len gyis btsos pa'i mar 'di la bslang
T09D4152:45b-6: des kyang kho bo cag la de rab tu byin nas nad de las grol bar 'gyur to //
T09D4152:45b-7: sbyin pa'i 'bras bu chen po yang sbyor bar 'gyur zhes rnam par bsams nas /
T09D4152:45b-8: bud med mchog gi mig gi 'bras bu ltar nag pa'i //
T09D4152:45b-9: lhung bzed bzung nas de ni chos gos rnam 'phyang ba ;
T09D4152:45b-10: / shugs kyis mkha' las kun nas bsams te mkha' lding ltar //
T09D4152:45b-11: sa skyong khyim ni mdzes par rnam par bzhugs par gyur //
T09D4152:45b-12: sa skyong ba yi khyim der rab tu zhugs nas ni //
T09D4152:45b-13: che ba nyid kyis sgo srung rnams kyis ma mthong bar //
T09D4152:45b-14: zhi ba nye bar 'ongs nas 'gro la phan 'dod pa //
T09D4152:45b-15: byang chub tu ni rtse gcig phan 'dod la ni gsungs //
T09D4152:45b-16: dpag med 'od can sa skyong sras lags bdag la yang //
T09D4152:45b-17: nad ni chen po don min lus ni skams byed pa //
T09D4152:45b-18: 'di ni rab tu dang bas bzhu ba'i sems kyis / ni //
T09D4152:45b-19: mar de las ni bdag cag la yang rab sbyin mdzod //
T09D4152:45b-20: de nas thub pa de la de ni dang ba ldan //
T09D4152:45b-21: nad de gus pa'i dbang gis bsam bar ma byas shing //
T09D4152:45b-22: dga' bas sa la pus mo gnyis ni btsugs byas nas //
T09D4152:45b-23: mar de bdag nyid kyis ni gus bcas phul bar gyur //
T09D4152:45b-24: ji lta ji ltar 'dis ni dri med 'di 'thungs pa //
T09D4152:45b-25: rim gyi rim gyis snying rje can ni thub pa che //
T09D4152:45b-26: rtag par rtag tu spobs pa rnyed pa phan 'dod can //
T09D4152:45b-27: de lta de ltar 'jigs pa bzhin du nad kyis btang //
T09D4152:45b-28: de nas nad dang rnam par bral ba'i byang chub
T09D4152:45b-29: sems dpa' de mthong nas de la nyis 'gyur gyi
T09D4152:45b-31: ral gri phyis ltar sngo ba'i nam mkha'i dkyil du song nas rang sangs rgyas //
T09D4152:45b-32: nyin mo byed pa 'od zer 'bar ba kun nas reg pa ste //
T09D4152:45b-33: me ni 'od rnams 'byung ba skad cig gis ne sprul pa ste //
T09D4152:45b-34: bar chad med par dkar ba'i nor bu chag ltar dri ma med //
T09D4152:45b-35: chu ni dpung pas chu gter bzhin du sprul pa nyid du gyur //
T09D4152:46a-0: de nas bdag nyid chen po des rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis byang chub sems @46a * //
T09D4152:46a-1: dpa' mdun du song ba'i skye bos phyag btsal bar
T09D4152:46a-2: gyur cing dka' thub kyi gnas de nyid du log
T09D4152:46a-3: par gyur to // dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa'i
T09D4152:46a-4: phan 'dod gdan la 'dug ste gus pa dang bcas
T09D4152:46a-5: par nye bar gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de la
T09D4152:46a-6: phan pa tshol zhing chos las ma 'da' ba'i gtam
T09D4152:46a-8: rang sangs rgyas ni de la yang //
T09D4152:46a-9: gus bcas mar ni phul ba la //
T09D4152:46a-10: bdag gi lus ni skad cig des //
T09D4152:46a-11: sdug bsngal med cing nad med gyur //
T09D4152:46a-12: sbyin pa'i zhing gi me tog dang //
T09D4152:46a-14: de ltar khyed rnams kyis shes nas //
T09D4152:46a-16: don gnyer nyid kyis bdag cag chung bar gyur te
T09D4152:46a-17: 'di la shin tu dge ba 'byung gyur cig /
T09D4152:46a-18: ngo tsha ba yi bud med bdag cag gis ni
T09D4152:46a-19: btang ste grags pa'i bud med bsten cing yun ring
T09D4152:46a-20: du // 'di ni yang dag bsams bzhin rang gi

T09D4152:46a-22: du // pa // grogs po dang ni don gnyer

T09D4152:46a-26: rnams ni gang zhig bsal byas na //

T09D4152:46a-32: // // gang zhig sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pas sa la byang chub sems //
T09D4152:46a-33: sems can don du brtson pa'i blo can rim bzhin sbyang bar byed //
T09D4152:46a-34: gnas la don gnyer bcom ldan 'das de don dam mkhyen pa ni //
T09D4152:46a-35: dge ba'i bshen [*bshes?] gnyen zhes bya de ni bde bar gshegs pas gsungs //
T09D4152:46a-36: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de la legs so zhes
T09D4152:46a-37: bya ba mngon par bsgrub par byas nas skye bo'i
T09D4152:46a-38: tshogs de sbyin pa la rtse gcig pa byung bar
T09D4152:46a-39: gyur to // de ltar na bdag nyid kyi sdug bsngal la yang ma brtsis shing /
T09D4152:46a-40: bcom ldan 'das de byang chub sems dpar gyur pa
T09D4152:46a-41: na gzhan don nyid mdzad do zhes bya ba rnam
T09D4152:46a-42: par bsams nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rtag
T09D4152:46a-43: tu dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis gnas par
T09D4152:46b-0: @46b phan 'dod kyi skyes pa'i rabs te skyes pa'i rabs bcu pa'o //
T09D4152:46b-2: rab snang ded dpon legs bshad ni //
T09D4152:46b-3: don gnyer ri bong mgo bo gtong //
T09D4152:46b-4: nu sbyin tshong dpon nya dang yang //
T09D4152:46b-5: sdom tshangs sbyin de bzhin mar sbyin /
T09D4152:46b-7: // / snying rjes rjes su 'brel pa gzhan don du //
T09D4152:46b-8: srog ni gtong zhing rtsa bzhin 'dod pa ste //
T09D4152:46b-9: sra ba'i yid can rnams kyi yang ni yid //
T09D4152:46b-10: bdag nyid che rnams 'jam pa nyid du khyer //
T09D4152:46b-12: chu btang ba nyid kyis zla tshes zhu bar gyur
T09D4152:46b-13: pa ltar 'jam pa'i rlung gis bskul ba'i chu'i rlabs
T09D4152:46b-14: kyi tshogs dang ldan pa'i dur pa pho mo gnyis
T09D4152:46b-15: kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'gram dang ldan
T09D4152:46b-16: pa'i b'a r'a n'a s'i zhes bya ba'i chu bos
T09D4152:46b-17: mngon par brgyan par byas pa'i ri bo'i bar na
T09D4152:46b-18: / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i shing rnams kyi grib
T09D4152:46b-19: mas chu rten gyis chu bsgribs par byas pa rtsva
T09D4152:46b-20: sngon pos sa'i cha sngon por byas pa'i 'brog dgon
T09D4152:46b-22: byang chub sems dpa' ri dags kyi tshogs kyi bdag po byung bar gyur to //
T09D4152:46b-23: 'o ma'i rgya mtsho'i dbu ba ltar ni dkar zhing lto ba srab //
T09D4152:46b-24: rgyab kyang bung ba rnams kyi tshogs ltar nag par gyur pa ni //
T09D4152:46b-25: gang zhig nags kyi mtha' yis la zur mig gis lta 'dra ba yi //
T09D4152:46b-26: sgeg pa'i mig 'bras 'dres shing spro ba'i mig rdzis mdun ni mdzes //
T09D4152:46b-27: de ltar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i cung
T09D4152:46b-28: zad gzugs dang mdangs dang tshad rjes su 'dra ba'i
T09D4152:46b-29: lha sbyin de dang nye bar spyod pa ni shin
T09D4152:46b-30: tu che ba ma yin pa'i ri dags kyi tshogs
T09D4152:46b-31: la bdag po nyid byas bar gyur to //
T09D4152:46b-32: de dag bdag po de dag gis //
T09D4152:46b-33: rtsva ni za zhing skyong byas pa //
T09D4152:46b-34: dogs pa rnams bral dbugs phyung bar //
T09D4152:46b-35: ri dags tshogs dag la spyod 'gyur //
T09D4152:46b-36: de nas dus 'ga' zhig na ri dags shor ba
T09D4152:46b-37: la chags shing goms par byas pa tshangs pas sbyin
T09D4152:46b-38: zhes bya ba'i rgyal po b'a r'a n'a s'ir nges
T09D4152:46b-39: par 'byung ste // 'khyog cing brang gi mthil la gzhu rnam par zhugs par byas pa /
T09D4152:46b-40: rta mchog la zhon pa dang rang dang 'dra ba'i skye bos rjes su 'breng ba /
T09D4152:46b-41: rta rnams kyi rmig pa las kun nas 'byung ba'i
T09D4152:46b-42: rdul gyis kun nas dri ma can du song ba'i
T09D4152:46b-43: mig gi rdzi ma nyin mo byed pas kun nas
T09D4152:46b-44: gdungs pa'i rdul gyi thigs pa skyes pas dpral ba'i
T09D4152:47a-2: dmag tshogs kyi sgras kun nas skrag pas steng du
T09D4152:47a-3: 'phur ba'i rma bya dang ti tti ri dang tsa
T09D4152:47a-4: ko ra'i tshogs dang khyim bya can dang /
T09D4152:47a-5: mi mnyam pa dang mthon po dang dma' ba'i sa'i cha dang ldan pa dang /
T09D4152:47a-6: 'ga' zhig tu rkang thang rnams kyi rkang pa dang
T09D4152:47a-7: ri dags rnams kyi rmig pa rnam par bkod pas
T09D4152:47a-8: ngo mtshar ba dang spros pa dang nya'i tshogs kyis
T09D4152:47a-9: rnam par bsten pa'i chu klung gi 'gram gyi chu
T09D4152:47a-11: myos pa'i glang po'i bdag po dpral 'bur brad pas
T09D4152:47a-12: yang dag par zhugs pa'i smyon chus dri dang bcas
T09D4152:47a-13: pa dang / shing gi sdong bu dang nye bar
T09D4152:47a-14: 'khor bzhin pa sbrang rtsi'i byed pa'i tshogs dang ldan
T09D4152:47a-15: pa dang / pa dang / 'gram gyi shing rnams
T09D4152:47a-16: kyi yal ga la 'byar ba skams pa'i sha mo
T09D4152:47a-19: dur skya'i mjug sgro dang kun nas 'dres pa'i ka sha dang /
T09D4152:47a-22: lo ma'i tshogs kyis mtshon par byed bzhin pa yun
T09D4152:47a-23: ring por 'das pa'i ri bo rnams dang chu klung
T09D4152:47a-25: rdzing bu rnams kyi 'dab la khyad par du bying ba'i stag gi rjes can dang /
T09D4152:47a-26: au dum b'a ra smin pa'i dris dri zhim par byas pa'i tshang tshing dang ldan pa dang /
T09D4152:47a-27: rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan srab pa rnams ltar
T09D4152:47a-28: 'khyog pa'i lto 'phye rnams 'gro ba rnams kyis mtshon
T09D4152:47a-29: par byas pa'i lam gyi rdul dang ldan pa dang
T09D4152:47a-30: / nags kyi nang rnams su rnam par mthong zhing cung zad 'da' bar byas nas /
T09D4152:47a-31: ri dags kyi tshogs gnyis de dbugs 'byin zhing gnas
T09D4152:47a-32: pa dmag tshogs kyis kun nas bskor zhing 'dug go
T09D4152:47a-33: // de nas dmag gi gzhu ni bdungs pa rnams mthong nas //
T09D4152:47a-34: bskyod pa'i g-yer kha las ni byung ba'i sgra ldan pa //
T09D4152:47a-35: skyabs med tshogs pa rnams ni kun nas 'byer ba can //
T09D4152:47a-36: 'jigs pa'i dbang gis ri dags rnams ni kun nas 'bros //
T09D4152:47a-37: kun nas bskor ba'i ri dags rnams ni mthong nas kyang //
T09D4152:47a-38: mi bskyod dmag tshogs kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' de //
T09D4152:47a-39: ring po nas ni dong ba'i mda' ni 'don byed cing //
T09D4152:47a-40: sa yi dbang phyug gan du 'ongs shing smra bar gyur //
T09D4152:47a-41: cig car ri dags zad pa'i don du ci phyir ni //
T09D4152:47a-42: gzhu 'di khyod kyis mda' dang bcas pa byas pa ste //
T09D4152:47b-0: nyin mo byed pa khyed kyi nag po'i tshang du @47b ni ;
T09D4152:47b-1: / ri dags re re bdag gis rnam par gtang bar bgyi //
T09D4152:47b-2: de nas sa yi bdag pos de la smras pa ste //
T09D4152:47b-3: ri dags gal te de ni bden na de ltar bgyi //
T09D4152:47b-4: gal te rnam par gzhag pa 'di ni mi byed na //
T09D4152:47b-5: de nas ri dags rnams la slar ni brdeg par bgyi //
T09D4152:47b-6: de nas khas ni blangs te sa skyong song ba dang ;
T09D4152:47b-7: / dkar po'i gdugs kyis nyi ma'i gdung ba bzlog byas pa //
T09D4152:47b-8: ri dags de rnams slar ni gcig nyid du gyur pa'i //
T09D4152:47b-9: gan du 'ongs te byang chub sems dpas smras pa yin //
T09D4152:47b-10: cig car 'jigs pa kun nas nye bar 'ongs pa la //
T09D4152:47b-11: gal te slar ni rim pa rnyed 'gyur dam pa de //
T09D4152:47b-12: ring por zhi ba'i rgyu ni rim bzhin thob nas ni //
T09D4152:47b-13: nam zhig tshe na gzhan nyid ces bya 'byung ba yin //
T09D4152:47b-14: glang po'i dpral 'bur rnam par 'byed la mkhas pa yin //
T09D4152:47b-15: stobs ldan gnya' ral can rnams la yang sdang byed pa'i //
T09D4152:47b-16: mi dbang rnams ni mda' yis srog rnams zad byed de //
T09D4152:47b-17: ku sha'i rtse za ri dags nags su smos ci dgos //
T09D4152:47b-18: nor bu dkar po ltar ni gtsang ba'i 'od rnams kyis //
T09D4152:47b-19: mun pa 'joms shing 'gro ba snang byed ri bong mtshan //
T09D4152:47b-20: 'od ni bral zhing nub pa'i ri las lhung ba ste //
T09D4152:47b-21: dngos po thams cad skad cig gis ni 'jig pa nyid //
T09D4152:47b-22: chu rlabs chen po dang ldan chu ni shugs kyis 'khrug par byas nas ni //
T09D4152:47b-23: rgya mtsho'i nang nas sbrul ni 'dul byed bu yis 'don par byed pa ste //
T09D4152:47b-24: las rnams kyis ni rnam par mkhas pa su zhig 'da' mi byed //
T09D4152:47b-25: don du byas pa'i las rnams kyis ni rnam par smin pa mkhas pas kyang //
T09D4152:47b-26: stobs ni che bar grags pa su zhig gis kyang 'da' bar mi byed do //
T09D4152:47b-27: de ltar las 'gro shes nas ni //
T09D4152:47b-28: shes pa la gsal mkhas pa rnams //
T09D4152:47b-29: srog ni gtong yang ngal ba ni //
T09D4152:47b-31: de nas des ri dags kyi tshogs kyi bdag po
T09D4152:47b-32: gnyis kyi bkas tshogs de dag las nyi ma re
T09D4152:47b-33: re zhing rgyal po de'i kha zas 'tshed pa'i tshe
T09D4152:47b-34: ri dags re re tshang mang du btang bar gyur
T09D4152:47b-35: to // de ltar na yang nyin zhag kha cig
T09D4152:47b-36: 'das pa dang lha sbyin gyi ri dags kyi tshogs
T09D4152:47b-37: la 'jug pa na ri dags mo sbrum ma cig
T09D4152:47b-39: de nas des rang gi ri dags kyi tshogs des bdag po'i gan du 'ongs nas smras pa /
T09D4152:48a-0: @48a * // rje bo lags nges par sang nang par bdag ni phru gu skye bar 'gyur ba ste //
T09D4152:48a-1: de nas phrug pa skyes nas nags na ri dags
T09D4152:48a-2: kyi phrug pa rnam par bzhag nas bdag ni 'gro
T09D4152:48a-3: ba ste / bdag gis kyang de nas 'chi bar
T09D4152:48a-4: rigs de mngal na gnas pa'i phrug pa 'di dang
T09D4152:48a-5: ni ma yin zhes zer ro //
T09D4152:48a-6: ri dags kyi tshogs kyi bdag po lha sbyin gyis smras pa /
T09D4152:48a-7: de'i phyir khyod kyi re mos bab pas na ri
T09D4152:48a-8: dags gzhan su zhig 'gro bar 'gyur te rnam pa
T09D4152:48a-9: thams cad du khyod nyid 'gro bar rigs so //
T09D4152:48a-10: khyod ni bdag nyid mi shes pa //
T09D4152:48a-11: gzhan zhig bdag gi bka' las 'da' bar byed do zhes zer ro //
T09D4152:48a-12: de ltar ri dags kyi tshogs kyi bdag po des
T09D4152:48a-13: nges par bskrad pas ri dags mo de song nas
T09D4152:48a-15: gang zhig 'di ri dags kyi bdag po gnyis pa
T09D4152:48a-16: shin tu snying rje dang ldan pa de bas na
T09D4152:48a-17: yang re zhig gsol ba gdab par bgyi'o snyam ste
T09D4152:48a-18: song nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa
T09D4152:48a-19: ; tshogs bdag bdag la re mos ni //
T09D4152:48a-20: mi skyong khang bar 'gro res bab //
T09D4152:48a-21: bdag kyang mngal 'byung nye ba ni //
T09D4152:48a-22: de phyir phrug pa 'di srungs shig / skyes ma thag tsam 'dug pa ni //
T09D4152:48a-23: lces kyang nye bar ldang byas te //
T09D4152:48a-24: nu ma 'thung du bcug nas bdag / phru gu g-yo ba'i mig ldan pa /
T09D4152:48a-25: nags mthar dung gi dum bu bzhin //
T09D4152:48a-26: grib ldan so ni sar ba yis //
T09D4152:48a-27: ljang sngon rtse mor reg byed pa //
T09D4152:48a-28: mdun du gnas pa rnam mthong nas //
T09D4152:48a-29: tshogs ldan tshogs la bdag gi ni //
T09D4152:48a-30: nu mo chung ba yod pa ste //
T09D4152:48a-31: de la bu ni btang byas nas //
T09D4152:48a-33: bu la gdung ba'i ri dags mo //
T09D4152:48a-34: 'di ltar mngon du brjod cing mthong byas nas //
T09D4152:48a-35: tshogs kyi bdag po la ni shin tu yang //
T09D4152:48a-36: snying ni brtse bas kun nas gnas pa ste //
T09D4152:48a-37: sdug bsngal ldan pa ma 'dris pa la yang //
T09D4152:48a-38: dam pa'i brtse ba shin tu 'phel ba ste //
T09D4152:48a-39: rtsa ba'i tshogs la chu yis sbangs ba ni ;
T09D4152:48a-40: / shing la yang dag brten nas ljon shing bzhin //
T09D4152:48a-41: phongs pa skyabs su 'gro ba mthong nas ni //
T09D4152:48a-42: gang zhig nye bar brtse ba yod pa ste //
T09D4152:48a-43: de yi sdug bsngal 'joms par byed pa'i rgyu //
T09D4152:48a-44: 'bad pa mchog ni de nyid byed pa yin //
T09D4152:48b-0: de nas ri dags kyi tshogs kyi mgon pos ri dags mo @48b de la smras pa //
T09D4152:48b-1: bzang mo yid la 'phrog pa'i mya ngan kun nas dor //
T09D4152:48b-2: bde ba nye bar thob nas nags na spyod cing
T09D4152:48b-3: khyod 'dug shog / mi yi bdag khyim rang nyid
T09D4152:48b-5: sar pa shir sha ltar 'jam rtsva ni kun nas 'dzin byed cing //
T09D4152:48b-6: zla ba'i 'od kyi tshogs ltar dri med chu ni 'thung byed pa //
T09D4152:48b-7: 'dir ni ri dags phrug rnams lhan cig kun nas rol bzhin pa //
T09D4152:48b-8: bu ni g-yo ba'i mig can yun ring por ni lta bar gyis //
T09D4152:48b-9: de ltar ri dags mod de dbugs phyung nas ni brtan des smras //
T09D4152:48b-10: de ring ri dags mo ni 'chi las skyob pa bdag gis ni //
T09D4152:48b-11: ji ltar srid pa gzhan du byas pa'i sdug bsngal skyed byed ni //
T09D4152:48b-12: bdud las rgyal ba'i byang chub thob nas de ltar
T09D4152:48b-13: skyob gyur cig / de ltar smras nas lto ba
T09D4152:48b-14: mnan pas drod bcings shing rmig pa sbyar bas rdul
T09D4152:48b-16: ri dags rnams kyi skyug ldad kyis rgya shug gi
T09D4152:48b-17: tshi gu dor bas tha ma nges par bsags pa'i
T09D4152:48b-18: 'dug pa'i gnas las sngar kun nas langs nas /
T09D4152:48b-19: yid mi bde ba'i tshogs dang rjes su 'gro bzhin
T09D4152:48b-20: pa'i tshogs kyi bdag po de b'a r'a na s'ir
T09D4152:48b-21: mngon par song bar gyur to //
T09D4152:48b-22: de nas me tog phye ma 'bras bu rnams kyis khyab //
T09D4152:48b-23: rnam khyab bung ba rnams kyi skad kyis khyab pa dang //
T09D4152:48b-24: rlung gi yal ga'i rtse mo'i lag pa g-yob pa yis //
T09D4152:48b-25: ri shing rnams kyang de las zlog par byed ltar
T09D4152:48b-26: 'dug / grogs ltar ri dags des ni rnam par
T09D4152:48b-27: grol bzhin pa // rlung gis gdungs shing g-yo ba yi ni 'dab ma can //
T09D4152:48b-28: kun nas rnam par khyab pa'i shing bye'u skad ldan pa //
T09D4152:48b-29: blta zhing lta bar byed pa'i nags ni du ba 'dra //
T09D4152:48b-30: de nas byang chub sems dpa' b'a r'a na s'i
T09D4152:48b-31: dang nye bar 'ongs te cung zad thogs pas ri
T09D4152:48b-32: dags kyi tshogs de la 'di skad ces smras so

T09D4152:48b-34: gang gi phyir 'jig rten pa dang yang dag par
T09D4152:48b-35: 'brel pa rnams ni rnam par sbyor ba rnyed par
T09D4152:48b-36: // sla ba'o ; / shin tu yun ring por
T09D4152:48b-37: yang dpyid ka'i dus na nyams dga' ba'i autpa la'i
T09D4152:48b-38: tshogs la brten nas kha ba'i dus kyi kun nas
T09D4152:48b-39: rnying ba'i 'dab ma ze 'bru'i lte ba can dri
T09D4152:48b-40: dang bral ba spangs nas rang bzhin gyi g-yo ba'i
T09D4152:49a-0: char pa'i dus kyi chu gter ba'i snam bus 'khrigs pa'i @49a * //
T09D4152:49a-1: phyogs kyi bud med kyi bzhin rnams kun nas snang bar byas te /

T09D4152:49a-3: ston ka'i dus na chu rnam par dor bas yang

T09D4152:49a-5: ba'i smad 'tshong ma'i bud med rnams kyis yun ring
T09D4152:49a-6: po ma yin pa'i 'od tshogs pa dang bral ba'i
T09D4152:49a-7: chags pa can dang 'dra bar yongs su gtong bar

T09D4152:49a-10: kyi dus na lhan cig skyes pa'i 'od kyis yongs

T09D4152:49a-26: tshogs la 'byar ba'i tshogs kyi ku cos 'jigs su

T09D4152:49a-28: bu rnams kyis sha dang chu rgyus khyab pa gri

T09D4152:49a-31: gsod pa'i gnas su phyin nas gnas par gyur to
T09D4152:49a-32: rung ba / // de gsod pa la dbang du

T09D4152:49a-34: bdag po blangs nas rgyal po la ston cing 'dug

T09D4152:49a-44: 'dod chags mi de'i yid ra ba //

T09D4152:52b-0: dang lhan cig tu nyal @52b ba las rab tu

T09D4152:52b-14: rang bzhin gyi yid 'phrog pa'i dbyangs ni 'di yin

T09D4152:53a-2: sna tshogs nor bu rna ba'i rgyan lta bu //
T09D4152:53a-3: des na kho bo cag gi khyim gyi sar gyur cig /
T09D4152:53a-5: btsun mo 'di ni gzung bar nus pa ma yin no //

T09D4152:53a-10: stobs chung gyur pa'i 'dab chags rnams la smos ci dgos //

T09D4152:53a-16: mkhas pa mang po'i bshes rnams kyang ni yod pa ste //

T09D4152:53a-33: des ni bdag gi mdzes pas 'jig rten gsum mgon yang //

T09D4152:53a-40: gang phyir mgo bor rdul gyi tshogs rnams lhung ba ni /
T09D4152:53b-0: @53b gang gi yid la tshig rtsub mda' rnams reg pa ste /

T09D4152:53b-19: te phyogs gcig tu rnam par gnas so //

T09D4152:54a-0: khyod ni bdag gi skyabs gyur cig / khyod kyis zhags pa @54a * //

T09D4152:55b-20: byas pa'i mtshan mo'i dus kyi sgo thob pa la

T09D4152:55b-22: rnams kyis bkram pa'i rma bya'i bdag po la 'jam
T09D4152:55b-23: pa'i lam kun nas bstan par gyur to //
T09D4152:55b-24: nyi ma re re yang yongs su smin pa dang
T09D4152:55b-25: dri zhim pa dang 'jam pa'i 'bras bu rnams sbyin
T09D4152:55b-26: par gyur to // de nas dus gcig gi tshe
T09D4152:55b-27: na dus song ba na rgyal po des bya ba
T09D4152:55b-28: cung zad la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' btsun
T09D4152:55b-29: mo dpe med ma'i lag par bzhag nas shin tu
T09D4152:55b-30: che ba ma yin pa'i dmag tshogs kyis rjes su
T09D4152:55b-31: 'gro bzhin pa rta rnams kyi rmig pa sbyar bas
T09D4152:55b-32: lam gyi rdul 'byung bas me tog gi snye ma
T09D4152:55b-33: dang ze'u 'bru kun nas dri ma can du byas
T09D4152:55b-34: pa'i nags kyi nang byed cing /
T09D4152:55b-35: dri ma med pa'i chu 'bab pa'i 'gram du lcang ma'i grib ma nges par 'brel pa dang /
T09D4152:55b-36: g-yo ba med pa'i chu skyar dang dur pa lta bzhin pa dang /
T09D4152:55b-37: nya'i tshogs rgyug pas 'gram gyi chu khyab par byas pa dang /
T09D4152:55b-38: shin tu myur ba'i shing rta dang rkang pa'i sgra
T09D4152:55b-39: kun nas grag pa'i khrung khrung pho mos kun nas
T09D4152:55b-40: dor bzhin pa'i dkar po'i 'gram dang ldan pa /
T09D4152:55b-41: rgya mtsho'i bud med rnams de dang de mthong zhing
T09D4152:55b-42: skrag pa'i ngang pa 'phur bas g-yo ba'i mig mang
T09D4152:55b-43: po dang bcas par gyur pa lta bu /
T09D4152:56a-0: phyogs rnams kyi bar mthong zhing @56a * //
T09D4152:56a-1: rab tu 'gro ba'i ba glang gi tshogs kyi so
T09D4152:56a-2: rnams kyis rtsva sar pa'i myu gu gcod bzhin pa
T09D4152:56a-3: / bu ram shing gi nags kyis 'gags pa'i grong
T09D4152:56a-4: rnams kyis zam pa du ma 'da' bar byas nas
T09D4152:56a-5: cung zad yul gzhan du song bar gyur to //
T09D4152:56a-6: de nas sa dbang btsun mo ma he mo yi rva bzhin du //
T09D4152:56a-7: dpral bar du bas khyab pa'i gdong de skya ba'i yan lag can //
T09D4152:56a-8: rlung gi stegs bur song ba mig rdzi'i ri mo yangs pa can //
T09D4152:56a-9: mig gi 'gro ba'i skyon can bzhad gad pa la ri nas gtad //
T09D4152:56a-10: de nas mig bzang mig la mngon par dga' ba de mthong nas //
T09D4152:56a-11: bzhad gad can gyi gtso bo 'di ni rtsig drung myur du song //
T09D4152:56a-12: logs rnams bltas te yang dang yang du the tshom can de ni //
T09D4152:56a-13: rna ba'i autpal dri zhim de yi lus la dor bar gyur //
T09D4152:56a-14: autpal de ni kha phye ba yi 'dab ma bzung byas nas //
T09D4152:56a-15: bsnams te mgo bor yang ni bzhag nas de ni rol bzhin pa //
T09D4152:56a-16: nyi ma nub pa song ba la ni gzhan dbang ji ltar yang //
T09D4152:56a-17: rim gyis de la mig gi rjes su song bas 'gro bar gyur //
T09D4152:56a-18: de nas de ni sgeg can smang 'tshong khyim du song nas ni //
T09D4152:56a-19: shin tu rnam par rgyas pa'i snying ldan mal du 'dug byas nas //
T09D4152:56a-20: mya ngan shugs kyis yid 'byung mda' ni phog pa mtshon byas pa //
T09D4152:56a-21: brtan pa dor ba de ni shin tu de ni phrad 'dod gdung bar gyur //
T09D4152:56a-22: khrel dgod sngon 'gro smad 'tshong mas ni bzhad gad can la smras //
T09D4152:56a-23: da ltar 'phags pa'i bu ni stong pa 'dra bar bdag gis mthong //
T09D4152:56a-24: de nas skyon can bsam pa sbas pa des ni smras pa ste //
T09D4152:56a-25: cho los bdag ni pham zhes des na bdag sdug bsngal bar gyur //
T09D4152:56a-26: de nas bzhad gad can de lo brgya dang mnyam
T09D4152:56a-27: pa'i mtshan mo sems par byed cing yid de la
T09D4152:56a-28: song bas kun nas bslang ste /
T09D4152:56a-29: grogs po su zhig la gtam de dben pa'i sar smra zhing 'dug go //
T09D4152:56a-30: khar sang bdag gis gang zhig nyams su myong ba de grogs po nyon cig ces zer ro //
T09D4152:56a-31: gang zhig 'di rgyal po'i btsun mo ni gtso bo
T09D4152:56a-32: mig btsums pa tsam gyis mi mo zhes bya ba
T09D4152:56a-33: 'jig rten pa la grags pa rol pa dang bcas
T09D4152:56a-34: par blta bar gyur ba las bzung ste /
T09D4152:56a-35: rlung gi stegs bu kun nas dmigs nas sgeg pa dang bcas par //
T09D4152:56a-36: dgod pa'i 'phro ba'i so ni ri ni chen 'od kyis snang ba ni //
T09D4152:56b-0: @56b autpal ming can ming gi dpe med ma des autpa la de'i //
T09D4152:56b-1: gzugs dang ming mtshungs pas ni bdag gi steng du rnam par gnas //
T09D4152:56b-2: de ni rlung gi stegs bu'i sgo dang 'brel ba'i zla ba'i gdong //
T09D4152:56b-3: so yi rin chen 'od kyis zla ba'i 'od ni 'phrog byed pa //
T09D4152:56b-4: smin ma'i gzhus ni sgeg pa dang bcas mthong bar 'gyur ba ni //
T09D4152:56b-5: mig gi mda' ni bdag la rnam btang srab ba'i yan lag can //
T09D4152:56b-6: de bas na re zhig phrad pa'i thabs bsam par gyis shig ces zer ro //
T09D4152:56b-7: de nas grogs po de rnam par dgod cing smras pa /
T09D4152:56b-8: gal te 'di ni bya rog dang ta la phrad
T09D4152:56b-9: pa bzhin du 'gyur te khyod kyang mi'i bdag po'i
T09D4152:56b-10: pho brang gi rtsig pa dang nye bar rjes su
T09D4152:56b-11: thob pa dang // de la yang rnam pa gang
T09D4152:56b-12: gis ci yang lta bar gyur pa la rang nyid
T09D4152:56b-13: kyis khyed kyi steng du rna ba la yod pa'i
T09D4152:56b-14: autpa la ltung bar gyur pa de bas na khyod
T09D4152:56b-15: smad 'tshong ma dang bzhad gad can gyi skye bo'i
T09D4152:56b-16: dbus su 'ongs nas bdag nyid dgod par bya ba'i
T09D4152:56b-18: de bas na dam pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'di kun nas btang bar gyis shig //
T09D4152:56b-19: gal te yang 'dod bzhin pa'i rgyal po'i btsun mos
T09D4152:56b-20: khyod kyi steng du rna ba la yod pa'i autpa
T09D4152:56b-21: la ltung bar gyur pa de lta na yang phrad
T09D4152:56b-22: par 'dod pa'i gdung ba 'di ni mi rigs pa
T09D4152:56b-23: kho na ste / gang gi phyir rnyed par dka'
T09D4152:56b-24: ba'i 'dod pa can mo'i skye bo dang phrad pa'i
T09D4152:56b-25: thabs kyi bsam pa skye bo la mi dga' ba
T09D4152:56b-26: chen po skyed par byed pa dang /
T09D4152:56b-28: yan lag rnams kyang stobs chung bar byed de kha zas la 'dod pa med par byed pa dang /
T09D4152:56b-29: phan par smra ba'i grogs po rnams kyi yang gdams
T09D4152:56b-30: ngag la mngon par dga' bar mi byed pa dang
T09D4152:56b-31: / rab tu 'phel ba'i chu sar pa'i tshogs dang
T09D4152:56b-32: ldan pa'i chu bo'i 'gram gyi ljon shing bzhin du
T09D4152:56b-33: chos la gnas pa rtsa ba nags nas 'don par
T09D4152:56b-34: / byed pa dang / dga' ba rnams la yang sdang bar byed pa dang ;
T09D4152:56b-35: / skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi yon tan gyi
T09D4152:56b-36: gtam la phrag dog byed pa rnam pa thams cad
T09D4152:56b-37: du so sor rtog pa'i stobs kyis /
T09D4152:56b-38: 'di med par byed nus pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T09D4152:56b-39: bzhad gad can gyis smras pa /
T09D4152:56b-40: lung du ma 'da' bar byed pa skye bo dang
T09D4152:56b-41: reg pas blo rno ba bdag lta bu skyon can
T09D4152:57a-0: @57a * // gyi skye bo rnams ni 'dod pa dang bcas pa'am /
T09D4152:57a-1: 'dod pa med pa'i bud med ji ltar shes par mi 'gyur ro //
T09D4152:57a-3: gang gi phyir rna ba 'phrug pa dang /
T09D4152:57a-4: nu ma gsal bar byed pa dang /
T09D4152:57a-5: ngo tsha bas byin phyogs su lta ba dang /
T09D4152:57a-6: dgod pa la sogs pa'i dngos po rnams ni bud
T09D4152:57a-7: med rnams kyi 'dod pa dang bcas pa'i sems su
T09D4152:57a-8: gsal bar byed de de bas na 'dir the tshom
T09D4152:57a-9: gyis ci zhig bya zhes zer ro //
T09D4152:57a-11: gal te de lta yin na des nam mkha' la
T09D4152:57a-12: 'gro ba rnams kyi bdag po ltar ra ba las
T09D4152:57a-13: kyang 'das par byas nas khyod mi'i bdag po'i pho
T09D4152:57a-14: brad du mtshan mo khyod zhugs pa na khyod kyis
T09D4152:57a-15: dus byas pa'i de na yod pa'i rgyal po'i btsun
T09D4152:57a-16: mo so sor rtogs bzhin pa ci zhig yin nam
T09D4152:57a-17: / gnyid kyis khyab pa'i mig gi autpal rnam spangs pa //
T09D4152:57a-18: yan lag 'dar zhing mo mtshan las ni gos lhung ba //
T09D4152:57a-19: 'jigs dang bcas pas 'di ni su yin zhes smra ba //
T09D4152:57a-20: stag la 'jigs pas ri drags mo ltar de 'byung 'gyur //
T09D4152:57a-21: de nas 'khor gyi skye bo'i ku cos sgo ba
T09D4152:57a-22: gnyid rab tu sad pa'i rgyal po'i 'khor la ma
T09D4152:57a-23: 'ongs pa nus pa ma yin pa'i las 'di bdag
T09D4152:57a-24: gis mthong zhes bya ba de ltar de dag dben
T09D4152:57a-25: bar rnam par dpyod par byed pa dag la ;
T09D4152:57a-26: dal gyis 'gro bas bskyod pa'i sgra grag pa'i rkang
T09D4152:57a-27: gdub kyis yid 'phrog pa'i rkang pa'i padma gnyis rnam
T09D4152:57a-28: par bkod pas sa'i rgyab mchod par byed pa dang
T09D4152:57a-29: 'dra ba dang / lag brdas 'gro ba nyid ston par byed pa dang /
T09D4152:57a-30: bskyod pa'i ri dags kyi 'og mig dang 'dra ba'i
T09D4152:57a-31: sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i lta bas mdzes pa nyis
T09D4152:57a-32: 'gyur gyis rna ba'i grogs po mig gis ngo tsha
T09D4152:57a-33: bar byas pa dang 'dra bar cung zad thur du
T09D4152:57a-34: sgru [?] pa'i rna pa yod pa'i autpa la nges
T09D4152:57a-36: rags pa'i mu tig gi tshun po'i nor bu'i 'od
T09D4152:57a-37: kyis lci ba'i 'o ma 'dzin pa gsal bar byas
T09D4152:57a-38: pas / mtshan mo'i gzugs dang ldan pa bzhin du
T09D4152:57a-39: chu 'dzin dang bral bas mtshan mo byed pa gsal
T09D4152:57a-40: pas / ba dang / cung zad nyi ma'i 'od
T09D4152:57a-41: zer gyis skyes pa'i rdul gyi thigs pa'i tshogs kyis
T09D4152:57a-42: khyad par du mdzes pa mnan pa dang /
T09D4152:57a-43: khyad par du mdzes pa'i me tog ba ka la'i
T09D4152:57a-44: phreng bas ska lo yongs su gang bar byas pa
T09D4152:57b-0: dang / lag pa nas @57b bzung ba'i ska rags kyi cha lhod par byas pa dang /
T09D4152:57b-1: rma bya'i mdongs kyi sgro'i dbus ltar sngo ba'i steng gos 'dzin par byed pa dang /
T09D4152:57b-2: rab tu srab cing nag pa'i spu'i phreng bas rgya che ba dang /
T09D4152:57b-3: zab pa'i lte ba dma' ba nyid dang 'dra bar
T09D4152:57b-4: ston par byed par gyur pa'i nye bar mdzes par
T09D4152:57b-5: byas pa'i gnyer ma gsum gyi rlabs kyis bar mi
T09D4152:57b-6: mnyam pa dang / nyi ma phyed kyi dus kyi
T09D4152:57b-7: nyin mo byed pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis 'khyud par
T09D4152:57b-8: byas pa'i padmo'i phreng ba dang 'dra ba /
T09D4152:57b-9: 'gro bas kun nas ngal ba'i dbang gis 'jam pa'i
T09D4152:57b-10: lus kyi srog shing cung zad yongs su rnyings pa
T09D4152:57b-11: dang / ga bur gyis dri zhim pa'i so rtsis mchu dmar ba dang /
T09D4152:57b-12: yongs su smin pa'i la bi la'i 'bras bu ltar
T09D4152:57b-13: kun nas skye ba'i 'gram pa'i dbus su kun nas
T09D4152:57b-14: bris pa'i smug rtsi dang ldan pa dang /
T09D4152:57b-15: dpal gzugs dang ldan ma dang 'dra bar gzugs mtshungs pa med pa /
T09D4152:57b-16: smra ba mkhas pa bzo bo mkhas pas brdungs pa'i
T09D4152:57b-17: gser sku dang 'dra ba'i ming dpal ldan ma zhes
T09D4152:57b-18: bya ba pho nya mo btsun mo dpe med mas
T09D4152:57b-19: btang ngo // kun nas 'ongs te bzhad gad pa dang gnyis gsong por smras nas 'dug ste /
T09D4152:57b-20: de dag gi grogs po nyid gzhan dbang du ma song bar shes nas /
T09D4152:57b-21: dbugs phyung ba nyid du rgyal po'i gtam smra par gyur to //
T09D4152:57b-22: me tog mtshon cha dang 'dra pho brang mtha' nas 'gro ba ni //
T09D4152:57b-23: gang tshe mi dbang btsun mo dpe med mas ni khyod mthong ba //
T09D4152:57b-24: lag mthil gtad pa'i gdong gi padma dag gi mdza' mo de //
T09D4152:57b-25: de nas brtsams te srab ba nyid kyang skya ba nyid ni 'dzin //
T09D4152:57b-26: shin tu srab pa pad rtsa bcas pa'i 'dam ltar skya //
T09D4152:57b-27: da ltar bstan pa bral ba'i yan lag 'dzin byed cing //
T09D4152:57b-28: yid la yid las skyes pa'i mda' rnams ma lus pa //
T09D4152:57b-29: yang yang grogs po bdag gi mdza' mo la ni 'phen //
T09D4152:57b-30: me tog mal cha yan lag las skyes drod kyis ni //
T09D4152:57b-31: nyi ma re rer 'dod pa'i lus can dro bar byed //
T09D4152:57b-32: skyed mos tshal yang yid 'ong lta bar 'gyur bzhin yang //
T09D4152:57b-33: khyu dang bral ba'i ri dags mo ltar rol mi 'gyur //
T09D4152:57b-34: de ltar me tog gzhu yi mda' yis yan lag brdungs pa yi //
T09D4152:57b-35: yang dang yang du mya ngan dbugs kyis 'gram pa bkang ba dang //
T09D4152:57b-36: ngo tshas gdong ni thur lta legs pa'i yan lag can //
T09D4152:58a-1: mo tshig gis kyang ni rol //
T09D4152:58a-2: de nas tshig nges par byas pa'i pho nya mo
T09D4152:58a-3: de la de'i grogs pos rnam par dgod cing smras
T09D4152:58a-4: pa / gdon mi za ba nyid du lhan cig
T09D4152:58a-5: skyes pa'i snyem gsal bar byed pa'i dpyid ka'i dus
T09D4152:58a-6: su khu byug mo dang lhan cig tu sbyar ba
T09D4152:58a-7: pa / yin te / khyed la yid kyi re ba 'grub ces bya'o //
T09D4152:58a-8: bzhad gad mkhan gyis smras pa /
T09D4152:58a-9: mdza' mo rnam pa thams cad bdag ni don dang bcas pa ste /
T09D4152:58a-10: sa phyogs gang dang gang la bdag gis dpe med
T09D4152:58a-11: ma blta bar bya zhes bya ba re zhig smros
T09D4152:58a-12: shig / pho nya mos smras pa /
T09D4152:58a-13: mtshan mo skye bo gnyid log pa dang cung zad
T09D4152:58a-14: nye ba na phyi rol du ra ba dang nye
T09D4152:58a-15: bar skyes pa gang zhig n+ya gra dha de la
T09D4152:58a-16: 'dzegs nas de nyid mi'i bdag po'i pho brang gi

T09D4152:58a-18: 'khor la 'os ba'i skyed mos tshal gyi steng du

T09D4152:58a-21: rdzing bu'i 'gram na ri mo'i ra ba la gnas

T09D4152:58a-23: g-yo bas dpe med ma yun ring por bdag nyid
T09D4152:58a-24: skyo bsang byed cing de grogs pos kun nas mngon
T09D4152:58a-25: par 'gro bar bya zhes zer ro //
T09D4152:58a-26: mdza' mo bdag gi tshig gis 'di ltar dpe med ma la smra bar bya ste /
T09D4152:58a-27: bdag gi steng du autpal dkar min pa //
T09D4152:58a-28: rna ba nas ni blangs te khyod kyis btang //
T09D4152:58a-29: de nas yid 'ong srog dang 'dra ba ni //
T09D4152:58a-30: snying yang 'di ni gtong bar mi byed do //
T09D4152:58a-31: de ltar lags zhes btud nas tshig skyel pa de
T09D4152:58a-32: song bal phyogs mang ba'i mun pas btang bar byas
T09D4152:58a-33: pa mthong bar dka' ba'i lam rnams yod pa dang
T09D4152:58a-34: / glang po che gnyid log pa'i dbugs thos bzhin pa /
T09D4152:58a-35: 'ching ba'i ka ba'i nags yod pa dang /
T09D4152:58a-36: thun dang po pa'i skye bos thun gnyis pa me
T09D4152:58a-37: la rtse la dbang byed pa kun nas slong bar
T09D4152:58a-38: byed pa'i gel pa'i skyes bu yod pa dang /
T09D4152:58a-39: g-yo ba med pa'i bya'i tshogs kyis yal gal tshad lhag par gnas pa'i shing rnams yod pa la /
T09D4152:58a-40: mtho yor yang mthong zhing mdun du skyes pa zhes
T09D4152:58a-41: dgos pa dang bcas pas dri zhim pa'i kha dog
T09D4152:58a-42: gis byugs pa'i bzhad gad can de dang po'i chu
T09D4152:58a-43: 'dzin pa ltar sngo ba'i ras kyis lus dkris par
T09D4152:58a-44: byas pa / mchan khung g-yon par ral gri rnon
T09D4152:58b-0: po 'dzin par @58b byas pa grogs po de dang
T09D4152:58b-1: lhan cig tu mtshan mo byed nye bar song ba
T09D4152:58b-3: pho nya mos brtan pa'i thabs kyis slar phrad pa
T09D4152:58b-4: zhes grogs po la bos nas btsun mo 'ongs pa'i
T09D4152:58b-5: skyed mos tshal du zhugs par gyur to //
T09D4152:58b-6: de nas 'ongs bzhin pa mthong nas khyad par can
T09D4152:58b-7: gyi rgyan 'dzin pa'i dpe med ma nges par 'di
T09D4152:58b-8: n+ya gro dha'i yal ga 'dis 'jug par byed cing
T09D4152:58b-9: / rma bya des gal te mthong na dus gcig
T09D4152:58b-10: gi tshe gtam 'di rgyal po 'ongs pa na smra'o
T09D4152:58b-12: de bas na rma bya 'di la dug dang 'dres
T09D4152:58b-13: pa'i kha zas kyis dngos po med pa nyid du
T09D4152:58b-14: khyer bar bya zhes bya ba rnam par bsams nas
T09D4152:58b-15: / dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas dang //
T09D4152:58b-16: chu ni rma bya la des ni //
T09D4152:58b-17: chags pa dang ni 'jigs pa dang //
T09D4152:58b-18: gzhan dbang gyur pa byin par gyur //

T09D4152:58b-20: bsod nams mi mthun gyur pas rnam par rmongs byas pa //
T09D4152:58b-21: ngo tsha bral ba chags pa gzhan dbang skye bo ni //
T09D4152:58b-22: bdag nyid mi shes da lta ci yang byed par 'gyur //

T09D4152:58b-24: kha zas dang chu myangs nas nges par dpe med
T09D4152:58b-25: mas skyes pa 'di dang lhan cig tu 'brel pa

T09D4152:58b-27: la byin no // de bas na 'di 'dir dus thob pa na //
T09D4152:58b-28: skyes pa bud med 'di dag chags long blo skyes pa //

T09D4152:61b-42: rna ba'i mtha' yi phyogs la rnam par zhugs pa mda' yi ltong //
T09D4152:62a-1: dags 'phrog bzhin pa yi mda' rnams kyis 'bigs nyer 'ongs nas //
T09D4152:62a-2: de'i tshe snying rje ldan pa ji ltar kun nas mthong bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:62a-3: yang na phyugs dang ri dags dang phag pa la
T09D4152:62a-4: sogs pa la 'tshe ba re zhig lta zhog /
T09D4152:62a-5: gang gi phan tshun du mche ba gnyis pa'i rva
T09D4152:62a-6: yang dag par phrad pa las kun nas langs pa'i
T09D4152:62a-7: spro bzhin pa sreg lugs 'dzin pa'i me tog gi

T09D4152:62a-13: bdag po bsad pas gdan stong pa myur ba'i rta
T09D4152:62a-14: rnams kyis rab tu 'dzin pa rnam par gcod bzhin

T09D4152:62a-18: rol mo'i sgra dang yang dag par 'dres pa'i skye
T09D4152:62a-19: bo rnams kyi ca co dang rol mo'i sgrar ldan
T09D4152:62a-20: pa dang / khrag gis chag chag btab pas sa steng gi rdul rnams rengs par byas pa dang /

T09D4152:62a-22: 'thog par gyur pa'i bsad pa'i skyes bu rnams kyi
T09D4152:62a-23: lus kyis khyab pa'i g-yul ngo rnams su 'jug cing
T09D4152:62a-24: skyes pa du ma rnams la gsod par byed par
T09D4152:62a-25: 'gyur ba dang / byed du 'jug par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
T09D4152:62a-26: chos kyi lam la dmigs pa khyod kyi snying rje
T09D4152:62a-27: gang du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes de bas na sdug
T09D4152:62a-28: bsngal dang skyon du ma'i rkang pa'i rten du gyur
T09D4152:62a-29: pa'i rgyal srid nyid las blo 'di rnam par bzlog
T09D4152:62a-30: par gyis shig ces zer ro //
T09D4152:62a-31: dka' thub pa'am kun nas bsad byas nas //
T09D4152:62a-32: yul gyi dug gis khyab pa'i sems ni sa dbang rnams //
T09D4152:62a-33: rang gi bde ba'i cha la zhugs pa rjes chags pa //
T09D4152:62a-34: 'gro ba la ni phyi nas 'gyod pa can mi 'gyur //
T09D4152:62a-35: grags min rnams kyi khyim dang dri ma rnams kyi gzhi //
T09D4152:62a-36: dgra rnams kyis ni rnam pa du mar dpyad bzhin pa //
T09D4152:62a-37: yul gyi lto 'phye'i sa yi 'od ni mi skyong nyid //

T09D4152:62b-1: lha yi mdzes ma rnams ni spangs nas skye bo 'gro //

T09D4152:62b-4: srid pa gzhan gyi me yi tsha ba ma grangs pa //

T09D4152:62b-23: skyon dang sdug bsngal gyis kun nas gnod pa'i sa'i bdag po nyid don du gnyer ba zhes bya'o //

T09D4152:63a-0: rnam par rol pas stong yang yid @63a * //

T09D4152:63a-28: rnam par rol pas stong pa lhod pa 'byung bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:63a-29: rgas pa 'di ni rdul ni lhung ba ltar 'od med //

T09D4152:63b-26: ae ma lus 'di srab pa'i yid rnams kyi ni yid dag gis //

T09D4152:63b-28: rgas pa chen po mun pas 'gags pa ltar ni 'od med pa //

T09D4152:63b-32: 'byung bar 'gyar ba sha dang rus pa'i 'ching ba dor ba ni //

T09D4152:63b-34: mchod sbyin gyis ni sha bzhin kun nas mthong ba du ma chen pos bar rnams 'brel pa 'di//
T09D4152:64a-0: @64a * // yongs su smin pas skya ba drin can chu rgyus rnams kyis kun nas bkab pa ku sha ltar //
T09D4152:64a-1: snying rjes mchod sbyin byed pas kun nas rnyed pa bya rgod 'bab pa'i dur khrod mchod sbyin la //

T09D4152:64a-3: gal ta 'di rnams kyang ni bud med rnams kyi yan lag rol pa dang ni sgeg pa'i rten //
T09D4152:64a-4: brtag par 'gyur te me tog mtshon cha'i lci ba me tog las byung mda' dang 'dra ba ste //
T09D4152:64a-5: zhi dmigs de lta na yang dam pa rnams kyi yid ni de rnams la sbyar mi rigs te //

T09D4152:64a-7: gang tshe skye bo 'dod chags can ni yang dag min pa'i kun rtog reg byed pa //

T09D4152:64a-13: mi 'gyur de ltar khyod kyis shig / rnam par

T09D4152:64a-17: de ltar bsgom pa yang ni gal te nyin re rer //

T09D4152:64a-29: ngag gi me tog rnams kyis yang yang de la mchod //

T09D4152:64b-1: bdag gi mun pa 'di ni 'di ltar zad mi 'gyur //

T09D4152:64b-6: brtan pa lci ba'i yid can blo gros che rnams kyi //

T09D4152:64b-8: de ltar spyod pa 'di ni rnam par dag ldan pa /

T09D4152:64b-10: go 'phang de ni srid med byed pa tshul khrims brten //
T09D4152:64b-11: thob par ma byas par ni ji ltar brtan par byed par 'gyur //
T09D4152:64b-12: gang tshe skyon rnams zad pa khyod ni byang chub thob 'gyur na //
