T09D4152:106a-13: de bzhin sh'aka thub slob ma ni //
T09D4152:106a-14: phyi mar de tshe bdag gyur cig //
T09D4152:106a-15: dgra bcom 'bras bu nyan thos nas //
T09D4152:106a-16: mya ngan dus su thub de las //
T09D4152:106a-17: mya ngan bzod par mi nus shing //
T09D4152:106a-18: sngon du mya ngan 'das gyur cig //
T09D4152:106a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong rnams kyi drung
T09D4152:106a-20: du 'di brjod par mdzad nas slar yang gsungs pa
T09D4152:106a-21: / mya ngan med brtan gang zhig 'di //
T09D4152:106a-22: nags kyi lha mo byung gyur pa //
T09D4152:106a-23: de ni bzang mdzes rab byung 'di //
T09D4152:106a-24: bdag gi nyan thos 'di song ba //
T09D4152:106a-25: bdag ni mya ngan 'das thog mar //
T09D4152:106a-26: de nyid las kyang mya ngan 'das //
T09D4152:106a-27: de ltar skyes rabs 'di ni ngo mtshar ba //
T09D4152:106a-28: cho ga bzhin du sh'aka thub kyi gsal mdzad //
T09D4152:106a-29: mkhas pa rnams kyi yid ni rab zhi phyir //
T09D4152:106a-30: 'jam pa mngon par smra bas rab grags byas //
T09D4152:106a-31: gzhan la phan byed phyir ni dam bcas shin tu grags pa rnams kyis kyang //
T09D4152:106a-32: rgud pa la ni brtson 'grus go cha bcings pa rnam par grol ba min //
T09D4152:106a-33: de ltar kun nas rnam par drangs nas shin tu mthar thug thob bya'i phyir //
T09D4152:106a-34: sa rnams phan par byed pa la ni le lo
T09D4152:106a-35: nyid du ma 'gro cig / ri dags kyi skyes
T09D4152:106a-36: pa'i rabs te skyes pa'i rabs gnyis pa'o /
T09D4152:106a-38: // /'gro ba ma lus sdug bsngal zhi bya'i phyir //
T09D4152:106a-39: blo bzang gang gis smon lam byas pa ste //
T09D4152:106a-40: des ni gnyen 'dun skye bo sdug bsngal las //
T09D4152:106a-41: skyob pa zhes bya 'dir ni the tshom 'di //
T09D4152:106a-43: skyed mos tshal gyi padma rgyas pa ni padma'i 'byung gnas dang 'dra ba dang /
T09D4152:106a-44: mtshan mo'i sgo'i chu 'dzin pa'i tshogs rnam par chad
T09D4152:106b-0: pas dri ma dang bral ba'i zla ba @106b tshes
T09D4152:106b-1: ba bzhin dang / chu sbyin pa'i dus kyi glog gi ljon shing dang 'dra ba dang /
T09D4152:106b-3: bud med kyi bzhin gyi thig le mdzes ba dang 'dra ba dang /
T09D4152:106b-4: dul ba'i skye bo'i bzod pa dang 'dra ba dang /
T09D4152:106b-5: rnam par rgyal bar 'dod pa'i tshul dang 'dra ba dang /
T09D4152:106b-6: phyug po'i mngon par skyes pa nyid dang 'dra ba dang /
T09D4152:106b-7: rigs las skyes pa'i mkhas pa nyid dang 'dra ba dang /
T09D4152:106b-8: sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rtag tu yo byad kyi
T09D4152:106b-9: snying po'i don du gnyer ba'i skye bo rnams kyis
T09D4152:106b-10: nye bar longs spyod par 'gyur ba dang /
T09D4152:106b-11: lha'i bdag po'i 'byor pa shin tu nyams dga' ba dang 'dra ba dang /
T09D4152:106b-12: dus thams cad kyi bde ba'i khyim gyi bdag po rnams kyi khyim dang ldan pa dang /
T09D4152:106b-13: ri rab man d'a ra'i rtse mo dang rjes su 'dra pa'i lha'i khang pa dang ldan pa dang /
T09D4152:106b-14: gtam smra ba la 'jug pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs
T09D4152:106b-15: pa'i gtam dang bzhad gad kyis skye bo rab tu
T09D4152:106b-17: don du gnyer ba'i skye bo'i ma dang 'dra ba dang /
T09D4152:106b-18: rnal 'byor pa chen po rnams kyi sprul pa'i srog dang 'dra ba dang /
T09D4152:106b-19: shin tu mang ba'i rnyed pa'i rigs dang rigs kyi
T09D4152:106b-20: gnas kyi rjes su skyong bar gyur pa'i chos kyi
T09D4152:106b-21: gnas pa dang / mu ge'i gnod pas nye bar 'tshe ba dang bral ba dang /
T09D4152:106b-22: rtag tu dga' ston la 'jug cing dga' ston byed pa'i skye bo dang ldan pa dang /
T09D4152:106b-27: gser dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang byung bar gyur to //
T09D4152:106b-28: de la yang nus pa gsum gyi mthus chags 'og
T09D4152:106b-29: gi rgyal po thams cad nye bar 'dus pa nyi
T09D4152:106b-30: ma re rer chad pa'i tshul gyis che ba'i bdag
T09D4152:106b-31: nyid mngon par 'phel bar gyur pa shin tu dri
T09D4152:106b-32: ma med pa'i mig che bas rgyal po gzhan gyi
T09D4152:106b-33: gtam ltas pa / glang po che dang /
T09D4152:106b-36: rkang thang gi tshogs legs par byas pa'i rgyal po gser zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to //
T09D4152:106b-37: 'jigs pa'i dbang gis rgyags pa 'byung ba nyer zhi ba //
T09D4152:106b-38: ral gri mda' bstan khu tshur lhong par byas pa ni //
T09D4152:106b-39: ri dags bdag po ltar ni dgra rnams gang gis ni //
T09D4152:106b-40: nga rgyal g-yul ngo glang po bzhin du bzod mi 'gyur //
T09D4152:106b-41: gzi brjid grags par byas pa gang la phan tshun du //
T09D4152:106b-42: don gnyer bde bas rnam par 'phel bas phun tshogs pas //
T09D4152:107a-1: la 'dab chags bzhin du skye dgu rnams //
T09D4152:107a-2: rtag pa nyid du bde ba'i phyir ni ngal sor gyur //
T09D4152:107a-3: de lta bu'i yon tan gyi mthu dang ldan pa
T09D4152:107a-4: nor ldan ma'i bdag po de'i skar ma'i bdag po'i
T09D4152:107a-5: 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis dkar ba'i grags pa'i gos
T09D4152:107a-6: kyis phyogs kyi bud med kyi snod dkris pa /
T09D4152:107a-7: lha'i bdag po ltar nyon mongs pa med pa'i yul
T09D4152:107a-8: gyi bde ba nyams su myong ba de la dus
T09D4152:107a-9: gcig gi tshe na dus 'gro ba la /
T09D4152:107a-10: btsun mo man du ka ltar kun nas skye ba'i 'gram mdzes ldan //
T09D4152:107a-11: grags pa'i rgyun ni mngal gyi brjod pa kun nas 'dzin gyur te //
T09D4152:107a-12: snang bar byed pa'i yongs su rdzogs pa'i cha yi tshogs ldan pa //
T09D4152:107a-13: 'od ldan zla ba'i gzugs ni grong khyer 'jigs pa'i phyogs ltar ni //
T09D4152:107a-14: nyi ma 'od zer sar pa 'dra ba'i bud med de de nas //
T09D4152:107a-15: dpal gyis 'bar ba'i me yis bu dang rjes su mthun pa ni //
T09D4152:107a-16: skye bo'i mig la mngon par dga' bar byed pa bdag la skyes //
T09D4152:107a-17: grags pa'i gter ni gter dang 'dra bar mdzes pa skyes par gyur //
T09D4152:107a-18: de nas rgyal po gser gyis gser gyi phung po
T09D4152:107a-19: dpal gyis 'bar ba dang 'dra ba bdag la skyes
T09D4152:107a-20: pa mthong nas / yid dga' ba 'jam pa'i rlung
T09D4152:107a-21: gis g-yo bar gyur pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
T09D4152:107a-22: ba dan rnams kyis tshong sa'i bar nye bar mdzes
T09D4152:107a-23: pa mthong nas / pa / kun nas bcings par
T09D4152:107a-24: gyur pa'i rtabs [*rta babs?] rnams me tog gi phreng
T09D4152:107a-25: pa rnams kyi dris 'khor ba'i bung ba'i tshogs 'gugs
T09D4152:107a-26: pa mthong nas / pa / par byas pa /
T09D4152:107a-27: shin tu 'bar ba'i rgyan rnams kyis nye bar mdzes
T09D4152:107a-28: pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i grong khyer ba'i tshogs dang
T09D4152:107a-29: pa mthong nas / pa / par byas pa /
T09D4152:107a-30: ldan pa / lhag par 'jug pa'i gang dang glus
T09D4152:107a-31: rab tu dga' ba btson ngan bzung ba'i skye bo
T09D4152:107a-32: kun nas grol bar gyur pa /
T09D4152:107a-33: gnyis skyes dang mkhas pa'i skye bo dang grogs po'i
T09D4152:107a-34: tshogs kun nas mchod par gyur pa'i grong khyer gyi
T09D4152:107a-35: tshogs de lhag par mdzes pa dang ldan par byas
T09D4152:107a-36: par gyur to // sras de la yang bkra shis pa'i tshes dang yud tsam dang /
T09D4152:107a-37: skar ma rnams la pha ma dag gis gser gyi
T09D4152:107a-38: go cha zhes bya ba'i ming du btags par gyur
T09D4152:107a-39: te // che ba'i bdag nyid ma 'ongs de'i //
T09D4152:107a-40: mtshan rnams de nas mtshon pa ste //
T09D4152:107a-41: yal ga can gyi me tog rnams //
T09D4152:107a-43: de nas lo brgyad lon pa ni //
T09D4152:107b-0: gzi brjid kyis ni gzhon nu @107b 'dra ;
T09D4152:107b-1: / rgyal po shes pa che rnams kyi //
T09D4152:107b-2: de ni slob ma nyid 'gro gyur //
T09D4152:107b-3: shes rab yon tan rnon po rnams //
T09D4152:107b-4: the tshom mdud pa gcod pa de'i //
T09D4152:107b-5: bstan bcos don ni rab shes pa //
T09D4152:107b-6: slob dpon rnam pas lhag par gyur //
T09D4152:107b-7: bdag cag gis ni gnas la 'di //
T09D4152:107b-8: byang chub sems dpa' nam skye 'gyur //
T09D4152:107b-9: de ltar 'dod pa ltar yon tan //
T09D4152:107b-10: de yi skye ba so sor skyong //
T09D4152:107b-11: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod la sogs //
T09D4152:107b-12: de la yon tan 'jug pa ste //
T09D4152:107b-13: padmas brgyan byas chu ldan pa'i //
T09D4152:107b-14: chu rten la ni bud rnams bzhin //
T09D4152:107b-15: gang zhig nyid ni legs pa'i snod //
T09D4152:107b-16: de nyid yon tan rnams rten pa //
T09D4152:107b-17: rnam 'phros 'od can mu tig gi / chu bo nya phyis snod ma yin //
T09D4152:107b-18: de nas de yi lus las 'byung //
T09D4152:107b-19: yang dag btags pa'i 'od ldan pa //
T09D4152:107b-20: lang tshos rnam par spangs pa ni //
T09D4152:107b-22: mi dbang sras de rigs las skyes pa'i ngo bo las //
T09D4152:107b-23: rgyags pa'i rgyu yang lang tsho la ni lhag gnas la //
T09D4152:107b-24: rnam par dul bas 'dul bzhin pa yi sems ldan pa //
T09D4152:107b-25: rnam 'gyur gnyis 'thung bzang po ltar ni rten ma gyur //
T09D4152:107b-26: de nas dus kyi rim pas rgyal po'i btsun mo
T09D4152:107b-27: des gzugs dang ldan pa'i dpal dang 'dra ba dang
T09D4152:107b-28: nor bu'i thur ma'i 'od dang 'dra ba dang /
T09D4152:107b-29: dkar po'i phyogs la rnam par byung ba'i zla tshes
T09D4152:107b-30: ltar skye bo rnams kyi mig dang snying la mdzes
T09D4152:107b-31: pa'i bu mo btsas par gyur to //
T09D4152:107b-32: de nas de la gser gyi 'od ces bya ba'i ming gnyen 'dun rnams kyis btags par gyur te /
T09D4152:107b-33: de nas dus gcig gi tshe na de 'dod pa'i
T09D4152:107b-34: rten gyis lang tsho sar bas shin tu nyis 'gyur
T09D4152:107b-35: du gzugs kyi mdzes pa 'dogs par gyur pa /
T09D4152:107b-36: dpyid kyi zla bas nags kyi tshogs 'byung bar gyur
T09D4152:107b-37: pa'i me tog rnams kyis brgyan par byas pa'i shing
T09D4152:107b-38: dang ljon shing rnam par mdzes par byed cing /
T09D4152:107b-39: skya rengs sar pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis kun nas
T09D4152:107b-40: byugs pa'i dbang ba'i gur gum gyis rjes su byugs
T09D4152:107b-41: pa dang 'dra ba'i khang bzangs kyi steng du /
T09D4152:107b-42: grogs mo'i skye bo dang bcas pa pho long gi
T09D4152:107b-43: ral pa'i sgeg pas res kyis 'dre bzhin pa'i dpung
T09D4152:107b-45: ljon shing bzhin du dkar ba ma yin pa'i 'gro
T09D4152:107b-46: ba kha lo sgyur ba'i dbang gis dma' bar gyur
T09D4152:107b-47: pa dang mtho bar gyur pa 'phros pa'i rgyan gyi
T09D4152:107b-48: nor bu rnams kyi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis lus
T09D4152:108a-2: rnam par chad pa'i mu tig gi chun po'i skud
T09D4152:108a-3: pa las rnam par lhung ba'i mu tig tshogs 'thor
T09D4152:108a-4: bar gyur pas gser gyi za ma tog dang rjes
T09D4152:108a-5: su mthun pa'i nu ma gnyis dang ldan pa /
T09D4152:108a-6: rnam par bskyod pa'i mig gi 'bras bu 'dres pa'i
T09D4152:108a-7: mig rnam par 'phrog pa'i bung ba'i tshogs kyis rjes
T09D4152:108a-9: autpa la'i 'dab ma rnams dang 'dra ba'i phyogs rnams mthong bar byed cing /
T09D4152:108a-10: kun nas ngal ba'i dbang gis kun nas 'byung bzhin
T09D4152:108a-11: pa'i rdul gyi thigs pa'i tshogs kyis sin dhu ra'i
T09D4152:108a-12: khyad par can dang 'khrugs pas kun nas lhung ba'i
T09D4152:108a-13: rna ba'i me tog gi phreng ba dang skra lo
T09D4152:108a-15: grogs mo'i kyi pho long gi rtse ba gsal ba
T09D4152:108a-16: 'di las log par mdzod cig / khyed ni shin
T09D4152:108a-17: tu ngal ba ste shir sha'i me tog sar pa
T09D4152:108a-18: ltar 'jam pa'i yan lag rnams la nyi ma 'di
T09D4152:108a-20: khyed la ngal ba'i rgyu zhes bya ba grogs mo'i
T09D4152:108a-21: skye bos rnam par zlog par gyur pa rol pa
T09D4152:108a-22: las rnam par bzlog nas mdzes pa thigs pa nyid
T09D4152:108a-23: du nye bar song bzhin pa la yang dag par
T09D4152:108a-24: 'gegs pa rdul gyi thigs pa'i tshogs gos kyi mtha'
T09D4152:108a-25: las phyis te / stan la nye bar 'dug ste /
T09D4152:108a-26: 'khor gyi skye bo rnams kyis lag pas rlung g-yab
T09D4152:108a-27: thogs pas rlung gi yang dag par reg pas mig
T09D4152:108a-28: zum par byas pas ngal so bar byed cing /
T09D4152:108a-29: khyim dang nye bar song ba'i me tog gi gzhu
T09D4152:108a-30: dang ldan pa dang 'dra bar cung zad lang tsho
T09D4152:108a-31: dad nye bar mdzes pa nye bar bsags pa /
T09D4152:108a-32: rgyal po gser gyi blon po'i sras la dbugs phyung
T09D4152:108a-33: bas yid la byung ba'i rnam par 'gyur ba yang
T09D4152:108a-34: dag par mtshon pa yun ring por 'bras bu mi
T09D4152:108a-35: g-yo ba'i lta ba kun nas bcings par gyur to
T09D4152:108a-36: // phrad 'dod bcas par blon po'i sras kyis de la yang //
T09D4152:108a-37: dbugs kyi byung bas kun nas mtshon pa'i 'dod can gyi //
T09D4152:108a-38: bu mo'i ljon shing dgod pas yid 'ong me tog can //
T09D4152:108a-39: de la myos bzhin lta ba'i bu mo 'gro bar gyur //
T09D4152:108a-40: phan tshun min par gtad pa'i srog shing gcig dag la //
T09D4152:108a-41: dgod pa'i rol pas gsol ba'i so phreng 'od ldan pa //
T09D4152:108a-42: de dag gis ni yid dag 'dod lhas sbyar ba ste //
T09D4152:108a-43: myur du gzhu ni lhag par bdungs par byed pa yis //
T09D4152:108a-44: me tog mtshon cha nya bas skul bar byed pa ni //
T09D4152:108b-0: gsal ba'i rol pas mchil pa @108b yis ni bu mo yi //
T09D4152:108b-1: rten pa srab pa chu yi rten la mthar spyod pa //
T09D4152:108b-2: blon po'i sras kyi sems kyi nya ni 'dzin byas gyur //
T09D4152:108b-3: de nas der ni mig dang nges 'brel de la ni //
T09D4152:108b-4: dga' byed kun nas bris pa 'dra ba mthong nas de //
T09D4152:108b-5: grogs mo rnams kyi skye bo de ni skad cig dgod //
T09D4152:108b-6: de yang cung zad thur du lta ba byung bar gyur //
T09D4152:108b-7: de rnams dga' ba'i grogs mo song bar gyur pa la //
T09D4152:108b-8: mi skyong bdag las skyes pa khyim gyi nang zhugs gyur //
T09D4152:108b-9: blon po'i sras kyang shin tu phrad par 'dod pa ni //
T09D4152:108b-10: de la bcings pa'i yid ldan khyim du song bar gyur //
T09D4152:108b-11: de nas dus gcig gi tshe na 'di ltar rnam
T09D4152:108b-12: par mthong ba tsam gyis sreg lugs kyi 'dod pa'i
T09D4152:108b-13: mi rnam par 'phel ba kun nas skya ba dang
T09D4152:108b-14: yongs su rid pa'i 'gram pa dang ldan pa /
T09D4152:108b-15: rtag tu dbugs rngub pas gnyid dang bral bas mi
T09D4152:108b-16: g-yo ba'i mig nyid kyis 'khor gyi skye bos phan
T09D4152:108b-17: tshun gyi rnam par shes pa de dag gi lus
T09D4152:108b-18: dag rab tu srab pa nyid du song bar gyur
T09D4152:108b-19: to // so sor rtog dang bral ba'i phyir //
T09D4152:108b-20: kun rtog dbang gis skye bo la //
T09D4152:108b-21: skyon ni tshol ba yid byung 'di //
T09D4152:108b-22: rnam par 'gyur bar khrid pa nyid //
T09D4152:108b-23: de nas dus gcig gi tshe na dga' ston la
T09D4152:108b-24: 'jug pas rab tu dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs
T09D4152:108b-25: pa'i bya ba rnams kyis skye bo kun nas khyab
T09D4152:108b-26: pa'i mi'i bdag po'i pho brang la /
T09D4152:108b-27: yun ring bos nub pa'i nyin mo byed pa'i snang
T09D4152:108b-28: bas kun nas skya ba dang dmar ba'i chu bdag
T09D4152:108b-29: gi phyogs la gnas kyi srog shing du 'gro bar
T09D4152:108b-30: 'dod pa dang / mngon par phyogs pa'i rab tu
T09D4152:108b-31: 'gul ba'i mgrin pa dang ldan pa mgrin pa sngon
T09D4152:108b-32: 'dod pa dang / po dang / khyim bya rnams
T09D4152:108b-33: yod pa la bud med gzhon nu ma'i mig gi
T09D4152:108b-34: 'bras bu nag po ltar mun pa'i tshogs bsal bas
T09D4152:108b-35: mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa rnam par lta bzhin
T09D4152:108b-36: pa ma yin pa'i sa la rab tu 'bar bzhin
T09D4152:108b-37: pa'i me'i 'od kyis kun nas snang ba'i khyim gyi
T09D4152:108b-39: 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig tu mngon par gsal bar gyur
T09D4152:108b-40: pa'i zas kyi tshogs dad ldan pa'i nam mkhang [*mkha']
T09D4152:108b-41: la rnam par bral bas phrad par 'dod pa'i dur
T09D4152:108b-42: pa pho mo gnyis dang ldan pa'i kun nas 'dzum
T09D4152:108b-43: par byas pa'i padma'i 'byung gnas yod pa rnams la
T09D4152:108b-44: / cung zad sa 'dzin gyi rtse mos bar du
T09D4152:108b-45: chod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i shar phyogs kyi
T09D4152:108b-46: cha la gsal bzhin par snang ba'i ri bong gi
T09D4152:109a-2: dus btab pa'i blon po'i sras sgra grag pa'i rkang gdub dang /
T09D4152:109a-3: ska rags kyi tshogs kyis brgyan par byas pa'i rkang pa gnyis dang /
T09D4152:109a-4: rked pa'i cha dang ldan pa'i bcos pa'i nu ma
T09D4152:109a-5: dag gis mtho bar gyur pa'i bud med kyi stod
T09D4152:109a-6: g-yogs sar pa'i me tog ba ku la'i phreng bas
T09D4152:109a-7: kun nas gang pa'i dpung pa'i phyogs la sgra los
T09D4152:109a-8: 'dud pa dang / dpral ba'i dbus la sin dhu ras ri mo bris pa dang /
T09D4152:109a-9: rkang pa'i long bu'i mthar srab cing mthug pa'i gos rab tu 'phyang ba dang /
T09D4152:109a-10: yun ring po nas 'dud pa'i ne tso'i dmar ba
T09D4152:109a-11: nyid kyi dus las byung ba'i dkrigs pa'i bu med
T09D4152:109a-12: kyi cha lugs su byas nas pho nya mo dang
T09D4152:109a-14: gser gyi snang ba'i grogs mo zhes bya ba 'di dbugs phyung ba'i sgo nas /
T09D4152:109a-15: blon po dang ldan pa'i sa'i bdag po'i pho brang du zhugs te /

T09D4152:112a-29: nges bsags 'pho ba chang 'tshong ma yis tshong sa'i mthar //
T09D4152:112a-30: 'pho ba sgro yis stong pa ltong ni chags pa dang //
T09D4152:112a-31: rgyus pa lhod pa kun nas dor bar byas pa ni //
T09D4152:112a-32: kun nas rnyings pa'i mda' rnams kyi ni dum bu yis //
T09D4152:112a-33: g-yang sa'i bu yi lhag gnas gsal byas 'ga' zhig tu //
T09D4152:112a-34: padma rnams lhung 'ga' zhig tu yang rnga dang ni //
T09D4152:112a-35: gzhan du yang ni gtsug phud dmar ba'i sgro tshogs kyis //
T09D4152:112a-36: ba rnams kyis ni ro la rab dor dri ma can //
T09D4152:112a-37: rva rnams kyis ni kun nas rngon pa'i khyim mtshon byas //
T09D4152:112a-38: me tog dum bur song ba'i 'pho ba ma mo'i phreng //
T09D4152:112a-39: dbang phyug khyim gyi par gyi sa ni 'gegs byas pa //
T09D4152:112a-40: g-yul ngor 'thab pa'i gzugs ni 'dzin par byed pa na /
T09D4152:112a-41: shi ba kun nas dor ba'i rkang pas shin tu khyab //
T09D4152:112a-42: khyim gyi rtsig pa zhig pas chag cing skams pa ni //
T09D4152:112b-0: lhod pa'i chu shing tshogs kyis nye 'khor @112b nang bsags pa //
T09D4152:112b-1: rgya shug shing gis bzung zhing skyes pa ku ba'i shing //
T09D4152:112b-2: gnas la stod g-yogs bral ba'i 'ug pa'i snang bas brten //
T09D4152:112b-3: tshang las lhung bas dbus su brlan pa 'ga' nig tu ni nang //
T09D4152:112b-4: phug ron sgo nga'i dum bu rnams kyis khyim gyis bsags pa //
T09D4152:112b-5: gzhan du rno zhing 'dres pa sar ba min dang sar rnams kyis //
T09D4152:112b-6: 'ga' zhig bar chad med pa'i dum bu rnams kyis kun nas khyab //
T09D4152:112b-7: 'ga' zhig tu yang kha skyes dbyug pa dma' bar bya ba'i yan lag gis //
T09D4152:112b-8: zho ni srub bar nges pa'i kun nas bsags pa'i 'o ma phyugs kyi lhas //
T09D4152:112b-9: kun nas dri ma can dang rnying ba rnams kyis
T09D4152:112b-10: gzhan du khyab pas chag / lhod cing bar chad
T09D4152:112b-11: rtsib ma sha re ka yi dra ba rnams kyis
T09D4152:112b-12: khyab // de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang
T09D4152:112b-13: bcas pa gtor ma rgyas pa'i skad kyis gnyid sad
T09D4152:112b-14: pas kun nas dogs pa'i bya koo shi kas lhag
T09D4152:112b-15: par gnas bzhin pa'i n+ya gro dha'i bar dang ldan
T09D4152:112b-16: pa'i khyim 'ga' zhig tu gnyid kyis mtshan mo 'das
T09D4152:112b-17: pa dang skar ma'i tshogs rab tu bar chad par
T09D4152:112b-19: khyod shi ba'i 'gram pa kun nas skya pa ltar
T09D4152:112b-20: gzugs srab ba'i nub pa'i ri'i rtse mo 'dzin pa'i
T09D4152:112b-21: bsil ba'i 'od zer yod pa la /
T09D4152:112b-22: phan chun yang dag par sbyong bzhin pas rab tu
T09D4152:112b-23: dga' ba padma'i sdong bu la rkang pa gzhag pa
T09D4152:112b-24: dang ldan pa'i dur pa pho mo gnyis yod pa
T09D4152:112b-25: dang / ri bong can gyi 'od zer la kun
T09D4152:112b-26: nas chags pa dang bral ba'i mya ngan dang 'dra
T09D4152:112b-27: bar ku mu ta'i 'byung gnas kun nas zum pa
T09D4152:112b-28: dang / la / bung ba'i phreng ba 'khor ba'i
T09D4152:112b-29: pi wang gi sgras rab tu sad pa dang 'dra
T09D4152:112b-30: bar rnam par 'phro bzhin pa'i padma'i gdong dang ldan
T09D4152:112b-31: pa bskyod pa'i rlabs kyis lag pas rag pa'i 'gram
T09D4152:112b-32: dang 'brel pa dbu ba'i gdu bu dang ldan pa
T09D4152:112b-33: dang / la / / sgra sgrogs pa'i ngang ba'i
T09D4152:112b-34: rkang gdub dang ldan pa'i padmo'i bud med rnams yod
T09D4152:112b-35: dang / la / / pa la / kha phye
T09D4152:112b-36: ba'i dza ba'i me tog gi phung po ltar mngon
T09D4152:112b-37: par gsal bzhin pa'i dkyil 'khor can gyi nyi ma
T09D4152:112b-38: dang / la / / pa la / yod ba
T09D4152:112b-39: dang / nyi ma'i 'od zer gzhon nus rjes su
T09D4152:112b-40: mchod bzhin pa'i rtse mo'i mdung dang ldan pa'i sa
T09D4152:112b-42: de'i dus dang rjes su mthun pa'i mal stan las langs te /
T09D4152:112b-43: kun nas 'khor bas grong khyer de mthong zhing 'di bsams par gyur te /
T09D4152:113a-0: 'dir ni bstan bcos du ma rnams kyis kun @113a * //
T09D4152:113a-1: nas 'phel ba'i mdzes pa'i gtam 'byung ste //
T09D4152:113a-2: sgeg pa'i nyams kyis 'jam pa'i bha ra ta yi gar ni 'di las 'byung 'gyur te //
T09D4152:113a-3: rten nas 'jigs par 'gyur ba ci zhig 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa //
T09D4152:113a-4: ae ma de ltar grong khyer 'di ni phug ron rnams kyi skad kyi smra ba 'dra //
T09D4152:113a-5: de nas der cung zad longs ma spyad pas gu
T09D4152:113a-6: shing gi 'dab ma ltar ljang ser chu nang gi
T09D4152:113a-7: rtsa'i tshogs kyis rdzing bu'i chu bkab pa dang /
T09D4152:113a-8: phag rnams kyis gnas bzang po dang mon lug dang
T09D4152:113a-9: ka she ru ka rnams rtse ba nas 'don pa

T09D4152:113a-11: ti la ka'i sdong po dang /
T09D4152:113a-12: tsam pa ka'i sdong po nub pa dang /
T09D4152:113a-13: nags kyi ma he rgal ba rnams kyi rva 'phangs pas kun nas 'phur ba dang /
T09D4152:113a-14: kun nas 'brel bzhin pa'i bung ba rnams kyis rdzing
T09D4152:113a-15: bu'i padma kun nas 'gro bas mdzes pa 'das pa
T09D4152:113a-16: dang 'dra ba rjes su bsam zhing skyed mos tshal
T09D4152:113a-17: rnying par rab tu zhugs par gyur to ;
T09D4152:113a-18: / der yang ma ral ba dri ma can gyi gos kyis yan lag bkab pa /
T09D4152:113a-19: skra lo dang lag pa kun nas rtsub pa /
T09D4152:113a-20: me tog gi yal ga la lag pas 'dzin pa /
T09D4152:113a-21: yal ga la gnas pa'i ri dags rnams mthong nas
T09D4152:113a-22: ngo mtshar ba las yang dag par skyes pa'i 'dzum
T09D4152:113a-23: pas gsal bzhin pa'i so'i nor bu'i 'od zer rnams
T09D4152:113a-24: kyis snang bar byas pa'i me tog ban du ka
T09D4152:113a-25: ltar shin tu dmar ba'i mchu dang ldan pa dang
T09D4152:113a-27: yongs su smin pa'i rtsva'i rgyal po'i 'bras bu ltar
T09D4152:113a-28: rjes su mthun pa'i 'o ma 'dzin pa dang ldan
T09D4152:113a-29: pa / chu 'dzin pa'i khyim gyi nang du rol
T09D4152:113a-30: par byed pa'i glog gi bu mo dang 'dra ba'i
T09D4152:113a-31: bu mos me tog rnams thu zhing mthong bar gyur
T09D4152:113a-32: pa / to // de'i drung du nye bar 'ongs te de la dris par gyur te /
T09D4152:113a-33: skye bo med pa'i grong khyer 'di ni ci phyir khyod //
T09D4152:113a-34: mig gi mtha' ma'i zim par song ba'i mig mthar ldan //
T09D4152:113a-35: skye bo rnams kyis ma mthong ba yi gzugs mdzes pa //
T09D4152:113a-36: gzugs dang ldan pa nya phyis son pa'i me tog 'dra //
T09D4152:113a-38: bdag ni rgyal po'i bu mo ste dbang po las
T09D4152:113a-39: 'das par grong khyer 'di gnod sbyin drug cu tsam
T09D4152:113a-40: gyis mi dang mi'i skye bo dang /
T09D4152:113a-41: glang po che dang rta dang ba glang dang ma he rnams mngon par byas pa ste /
T09D4152:113a-42: bdag ni gcig pu nye ba rnams kyi mya ngan
T09D4152:113b-0: gyis sdug bsngal bsags @113b pa skal ba dman pa'i
T09D4152:113b-1: drag po de rnams kyis rang nyid la pa snyen
T09D4152:113b-2: bkur gyi don du lhag mar byas pa ni //
T09D4152:113b-3: gang la n+ya gro dha'i shing 'di //
T09D4152:113b-4: sdong khang du ba ltar 'od med //
T09D4152:113b-5: gnod sbyin de rnams rnam 'gyur ba //
T09D4152:113b-7: de phyir 'bad ldan khyod kyis ni //
T09D4152:113b-8: shin tu legs par gnas par bya //
T09D4152:113b-9: kun tu dus kun skyes pa rnams //
T09D4152:113b-10: gang phyir bag yod 'byor ba'i phyir //
T09D4152:113b-11: gzhan yang skal pa chen po /
T09D4152:113b-12: nor bu mdzes pa'i skye ba ltar ni bdag mdzes pa //
T09D4152:113b-13: khyod kyi rnam pa nyid ni che ba nyid ni smra //
T09D4152:113b-14: de lta na yang bdag gis khyod kyi ming rtogs phyir //
T09D4152:113b-15: 'dod de gang phyir bud med rnams ni phra ba'i blo //
T09D4152:113b-16: de nas byang chub sems dpas de la rang gi gtam smras pa /
T09D4152:113b-17: des kyang gtam thos pa padma'i 'dab ma dang rjes
T09D4152:113b-18: su mthun ba'i rkang pa'i mthe bong gis sa la
T09D4152:113b-19: cung zad 'bri zhing dpung pa'i yal ga logs 'dzin
T09D4152:113b-20: cing cung zad gos kyi kha tshar kun nas g-yo
T09D4152:113b-21: bar byed cing thur du 'dud pa'i bzhin dang ldan
T09D4152:113b-22: pa ae ma'o // gal te rnam pa dang bcas
T09D4152:113b-23: par 'dir bdag ni chun ma nyid du nye bar
T09D4152:113b-24: 'dod pa yin na de bas bdag gi bud med
T09D4152:113b-25: nyid don dang bcas par 'gyur zhes zer ro //
T09D4152:113b-26: 'dod pa dang ldan bzhin pa yang ngo tsha bas
T09D4152:113b-27: mi smra zhing bud med 'dod pa dang bcas pas
T09D4152:113b-28: 'dod pa can la khyod kyis bdag ji ltar 'dod
T09D4152:113b-29: par gyis shig ces bya ba ji lta ba bzhin
T09D4152:113b-31: de bas na bdag ni zhe 'dod kyis bdag po
T09D4152:113b-32: dngos po 'di la gsal bar bya'o snyam du rnam
T09D4152:113b-33: par bsams nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa
T09D4152:113b-34: // rang gi 'dod pa yid gnas pa //
T09D4152:113b-35: khyod la cung zad smra bar 'dod //
T09D4152:113b-36: de ni bdag gi ngo tsha ba //
T09D4152:113b-37: chun ma ltar ni yang yang 'gegs //
T09D4152:113b-38: de yi 'dod pa de yang ni //
T09D4152:113b-39: blo gros chen po des shes nas //
T09D4152:113b-40: ngo tshas 'dud pa'i mig yangs pa //
T09D4152:113b-41: mchog gi gdong can blangs par gyur //
T09D4152:113b-42: de nas grong khyer rnying par kun nas 'ongs nas ni //
T09D4152:113b-43: de dang rjes su song ste pho drang du zhugs nas //
T09D4152:113b-44: de yi rnyed pa bsdus dang ldan pa smras nas ni //
T09D4152:113b-45: gnod sbyin nyer 'ongs de rnams la ni de smras so //
T09D4152:113b-46: de nas kha lo bas ni myur du mtshon cha dang ldan pa //
T09D4152:113b-47: rta rnams sbyor ba shing rta 'thab pa'i phyir ni de byed bcug //
T09D4152:113b-48: ma mchu mnan nas gzhu ni bdungs te mtho ba'i dpung par ldan //
T09D4152:114a-1: pa'i lus ni skyong ba skad cig de la bcings //
T09D4152:114a-2: rkang pa myur bar gsang ba pa ni de rnams yongs byas te //
T09D4152:114a-3: shing rta mchog la gnas pa dpung pa de mthong nas //
T09D4152:114a-4: khros pas 'bar ba'i mig ni me yi 'od ldan pa //
T09D4152:114a-5: rtse mo rno ba'i me ni sprul pa'i mda' rnams btang par gyur //
T09D4152:114a-6: dpung pa'i tsha ba go char ldan pa de yi lus la ni //
T09D4152:114a-7: gsang ba pas bskul mda' rnams kyis kyang sgra ni 'byung ba ste //
T09D4152:114a-8: kun nas skrag pas shin tu rgyug 'dra'i ri dags rnams kyis ni //
T09D4152:114a-9: ri yi mtha' mar rmig par sbyar ba'i dgra dang rjes su mthun //
T09D4152:114a-10: gnod sbyin 'di rnams pham par gyur pa rnams la g-yul ngor ni //
T09D4152:114a-11: skye bo chen po'i yun ring du ni zhi bar 'byung 'gyur te //
T09D4152:114a-12: de ltar rnam bsams snying rje che bar yang ni der gyur nas //
T09D4152:114a-13: don yod stobs kyi mthu dang ldan pas gzhu ni 'dzin par gyur //
T09D4152:114a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i yang dang yang du ltung ba ni //
T09D4152:114a-15: mda' ni de rnams zad pa cung zad byas mi 'gyur //
T09D4152:114a-16: nges par de nyid kyang ni chen po 'byung 'gyur te //
T09D4152:114a-17: bsod nams mthu de gang phyir sdug bsngal ma gyur to //
T09D4152:114a-18: de nas de yi rno 'phangs pa //
T09D4152:114a-19: mda' rnams gnod sbyin lus 'bigs pa //
T09D4152:114a-20: rna ba'i mthar ni khu tshur bcangs //
T09D4152:114a-21: rtag tu sbyar ba 'dra bar gyur //
T09D4152:114a-22: gnod sbyin gyis dor de'i go char //
T09D4152:114a-23: mda' rnams 'bras bu bcom par gyur //
T09D4152:114a-24: skal ba med pas thob dka' ba'i //
T09D4152:114a-25: dngos po la ni yid re bzhin //
T09D4152:114a-26: shing rta chen po stegs kyi 'dra bar 'gyur ba ste //
T09D4152:114a-27: dbyangs ni bha sha ta byas sgra dang 'dra bar gnas //
T09D4152:114a-28: gzhu chen rtse mo mtho ba gnya' shing 'dra ba ste //
T09D4152:114a-29: mi dbang sras po des kyang sbyin sreg byed pa 'dra //
T09D4152:114a-30: lha dang grub thob klu rnams kyis ni mthong bzhin pa //
T09D4152:114a-31: skad cig lhung ba'i mda' rnams bud shing tshogs ldan pa //
T09D4152:114a-32: 'di lta bu yi g-yul ngo'i rta cang de la ni //
T09D4152:114a-33: gnod sbyin rnams kyang rang nyid kyis ni phyugs song gyur //
T09D4152:114a-34: de nas bsad pa'i lhag ma gnod sbyin de rnams
T09D4152:114a-35: la mda' rnams kyis yan lag la rma btod pas
T09D4152:114a-37: nus pa zad pa rab tu 'dar ba thob pa
T09D4152:114a-38: rnams la gsang ba pa gcig de dang nye bar
T09D4152:114a-39: 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa //
T09D4152:114a-40: khyab bdag nga ni khyod kyi grogs te 'byor ba'i phyir //
T09D4152:114a-41: de phyir ring po nas ni gzhu ni dbab par mdzod //
T09D4152:114a-42: rgyal ster shin tu che ba mdzod kyi phun tshogs ni //
T09D4152:114b-0: @114b gter du byas pas 'di dag la ni rab brtan bgyi //
T09D4152:114b-1: de ltar bgyi zhes bya bas phan tshun du mda'
T09D4152:114b-2: dang bcas par byang chub sems dpa' khas blangs pa
T09D4152:114b-3: la gnod sbyin de 'ongs nas gter mang po gter
T09D4152:114b-4: skyong rnams kyis lhag par bsrung ba brkos nas nye
T09D4152:114b-6: kun nas yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon
T09D4152:114b-7: tan rnams kyi che ba'i bdag nyid skye bo'i gnas
T09D4152:114b-8: rnams la rab tu grags par gyur to //
T09D4152:114b-9: de nas rab tu dga' ba'i yid la ldan pa'i skye bo'i gnas rnams re ldi dang /
T09D4152:114b-12: glang po che'i phru gu rnams la yo byad rnam
T09D4152:114b-13: pa sna tshogs pa dang snod rnams kun nas bkal
T09D4152:114b-14: ba ni / stobs mchog yul rnams bor nas ni //
T09D4152:114b-15: gzhan dag tsher ma med pa rnams //
T09D4152:114b-16: tsher ma med cing nyer 'tshe med //
T09D4152:114b-17: grong khyer chen po der 'ongs gyur //
T09D4152:114b-18: tshong rnams 'tshong bar byed pa ni //
T09D4152:114b-19: nyi ma re rer nye bar yang //
T09D4152:114b-20: bar chad med par skye tshogs kyis //
T09D4152:114b-21: slar tshong sa gang bar gyur //
T09D4152:114b-22: sin dhu ras dmar dpral 'bor can //
T09D4152:114b-23: ae la bcag ltar dri zhim pa'i //
T09D4152:114b-24: glang po rnams kyi smyon chu slar //
T09D4152:114b-25: ka ba dri zhim slar skyes gyur //
T09D4152:114b-26: tho rangs seng ge'i khrir gnas pa //
T09D4152:114b-27: mi skyong gser gyi go cha la //
T09D4152:114b-28: skye bo 'thab pas bgrod dka' ba'i //
T09D4152:114b-30: zug rngu nye ba'i sa rnams ri bong ma chon pa'i 'od //
T09D4152:114b-31: chu bo gtsang ba'i chu yis bu ram shing rnams spangs //
T09D4152:114b-32: thong lcags kyis ni mon lug rnam par 'bigs bzhin pa //
T09D4152:114b-33: dri zhim zhing gis rnams slar ni byung bar gyur //
T09D4152:114b-34: ba glang phru gus kun nas khyab pa'i nye 'khor gyi //
T09D4152:114b-35: khyim rnams su ni slar yang gtun shing dgra rnams ni //
T09D4152:114b-36: bud med rnams kyi gdu bu'i sgras ni rjes 'brel ba //
T09D4152:114b-37: me tog rnams kyis mchod pa kun nas thos par gyur //
T09D4152:114b-38: bud med rnams ni me tog ldan ba'i lus can la //
T09D4152:114b-39: kun nas gtor ma rnams ni slar yang 'dzin par gyur //
T09D4152:114b-40: gnyis med sngags kyi tshig dang rjes 'brel gyis gtsang ba //
T09D4152:114b-41: slar ni mar gyi srag lugs me la nges par lhung //
T09D4152:114b-42: nyi ma song la nags kyi mtha' nas ba rnams ni //

T09D4152:114b-44: kun nas dal ba'i rkang pa slar ni lci ba yi //

T09D4152:115a-2: gsal zla zla tshes ldan pa'i mtshan mo rnams la ni //

T09D4152:115a-12: slong pa'i skye bos grong gi nye 'khor nang du kun nas khyab pa ni //
T09D4152:115a-13: slar yang mdzes pa nye bar bsags pa der ni yul rnams 'byung bar gyur //

T09D4152:115a-15: mngon par 'phel bzhin pas dga' bar gyur pa'i sras
T09D4152:115a-16: kyi che ba nyid de nye bar thos nas de

T09D4152:115a-22: ba sngon du 'gro bas byang chub sems dpa' la
T09D4152:115a-23: zhus pa / ae ma khyod kyi dpung pa la ni rgyas min stobs //
T09D4152:115a-24: ae ma yid ni bsam pa'i khyad par gyis bstan pa ;
T09D4152:115a-25: / gcig bu nyid gyis shes bya khyed kyis pham pa gang //
T09D4152:115a-26: sa skyong rang bzhin gyis ni drag pa'i gnod sbyin rnams //
T09D4152:115a-27: 'di la ci zhig shin tu ngo mtshar ngo mtshar 'dod //
T09D4152:115a-28: khyod kyi 'di ni brtson 'grus grogs ldan sems ldan pa'i //
T09D4152:115a-29: glang po rnams kyi tshogs ni mthong nas yid stobs kyis //
T09D4152:115a-30: nam yang gnya' ral can ni bkum pa nyer 'gro min //
T09D4152:115a-31: 'jig rten tsher ma rtsad nas bton pa chen po nyid //
T09D4152:115a-32: dri med mthong ba'i sems ldan rnams kyi gzhan don nyid //
T09D4152:115a-33: 'gro ba kun nas bde phyir 'od zer rnams kyis ni //
T09D4152:115a-34: dri med 'od zer can gyi rang bzhin 'di nyid do //
T09D4152:115a-35: de bas na skye bo'i gnas 'di mgon po dang bcas pa ste /
T09D4152:115a-36: gang gi mthu chen po dang ldan pa khyed cag lta bu srung pa po yod ces zer ro //
T09D4152:115a-37: byang chub sems dpas smras pa //
T09D4152:115a-39: rgyal ba'i phyir ni nus mi 'gyur //
T09D4152:115a-40: rgyal dka' nyon mongs gnod sbyin de //
T09D4152:115a-41: ji ltar bdag gis pham par 'gyur //
T09D4152:115b-0: @115b gal te bcos ma'i grong khyer ni //
T09D4152:115b-1: zhugs phyir bdag la the tshom yod //
T09D4152:115b-2: mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer de //
T09D4152:115b-4: gal te brtson 'grus kyis rgyal srid //
T09D4152:115b-6: chos kyi rgyal srid bdag ji ltar //
T09D4152:115b-8: grong khyer phun tshogs chen po 'di //
T09D4152:115b-9: gal te byed par mi 'gyur na //
T09D4152:115b-10: de tshe slob ma'i brgyud pa ni //
T09D4152:115b-11: ji ltar rgyas par khrid par 'gyur //
T09D4152:115b-13: gang khyod kyi ni 'di lta bu yi spyod pa ngo mtshar ba //
T09D4152:115b-14: sems can don du brtson pa'i rnam par gnon pas dag pa'i blo //
T09D4152:115b-15: gang zhig go 'phang de ni thub chen rnams kyis lhag gnas pa //
T09D4152:115b-16: de ni khyed kyis ji ltar mi thob snyam du nges par bya //
T09D4152:115b-17: 'di ni ma 'ongs pa yi rgyal ba yon tan rnams kyi rten //
T09D4152:115b-18: snying rje khyed kyis yun ni ring por ci yi phyir ni 'gegs //
T09D4152:115b-19: de ltar khyed ni blo yi gter lags phrad par 'dod 'dra ba'i //
T09D4152:115b-20: byang chub bud med kyis ni yun ring por ni sdod par bgyi //
T09D4152:115b-21: seng ge'i khri la gnas pa mngon par rdzogs pa'i
T09D4152:115b-22: byang chub thob pa khyed kyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
T09D4152:115b-23: rnams gcod par byed pa'i chos dang 'brel pa'i gtam
T09D4152:115b-24: gang rnams nges par legs pa 'dod pa thob par
T09D4152:115b-25: 'gyur ba de rnams ni rnam pa thams cad du
T09D4152:115b-27: de lta na 'di nyid 'jig rten pa thams cad
T09D4152:115b-28: la shin tu phan pas 'jug pa'i bcom ldan 'das
T09D4152:115b-29: 'di so so skye bo'i gnas skabs su yang byung
T09D4152:115b-30: bar gyur to zhes bya ba rnam par bsams nas
T09D4152:115b-31: dad pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i bsam pa can
T09D4152:115b-32: gyi rigs kyi bu grol bar 'dod pas sangs rgyas
T09D4152:115b-33: bcom ldan 'das la dang bas rtsi gcig par gnas
T09D4152:115b-35: gser gyi go cha'i skyes pa'i rabs te skyes pa'i rabs gsum pa'o /
T09D4152:115b-37: // / dgra yang nad kyis btab na snying rje yis //
T09D4152:115b-38: 'jam pa'i sems ldan btang snyoms mi mdzad de //
T09D4152:115b-39: 'jig rten pa yi gnyen du gyur pa rnams //
T09D4152:115b-40: skye ba ma chad pa la smos ci dgos //
T09D4152:115b-42: rig byed dang rig byed kyi mtha' dang /
T09D4152:115b-43: sngon byung ba'i gtam yang dag par rtogs pa'i don
T09D4152:115b-44: dam par shes pa don dam par mngon par 'dod
T09D4152:115b-45: pa / sems can thams cad la brtse ba dang
T09D4152:115b-46: ldan pa'i bram ze brtse ba can zhes bya ba
T09D4152:116a-1: nyid chen po des kyang nad dang ldan pa rnams
T09D4152:116a-2: kyi nad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir kha
T09D4152:116a-3: ba can dang / man dva ra'i ri dang /
T09D4152:116a-6: 'bigs byed kyi nags kyi nang rnams su sman btsal ba'i phyir rnam par rgyu bar gyur te /
T09D4152:116a-7: de nas lto 'phye rnams kyis bskor ba'i mthug pa dang bcas pa /
T09D4152:116a-8: tsan dan gyi ni nags rnams so ga'i dus la lta byed cing //
T09D4152:116a-9: cog gi rtse mo rnam par lhung bas sprin gyi tshogs rgas pa //
T09D4152:116a-10: dus gcig tshe na grub thob rten ni ma la yar 'khor 'gyur //
T09D4152:116a-11: bya khyung mchu yis kun nas dum pas rnam par 'pho ba ni //
T09D4152:116a-12: pho ba ris ni sar pa phug gi sgo rnams la mthong zhing //
T09D4152:116a-13: rlung gis bskyod pa'i me tog rnams kyi dri ni snom byed cing //
T09D4152:116a-14: brtan pa de ni ngal ba spang phyir bdag la lhag gnas 'gyur //
T09D4152:116a-15: kun nas ngal ba bsal bar byas pa yang dag
T09D4152:116a-16: par blangs te sman chen po rnams kyi rtsa bzor
T09D4152:116a-18: sman gyi khur bu chen po bcings nas da ni
T09D4152:116a-19: 'gro bar bgyis te sman rab tu sbyin pas skye
T09D4152:116a-20: bo nad med par bya'o zhes bya ba rnam par
T09D4152:116a-21: bsams te / ri bo ma la ya nas rab
T09D4152:116a-22: tu gnas bzhin pa shin tu nad chen pos lus
T09D4152:116a-24: rid pa che ba'i mthar spyi'u blugs dang /
T09D4152:116a-25: lhung bzed gzhag pa yongs su smin pa'i rtse'i mal du nye bar gnas pa /
T09D4152:116a-26: mdun du ri dags kyi tshogs 'dug pa /
T09D4152:116a-27: thun mtshams gsar pa dang 'dra ba'i chos gos kyi
T09D4152:116a-28: yan lag la bgos pa nye bar zhi ba'i rang
T09D4152:116a-30: de nas zhi ba de ni mthong nas dul ba la dmigs pa //
T09D4152:116a-31: dpung pa las ni rtsa ba dang bcas khur chen gzhag byas te ;
T09D4152:116a-32: / gus pas dang ba 'dzin pa kun nas 'byung ba ltar ring gnas //
T09D4152:116a-33: sa rdul kun nas 'byor pa'i spyi bos phyag ni btsal bar gyur //
T09D4152:116a-34: 'di la nad med sngon du 'gro bar dge slong des //
T09D4152:116a-35: nad kyis rid par byas pa'i yan lag 'di ltar smras //
T09D4152:116a-36: khyod ni 'jig rten sdug bsngal nye bar zhi phyir ni //
T09D4152:116a-37: 'khor ba rnam gcod sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par
T09D4152:116a-38: shog / bram ze des ni 'di la 'di ltar
T09D4152:116a-39: dris pa ste // 'phags pa lus ni na bar bdag gis mthong ba ni //
T09D4152:116a-40: chags pa zil gyis gnon par gnas pas rab rid pa'i //
T09D4152:116a-41: tshig gis rang sangs rgyas ni de la smra bar gyur //
T09D4152:116b-0: 'di yang grog @116b ma'i tshang dang 'dra ba yi ni lus //
T09D4152:116b-1: las dang brgyud pa'i rgyu rnams kyis ni skyed byas na //
T09D4152:116b-2: sems kyis sdug bsngal byed pa'i 'gro rnams du ma yis //
T09D4152:116b-3: nad kyi lto 'phye rnams kyis kyang ni lhag par gnas //
T09D4152:116b-4: rgas pa'i gnya' ral can mo 'di ni gang gi tshe //
T09D4152:116b-5: mi yi lus la kun nas gnod par byed pa ni //
T09D4152:116b-6: de tshe sdug bsngal gyis ni dbang po'i yul dang bral //
T09D4152:116b-7: sems kyi mche ba gnyis pa nga rgyal dor bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:116b-8: de nas 'chi bdag gzhan ni rgyu mtshan med pa'i
T09D4152:116b-9: dgra / lus kyis rang bzhin khang pa 'di ni
T09D4152:116b-10: 'joms par byed // gang phyir gang la 'joms pa la ni skad cig gis //
T09D4152:116b-11: skye bo'i bya ba thams cad kyis ni spong ba 'byung //
T09D4152:116b-12: shi dang rgas dang nad kyi dgra gsum 'di rnams kyi //
T09D4152:116b-13: las kyis kun nas bskul ba'i skye bos rab tu gnod //
T09D4152:116b-14: rgyun mi 'chad par nyon mongs bsreg lugs za 'byung ba'i //
T09D4152:116b-15: de nyid kyis ni srid 'di 'phags rnams kyis mi 'dod //
T09D4152:116b-16: de ltar dpyad nas khyed ni rnam dpyod la mkhas pa //
T09D4152:116b-17: so sor 'jigs pas lto 'phye dang mtshungs srid pa rnams //
T09D4152:116b-18: zhi ba'i lam la yid kyi re ba rnams zhugs nas //
T09D4152:116b-19: brtson 'grus rang bzhin shing rta la ni lhag gnas mdzod //
T09D4152:116b-20: de nas byang chub sems dpa' ae ma'o legs par bshad pa zhes bya brjod nas /
T09D4152:116b-21: rang rgyal ba de la 'di ltar phyag btsal nas smras pa /
T09D4152:116b-22: legs bshad nor bu'i rnyed pa ni //
T09D4152:116b-23: ma rig rab rib gcod byed pa //
T09D4152:116b-24: dang zab blo chung dam pa yi //
T09D4152:116b-25: rgya mtsho la ni gzhan du phyin //
T09D4152:116b-26: skyes bu dam pas kun nas bskul ba skyes bu yis //
T09D4152:116b-27: chos la brtson 'grus shin tu gsal ba nyid 'gro ste //
T09D4152:116b-28: gzings ni rlung gis rab tu bskul ba 'dra ba ni //
T09D4152:116b-29: chu yi gter la gnas pa'i mkhas pa skya chen 'dzin //
T09D4152:116b-30: de bas na btsun pa la re zhig bdag gis
T09D4152:116b-31: yang dag par bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur pa ji
T09D4152:116b-32: srid du nad 'di las dgon pa chen po dang
T09D4152:116b-33: 'dra ba las kun nas rgal ba zhes bya ba
T09D4152:116b-34: brjod nas / nam mkha'i dbus dang nye bar 'od
T09D4152:116b-35: zer gyi tshogs 'phros pa'i nyi ma yod pa la
T09D4152:116b-36: shing rnams kyis grib ma dang kun 'brel pa dbugs
T09D4152:116b-37: kyi dbang gis kun nas 'phros pa'i lce dang rkan
T09D4152:116b-38: gsal ba mig gi mtha' ma dkar ba rdzing gi
T09D4152:117a-2: brad par 'dod pa chu dang bcas pa'i chu 'dzin
T09D4152:117a-3: pa ltar sngo ba nags kyi ma he'i khyu mchog
T09D4152:117a-5: dri zhim pa'i tsan dan gyi shing gi sdong po
T09D4152:117a-6: rnams la bde blag tu kun nas bskor ba'i lto
T09D4152:117a-7: 'phye rnams yod pa la shin tu drag pa'i nyi
T09D4152:117a-8: ma'i 'od zer 'khyud pas rdul gyi tshogs kun nas
T09D4152:117a-9: tsha ba / lam nas 'gro ba'i skye bo rnams
T09D4152:117a-10: kyis lam rnams rnam par btang bzhin pa rnams yod
T09D4152:117a-11: tsha ba / pa las / ri bo ma la
T09D4152:117a-12: ya'i shing gi khyim bdag rnams kyis byin ba'i yongs
T09D4152:117a-14: dri zhim pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bu
T09D4152:117a-15: can bsod snyoms blangs nas nyi ma'i 'od zer zhi
T09D4152:117a-17: de ni 'dab ma rnams kyi gdugs //
T09D4152:117a-18: che bya 'bras bu za ba yi //
T09D4152:117a-19: rang sangs rgyas la 'dzin par byas //
T09D4152:117a-20: thabs la mkhas pa'i tshong pa ni //
T09D4152:117a-21: gang zhig ngal ba mi sems pa //
T09D4152:117a-22: des ni phyogs bzhi 'khor bzhi pa //
T09D4152:117a-23: rnyed pa chan po thob par 'gyur //
T09D4152:117a-24: byang chub sems dpa' 'di bsams nas //
T09D4152:117a-25: de ltar bsnyen bkur byed bzhin pas //
T09D4152:117a-26: bkres min drag pa'i nyi 'od min //
T09D4152:117a-27: ngal ba yang ni ma brtsis so //
T09D4152:117a-28: gal te 'gro ba'i bla ma mkhas pa rnyed ma gyur //
T09D4152:117a-29: skye bo legs par bshad pa thob par mi 'gyur te //
T09D4152:117a-30: gang zhig nor gyi phyir ni rin chen sar 'gro ba //
T09D4152:117a-31: de ni rin chen khyad par phun tshogs kyis ni sbyar //
T09D4152:117a-32: de ltar de ni 'phags pa 'jug pa bsnyen bkur zhing //
T09D4152:117a-33: brtan pa'i sems can dge ba'i 'bras bu nyer bsags phyir //
T09D4152:117a-34: nyi ma re rer kun nas nyer bsags dang ba ni //
T09D4152:117a-35: skye ba rnyed pa 'bras bcas legs par bsams par gyur //
T09D4152:117a-36: de nas rang rgyal ba de byang chub sems dpa'
T09D4152:117a-37: la shin tu nyis 'gyur gyi dang ba bskyed pa'i
T09D4152:117a-38: don du nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du gnas shing rdzu
T09D4152:117a-39: 'phrul de dang bstan par mdzad de //
T09D4152:117a-40: kun nas rnam par 'phro ba 'od zer khyab pa'i sku //
T09D4152:117a-41: chu dang 'dra ba'i dri med nam mkha' la ni rgal //
T09D4152:117a-42: gser gyi ri dang mtshungs pa mdzes par 'gyur ba ste //
T09D4152:117a-43: padma'i gdan gyi dbus su gnas dbang ldan pa de //
T09D4152:117a-44: skad cig gis ni kun nas phag gi sa la zhugs //
T09D4152:117a-45: rim gyis slar ni nyi ma bzhin du 'char ba ra mdzad //
T09D4152:117b-0: rnal 'byor stobs @117b kyis mang ba nyid ni de bstan te //
T09D4152:117b-1: dpung pa dag las cig car du ni chu dang me //
T09D4152:117b-2: rnam par bskyod pa'i sen mo'i 'od ldan padma yis //
T09D4152:117b-3: mtshungs pa'i phyag gis nyi ma la ni reg par mdzad //
T09D4152:117b-4: skye ba'i 'jigs pa song ba mang ba nyid 'gro 'gyur //
T09D4152:117b-5: nyi ma dag pa'i dbyings ni chu rnams la ni ltar //
T09D4152:117b-6: rdzu 'phrul stobs chan de la 'di ltar bltas nas ni //
T09D4152:117b-7: 'od dang ldan pa dro ba min pa'i 'od can ltar //
T09D4152:117b-8: ring du ring bar mi g-yo mdzad pa'i spyan gnyis ldan //
T09D4152:117b-9: shin tu gnyis skyes gtso bo de ni dga' skyes gyur //
T09D4152:117b-10: de ni rdzu 'phrul gyis ni shin tu dga' bar gyur ba'i mthu //
T09D4152:117b-11: rang sangs rgyas ni mthong bar byas nas dang ba brtan pa yi //
T09D4152:117b-12: rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mkha' la 'grol bar grol gyur te //
T09D4152:117b-13: ze'u 'bru 'bras bu'i rdul gyis lto ba ser skya'i me tog rnams //
T09D4152:117b-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i steng du pus
T09D4152:117b-15: mo rnam par gzhag cing rab tu dga' bas snying
T09D4152:117b-16: khengs par gyur pas spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba
T09D4152:117b-17: rnam par bzhag pas rang rgyal ba de la tshig
T09D4152:117b-18: gi nor bu 'od gsal ba rnams kyis mngon par
T09D4152:117b-19: mchod cid [*cing] gnas par gyur te /
T09D4152:117b-21: khyod kyis kun nas mthong ba la //
T09D4152:117b-22: tshangs pa 'ang ngo mtshar bar gyur na //
T09D4152:117b-23: bdag 'dra so so'i skye ci smos //
T09D4152:117b-24: 'bar ba'i gzi brjid khyod kyis ni //
T09D4152:117b-25: rdzu 'phrul bstan par byed pa la //
T09D4152:117b-26: nam mkha' 'di ni lhag gnas pa //
T09D4152:117b-27: nyi ma gnyis ldan 'dra bar mtshon //
T09D4152:117b-29: ngo mtshar 'phel ba'i bdag nyid che //
T09D4152:117b-30: gzhan la rjes su 'dzin sgrub pa //
T09D4152:117b-31: mkhas pa rnams kyis gsal bar byed //
T09D4152:117b-32: shar phyogs khyad par dran zla ni //
T09D4152:117b-33: bdag gi ngon du snang ba min //
T09D4152:117b-34: chen po dag sems ldan rnams kyi //
T09D4152:117b-35: skye ba gzhan don nyid du yin //
T09D4152:117b-36: gal te bdag ni 'di la nye bar 'gro mi 'gyur //
T09D4152:117b-37: tsan dan shing gis mun par ldan pa ma la ya //
T09D4152:117b-38: khyed kyi bsten bkur byas pa las ni kun 'byung bas //
T09D4152:117b-39: grol ba'i lam gyi sa bon dge ba thob mi 'gyur //
T09D4152:117b-40: bdag la rjes su gzung ba 'dod pas 'dzin byed pa //
T09D4152:117b-41: sku 'di sra ba min pa'i mthu yis lci ba ni //
T09D4152:117b-42: ri bo ma la ya yi nags nang khyed gnas pa //
T09D4152:118a-0: nges par nyon mongs rnams ni zad pa g-yo sgyu @118a * //
T09D4152:118a-2: rgya mtsho rnams ni 'bar ba'i 'od can nor bu 'dzin //
T09D4152:118a-3: chu gter rnams ni shel spyad ltar dkar chu yi ni //
T09D4152:118a-4: shing rnams 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa chen po yang //
T09D4152:118a-5: khyed cag lta bu gzhan don yun ring por ni thob //
T09D4152:118a-6: khyed kyi tshig skud rnams kyi yon tan bstod pa'i me tog phreng //
T09D4152:118a-7: brgyus nas gang zhig dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bras bu bdag gis thob //
T09D4152:118a-8: des ni shes rab kyi ste stobs bcu nyid ni thob byas nas //
T09D4152:118a-9: 'gro ba 'di la srid pa 'jig pa'i rgyur ni
T09D4152:118a-10: bdag gyur cig / de nas rang sangs rgyas de
T09D4152:118a-11: bram ze de'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi phyir smon lam
T09D4152:118a-12: gsan nas yid rab tu dga' bas de nyid du
T09D4152:118a-14: byang chub sems dpas kyang rnyed pa chen po dang 'dra bar rtogs nas //
T09D4152:118a-15: rang sangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi rdul ni spyi bor gzhag byas nas //
T09D4152:118a-16: 'dis ni dang bas ba spu'i bu ga kun nas langs pa dang //
T09D4152:118a-17: ri bo ma la ya'i nags kyi bar nas sman rnyed pa //
T09D4152:118a-18: 'jig rten pa yi nad ni bsal phyir skye bo'i nang du 'gro bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:118a-19: de ltar na bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
T09D4152:118a-20: dbar gyur pa na 'jig rten thams cad kyi nyon
T09D4152:118a-21: mongs pa bsal bar 'dod pas snying rjes rab tu
T09D4152:118a-22: spro bar byas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs rang gi
T09D4152:118a-23: ngal ba lam bltas par rang sangs rgyas nad pa
T09D4152:118a-24: la des bsnyen bkur byas par gyur to //
T09D4152:118a-25: de bas na dge ba'i 'bras bu mngon par 'dod
T09D4152:118a-26: pa'i rigs kyi bus nad pa'i bsnyen bkur byed pa
T09D4152:118a-27: la gus pa ma yin pas gnas par mi bya
T09D4152:118a-28: zhes bya ba'o // rtsa ba can gyi skyes pa'i rabs te skyes pa'i rabs bzhi pa'o /
T09D4152:118a-31: // / bdag slad de ni 'jig rten la bde ba //
T09D4152:118a-32: gang gi 'ga' zhig tu yang sbed pa byed //
T09D4152:118a-33: de yang dgra dang mtshungs pa skyed pa ste //
T09D4152:118a-34: 'jigs pa chen po'i sdug bsngal skyes pa yin //
T09D4152:118a-36: tshogs pa gsum nye bar bsags pa la 'jug pa'i skye bo'i gnas dang /
T09D4152:118a-37: de mngon par 'phel bas kun nas tshim pa'i rigs kyi gnas dang /
T09D4152:118a-38: dge spyod dang bram ze'i skye bo'i spyod pas gtsang ba dang /
T09D4152:118a-39: rtag tu lo legs pas rab tu dga' ba'i grong
T09D4152:118a-40: dang lha'i rigs kyi nang du 'jug pa'i gar byed
T09D4152:118a-41: pa mthong bas legs par smra ba'i grong ba'i tshogs

T09D4152:126a-1: grong khyer dang 'dra bar lhag par mdzes pa can byed du bcug go //

T09D4152:128b-13: bu'am de bzhin chung ma dang //

T09D4152:128b-22: dga' ba rnams ni mthong dang sna tshogs gtam ni thos yin te //

T09D4152:129a-0: de nas btsun mos gtsug gi @129a * //

T09D4152:129a-3: bstan par byas nas khyod kyis kyang pa'i khyim du

T09D4152:129a-11: 'gyur ram zhes bya ba yang dang yang du mchi
T09D4152:129a-12: ma'i thigs pa'i phreng ba bar ma chad pa'i mu
T09D4152:129a-13: tig brgyud pa dang 'dra ba rnams kyis gser gyi
T09D4152:129a-14: padma kha zum pa'i rnam pa can gyi 'o ma
T09D4152:129a-15: 'dzin pa gnyis bangs par gyur to //
T09D4152:129a-16: de yang 'ongs par gyur bzhin pa mthong nas /
T09D4152:129a-17: nor bzangs kyi 'khor gyi skye bo mchi ma dang

T09D4152:130a-28: bdag la yang ni bzod par 'os //
T09D4152:130a-29: sman chen bdud rtsi 'di dang ni //
T09D4152:130a-30: dam pa yi ge 'di yang ni //
T09D4152:130a-31: bdag nyid chen po de nyid la //
T09D4152:130a-32: sor gdub 'di yang sbyin par mdzod //
T09D4152:130a-33: de yang khyed kyis bdag gi tshig gis 'di ltar
T09D4152:130a-34: brjod par mdzod cig ci ltar bdud rtsi 'dis ma
T09D4152:130a-35: smin pa bkres pa dang skom pa dang ngal ba

T09D4152:130a-45: bla ma rnams kyi mdun mi rigs //

T09D4152:130b-3: khyod kyi gtam 'di thams cad bdag gis nor bzangs
T09D4152:130b-4: la smra bar bya yis khyod ni bde bar 'dug

T09D4152:130b-7: slar yang nam mkha'i dbus su song ste yab kyi pho brang du nye bar song bar gyur to //
T09D4152:130b-8: yun ring po ma yin par song ba de la yang /
T09D4152:130b-9: sa bdag de ni dpung gi stobs kyis rgyal nas rgyal ba po //
T09D4152:130b-10: yon tan nor can nor bzangs kyis ni de las nor 'dzin te //
T09D4152:130b-11: bdag nyid chen pos de la rang gi yul ni rab byin nas //

T09D4152:130b-13: ljon pa'i bu mo yan lag skems pa bdag gis mthong 'gyur ram //
T09D4152:130b-14: rang gi mdzes pas ri bong can gyi cha ltar mdzes pa bzhin //
T09D4152:130b-15: de las kun nas 'bri zhing yid re'i skya ris kyis //
T09D4152:130b-16: 'di ltar yang nas yang du phrad 'dod 'dis ni bsams par gyur //

T09D4152:131a-7: sgo skyong ma la smras pa /
T09D4152:131a-9: bdag gi tshig gis yid 'phrog ma la smros shig dang //
T09D4152:131a-10: bral bas phrad par 'dod pa'i yid can bdag la ni //
T09D4152:131a-11: gzhon nu 'jigs pa ci phyir drung du 'ong mi byed //
T09D4152:131a-12: ci phyir rang bzhin gyis ni lci ba'i ngo tsha 'di //
T09D4152:131a-13: bud med skye bos de ring yang ni khyod 'dzin byed //

T09D4152:136a-39: log pa de srid du brag 'di bton nas sman

T09D4152:136b-18: rnams bsgribs par gnas par gyur te /
