T09D4152:140a-44: 'gro zhing 'ben gyi gnas su song bar gyur to
T09D4152:140b-0: // 'khor rnams kyis rnam par bshams @140b pa'i gdan
T09D4152:140b-1: la nye bar gnas pa'i ljon pa la sngon rol
T09D4152:140b-2: // nyid du / lcags kyi 'ben rnams thams cad rno ba'i gdong can gyis //
T09D4152:140b-3: slar yang 'phags pa'i sras kyis 'bigs par gyur pa ni //
T09D4152:140b-4: de ltar bsam zhing mchi ma dang bcas mig ldan pa //
T09D4152:140b-5: yid 'phrog ma ni rnam 'khrugs nyid du song bar gyur //
T09D4152:140b-6: de nas ljon pa'i bdag skyes de rnams kyis ni der //
T09D4152:140b-7: 'dus pa chen por stobs kyis shin tu nga rgyal can //
T09D4152:140b-8: la la zhig gis rno ba'i mda' yis ta la
T09D4152:140b-9: gcig / phigs par gyur te 'ga' zhig gis ni
T09D4152:140b-10: ta la gnyis // de tsam gyi dpung pa'i stobs
T09D4152:140b-11: dang ldan pa nye bar gnas pa'i mi 'am ci
T09D4152:140b-13: sngon du khu tshur brtan byas te //
T09D4152:140b-14: mi g-yo'i mig can mi g-yo bar //
T09D4152:140b-15: nor bzangs gzhu ni bdungs byas nas //
T09D4152:140b-16: rno ba'i mda' ni 'phangs par gyur //
T09D4152:140b-17: de nas lcags kyi rang bzhin ta la de rnams phug byas nas //
T09D4152:140b-18: lcags kyi rang bzhin phag mo bdun po de rnams kyang ;
T09D4152:140b-19: / sa 'og mthong ba dang 'dra mda' ni 'dod ldan byas //
T09D4152:140b-20: ltong ni nub cing rtsa la rab tu zhugs par gyur //
T09D4152:140b-21: de nas glo bur nyid du legs so legs so
T09D4152:140b-22: zhes bya ba ngo mtshar bas kun nas 'khor ba'i
T09D4152:140b-23: sor mo dang ldan pa'i ma lus pa mi 'am
T09D4152:140b-24: ci'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa' la mngon du
T09D4152:140b-25: phyogs pa byung bar gyur te /
T09D4152:140b-26: mi 'am ci'i bdag po yang mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to //
T09D4152:140b-27: 'ben rnams rno ba'i gdong can gyis ni 'bigs 'gyur ba //
T09D4152:140b-28: bdag nyid chen po stobs chen ldan pa de yis ni //
T09D4152:140b-29: dgod pa'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa'i so yi phreng //
T09D4152:140b-30: yid 'phrog ma yi bzhin ni de ltar blang bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:140b-31: de nas mi 'am ci'i bdag pos pho brang du 'ongs te /
T09D4152:140b-32: slar nor bzangs la smras pa /
T09D4152:140b-33: gzugs dang lang tsho mnyam par rnam par brgyan pa rnams //
T09D4152:140b-34: bdag gi bu mo'i dbus su 'jug pa khyod kyis ni //
T09D4152:140b-35: glo bur du ni lhan cig chos spyod rang gis ni //
T09D4152:140b-36: gal te rig par gyur na de bas de sbyin bya //
T09D4152:140b-37: de ltar bgyi zhes bya ba so sor mnyan nas /
T09D4152:140b-38: byang chub sems dpas rang gi gnas su 'ongs te /
T09D4152:140b-39: mi 'am ci mo 'bangs mo rgan mo de yid 'phrog ma la btang bar gyur te /
T09D4152:140b-40: gal te gzugs dang lang tsho dang //
T09D4152:141a-0: cha byad dang rgyan mnyam pa'i sring mo rnams kyi @141a * //
T09D4152:141a-1: dbus su gnas pa'i yid 'phrog ma khyod kyis shes par gyur na /
T09D4152:141a-2: de nas bdag gis de khyod kyi chung ma nyid du sbyin par bya zhes zer ro //
T09D4152:141a-3: 'di yang shin tu dka' ba khyod kyi phas nye
T09D4152:141a-4: bar bkod pa 'di la thabs gang yin pa zhes
T09D4152:141a-5: 'dri'o // de nas yid 'phrog mas smras pa /
T09D4152:141a-6: bdag gi sring mo kun gyi nang nas ni //
T09D4152:141a-7: gos kyis bsgribs pa'i rkang pa rkang gdub can //
T09D4152:141a-8: rkang gdub gnyis po rab tu gsal ba ni //
T09D4152:141a-9: de yi dbus su bdag ni 'byung bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:141a-10: de bas na mtshan ma 'di la bltas nas bdag
T09D4152:141a-11: ni 'phags pa'i sras kyis sring mo rnams kyi dbus
T09D4152:141a-12: na gnas pa gzung bar bya zhes zer ro //
T09D4152:141a-13: 'bangs mo des kyang byang chub sems dpa' la de ltar smra bar bya'o //
T09D4152:141a-14: de nas nor bzangs yid dga' ba mi 'am ci'i
T09D4152:141a-15: bdag pos yang dag par bos pa de dang der
T09D4152:141a-18: rgyan mnyam par de rnams glog ltar snang bar gyur
T09D4152:141a-19: pa'i mi 'am ci mo rnams mthong bar gyur to
T09D4152:141a-20: // de nas ljon pas gzhon nu de la smras pa /
T09D4152:141a-21: gang zhig khyed kyis mdza' mo de zung cig ces zer te /
T09D4152:141a-22: de nas rkang pa gnyis kyis gsal bar byas pa des //
T09D4152:141a-23: gsal zhing 'od dang ldan pa'i skyod pa'i rkang gdub kyis //
T09D4152:141a-24: sa la rnam par 'brel pas lta ba'i yid 'phrog ma //
T09D4152:141a-25: ngo tshe'i gdong can lag pa'i rtse mos bzung bar gyur //
T09D4152:141a-26: de nas ljon pa snying dga' bas nor bzangs la smras pa /
T09D4152:141a-27: tshe dang ldan pas bar chad med par bdag gi bka' rnams thams cad bsgrubs te /
T09D4152:141a-28: de bas na yid 'phrog ma 'di khyod kyis lhan
T09D4152:141a-29: cig chos spyod ma so sor bzung bar mdzod cig
T09D4152:141a-30: / gzhan yang / gang phyir sngon du 'jam pa'i lus can khyod ni ngal byas pa //
T09D4152:141a-31: mngon par 'ongs pa brtse ba bral ba bdag gis don med khyod //
T09D4152:141a-32: de ni gzhon nu dul ba'i ngo bo bzod par 'os pa ste //
T09D4152:141a-33: gang zhig bla ma'i skye bo mkhas rnams bzod min de ni ci //
T09D4152:141a-35: 'o na bla ma rnams kyis bka' rab tu sbyin pas bdag ni rjes su 'dzin pa ste /
T09D4152:141a-36: lci ba'i sems ldan bla ma rnams //
T09D4152:141a-37: gang zhig nyid ni bya ba ste //
T09D4152:141a-38: bka' ni rab sbyin mkhas pa nyid //
T09D4152:141a-39: de rnams las ni de nyid skye //
T09D4152:141a-40: de nas lha'i gzhon nu lha'i bu mo dang lhan
T09D4152:141a-41: cig pa 'dra bar mi'am ci mo de dang lhan
T09D4152:141b-0: cig ljon pa'i pho brang du @141b dus cung zad
T09D4152:141b-1: cig gnas te / byang chub sems dpas mi 'am ci'i bdag po la smras pa /
T09D4152:141b-2: lha lags gal te bka' drin yod na /
T09D4152:141b-3: de nas yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu yab
T09D4152:141b-4: kyi pho brang du 'gro bar bgyi'o zhes zer ro
T09D4152:141b-5: // de nas ljon pas ci ltar gzhon nu 'dod pa de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas /
T09D4152:141b-6: bu mo rnams la smras pa /
T09D4152:141b-7: bu mo rnams song la gyos po'i rigs la mngon
T09D4152:141b-8: par 'jug pa'i yid 'phrog ma brgyan par mdzod cig
T09D4152:141b-9: ces zer ro // de rnams kyis kyang de ltar bgyi'o zhes bya ba so sor mnyan nas /
T09D4152:141b-10: sring mo khyo po yon tan mthong dang lhan cig tu //
T09D4152:141b-11: gyos po'i rigs la khyed ni de ring 'gro 'gyur te //
T09D4152:141b-12: sring mo de ltar mchi ma dang bcas mig rnams kyis //
T09D4152:141b-13: cho ga bzhin du mi'am ci mo de brgyan gyur //
T09D4152:141b-14: bdag cag gis ni brgyan bya min //
T09D4152:141b-15: rang gi mdzes pas 'di brgyan pa //
T09D4152:141b-16: de ltar rgyan rnams 'di yi ni //
T09D4152:141b-17: lus la ngo tshar bcas ltar gnas //
T09D4152:141b-18: de nas yid 'phrog ma rgyan rdzogs pa /
T09D4152:141b-19: sring mo rnams kyis rjes su 'gro bar gyur pas dul ba dang bcas pas nye bar 'ongs te /
T09D4152:141b-20: yun ring phyag rnams dpag med bzhin gyi chu skyes can //
T09D4152:141b-21: mchi ma dang bcas nye bar skye bos rnam bltas pa //
T09D4152:141b-22: pha dang ma yis mchi ma dang bcas mig ldan pa //
T09D4152:141b-23: skad cig rkang pa mchi ma'i thigs pa rnams kyis spangs //
T09D4152:141b-24: khyed ni med par bdag ni brten pa mi 'thob ste //
T09D4152:141b-25: bu mo nam zhig tshe na slar yang 'ongs par 'gyur //
T09D4152:141b-26: de ltar rjod par byed cing mas ni yid 'phrog ma //
T09D4152:141b-27: skad cig tu ni kun nas brten te nus min du //
T09D4152:141b-28: de nas mi'am ci'i bdag pos 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bu mo dang bral bas /
T09D4152:141b-29: sdug bsngal gyis khyab pa'i bdag nyid ji ltar yang
T09D4152:141b-30: brtan par byas nas yid 'phrog ma'i ma la smras
T09D4152:141b-31: pa / gsal ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni mkha' la cha ni gsum du song ba la //
T09D4152:141b-32: sems rnams sbed cing skad cig lus ni 'dzin pa rnams la nyi ma'i drod ni brten 'gyur te //
T09D4152:141b-33: gzhon nu 'di ni khyod kyi bu mo chu bral pad mo ltar ni rnying par 'gyur ba ste //
T09D4152:141b-34: de bas song shig slar yang 'ongs 'gyur te //
T09D4152:141b-35: mi brtan pa ni yongs su dor bar mdzod //
T09D4152:141b-36: de nas nor bzangs kyi spyi bo'i gtsug gi nor bu bcings nas ljon pas smras pa /
T09D4152:141b-37: nor bu 'di yi mthu yis ni //
T09D4152:141b-38: mthu ni chen po khyod la yang //
T09D4152:141b-39: lha yi ltar ni thogs med pa //
T09D4152:142a-1: de bas da ni yid 'phrog ma la dmigs nas nam mkha'i dkyil du 'byung ste /
T09D4152:142a-2: tshe dang ldan pa nye bar rgyas pa'i yab kyi
T09D4152:142a-3: pho brang du 'gro bar mdzod cig / bdag gi
T09D4152:142a-5: dpal ldan rnams kyis khyed mdun 'gro //
T09D4152:142a-6: tshig dang don dag ltar khyed cag / phan tshun
T09D4152:142a-7: brten pa 'byung gyur cig / de nas 'phrog pa'i
T09D4152:142a-8: sems ldan bla ma dag btud nas //
T09D4152:142a-9: skad cig tu ni mi'am ci mo'i skye bo 'khyud byas te //
T09D4152:142a-10: kun nas 'phros pa'i rgyan dang rin chen 'od ldan pa //
T09D4152:142a-11: bza' mi gnyis ni myur du nam mkha' la ni song bar gyur //
T09D4152:142a-12: phyir lta'i mig can mchi ma'i cha ni grol bzhin pa //
T09D4152:142a-13: bdag po dang ni lhan cig nam mkha' la 'jug pa //
T09D4152:142a-14: mi 'am ci mo de la mchi ma byung ba'i mas //
T09D4152:142a-15: ji srid mig las 'das pa de srid mthong bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:142a-16: de nas nor bzangs kyis rang gi skye bo dang
T09D4152:142a-17: bral bas skrag pa'i yid 'phrog ma la yang nas
T09D4152:142a-18: yang du mchi ma rnams phyis nas /
T09D4152:142a-19: rdul gyi cha dang bcas pa de yi gdong ni des mthong nas //
T09D4152:142a-20: padma rgyas pa chu yi thigs pas rjes su 'brel pa ltar //
T09D4152:142a-21: nyin par 'gro zhing nyi ma'i 'od zer bzlog pa'i don du ni //
T09D4152:142a-22: lag pa gnyis ni bteg nas snam bu chen po brkyang bar gyur //
T09D4152:142a-23: de nas glo bur nyid du glang po che'i grong khyer dang nye bar gyur to //
T09D4152:142a-24: srab cing yid 'phrog nor can mdzes pa la ni dmigs byas nas //
T09D4152:142a-25: rlung gis cung zad snam bu bskyod par byas pas 'gro ba ni //
T09D4152:142a-26: rig pa 'dzin pa 'di ni nam mkha' las ni 'ongs sam ci //
T09D4152:142a-27: zhes ni grong khyer skye bo mi g-yo mig can gyis mthong gyur //
T09D4152:142a-28: de nas nor bzangs nam mkha'i dkyil nas yang dag par brgal ba mthong ste /
T09D4152:142a-29: yid dga' ba'i sgo ba rnams kyis rgyal po nor can la lha lags /
T09D4152:142a-30: yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu nor bzangs 'ongs
T09D4152:142a-31: so zhes bya ba smra zhing gnas par gyur to
T09D4152:142a-32: // de nas rgyal po des bden nam 'on te min snyam nas /
T09D4152:142a-33: mdza' bo rnams ni sdug bsngal gyis dad par bya zhes bya ba smras te /
T09D4152:142a-34: stan las langs te mi 'am ci mo dang bcas pa'i nor bzangs nyid zhugs pa mthong nas /
T09D4152:142a-35: 'di ni rmi lam yin nam 'on te ci snyam
T09D4152:142a-36: du rab tu dga' bas yang nas yang du 'khyud
T09D4152:142a-37: de / 'di ma'i drung du khrid par gyur to //
T09D4152:142b-0: de nas kun nas langs te bral bar mi nus @142b pa ;
T09D4152:142b-1: / rab tu dga' ba'i mchi ma'i chu yis mig 'gags pa //
T09D4152:142b-2: mas ni yun ring po nas bdag skyes de mthong ste //
T09D4152:142b-3: skad cig kun nas 'khyud de spyi bor 'o byas gyur //
T09D4152:142b-4: de nas yid 'phrog mas btsun mo la mngon par phyag btsal nas smras pa //
T09D4152:142b-5: bde ba'i 'phags pa'i sras kyis kyang //
T09D4152:142b-6: bdag gi don du rtsol byas pa //
T09D4152:142b-7: gang zhag sdug bsngal rnams myong ba //
T09D4152:142b-8: 'phags mas bdag gi de bzod mdzod //
T09D4152:142b-10: bu mo khyod ni bdag gi rigs la bsngags par bya ba ste /
T09D4152:142b-11: ci'i phyir khyod kyi steng du bdag ni khro ba
T09D4152:142b-12: dang ldan pa byung bar gyur pa de bas na
T09D4152:142b-13: ltos shig / lto 'phye chen po'i nor bu ni //
T09D4152:142b-14: grib mas gsal byas sa 'og gi //
T09D4152:142b-15: rgya mtsho las ni rtsol ma byas //
T09D4152:142b-16: su zhig rin chen rnyed par 'gyur //
T09D4152:142b-17: de nas dri ma med pa grags pa'i gter ni 'ongs pa yis //
T09D4152:142b-18: bdag nyid chen po thos chen gral la gnas pa'i sras la ni //
T09D4152:142b-19: yun ring grong khyer lha yi rnam par 'byor pa lta bu yis //
T09D4152:142b-20: dus min zla 'od mi yi bdag pos byed du bcug par gyur //
T09D4152:142b-21: rigs bzangs ba dang khro ba phrag dog gi gtam
T09D4152:142b-22: thos pa'i rgyal po nor can gyis gnyis skyes 'di
T09D4152:142b-23: bsad par bya ba ma yin snyam du dgongs nas
T09D4152:142b-24: rang gi yul nas bton par gyur to //
T09D4152:142b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes rabs 'di dge slong rnams gyi mdun du 'di ltar bstan par mdzad de /
T09D4152:142b-26: brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan pa ni //
T09D4152:142b-27: nor bzangs rgyal sras bdag yod 'gyur //
T09D4152:142b-28: gzugs dang skal bzang ldan pa ni //
T09D4152:142b-30: de yi don du bdag gis ni //
T09D4152:142b-31: sngar ni sdug bsngal de de thob //
T09D4152:142b-32: phal cher 'dod pas khengs bdag nyid //
T09D4152:142b-33: nyon mongs rnams kyi snod du gyur //
T09D4152:142b-34: de phyir yul skyes bde ba'i cha ni dang por rtogs byas nas //
T09D4152:142b-35: yid 'phrog yul 'dod rnams kyi yongs su smin la dga' ba ni //
T09D4152:142b-36: bdag nyid 'dod pa rnams kyis ring por 'di rnams yongs spangs skad //
T09D4152:142b-37: 'dod pa rnams ni skad cig sbrul ltar yun ring spang bar mdzod //
T09D4152:142b-38: mi 'am ci mo dang nor bzangs kyi skyes pa'i rabs te skyes rabs lnga pa'o /
T09D4152:142b-40: // / bsam gtan gyi ni mar me snang ba yis //
T09D4152:142b-41: snang ba thob kyang mya ngan 'das mi 'gro / gang phyir byang chub thob par 'dod pa'i yid //
T09D4152:143a-1: sems can phan rjes 'brel phyir ro //
T09D4152:143a-3: rig byed kyi de kho na nyid yang dag par rtogs pa dang /
T09D4152:143a-4: sna tshogs pa'i bstan bcos rnams la goms pas srid
T09D4152:143a-5: pa dang bral ba'i blo mkhas pa du ma rnams
T09D4152:143a-6: kyi mdun sa rnams la grags pas khyab ba /
T09D4152:143a-7: rang gi grub mtha'i bya ba rnams la rtse gcig pa /
T09D4152:143a-8: khyim gyi gnas la lhag par gnas shing dus gcig
T09D4152:143a-9: gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' bram ze 'bar
T09D4152:143a-10: ba can zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to //
T09D4152:143a-11: bdag nyid chen po de yang khyim na gnas pa'i
T09D4152:143a-12: skyon shes pa rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba mngon
T09D4152:143a-13: par 'dod pa yo byad kyis yongs su gang ba'i
T09D4152:143a-14: khyim na yang dga' ba thob par ma gyur cing
T09D4152:143a-15: dus gcig gi tshe na 'di ltar bsams te /
T09D4152:143a-16: yo byad yod na rgyags pa skye 'gyur te //
T09D4152:143a-17: de yod na ni rab zhig la 'gyur //
T09D4152:143a-18: rab zhi med na ngo tsha bral ba ni //
T09D4152:143a-19: dri ma can gyi las ni skye bos 'dod //
T09D4152:143a-20: dga' min yang dag sbyor ba'i sdug bsngal skad cig tsam//
T09D4152:143a-21: sems kyi bde ba skad cig tu ni dga' bral dus //
T09D4152:143a-22: nor ni rnyed par bya phyir yid ni ngal rnams kyi //
T09D4152:143a-23: gal te de phyir 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal 'bras bu med //
T09D4152:143a-24: de ltar khyim pa rnams ni rtag tu sems 'khrugs pa'i //
T09D4152:143a-25: rang gi skye bos mnyes gshin nges 'brel yid ldan pa //
T09D4152:143a-26: bde ba zhes bya 'bras med mngon pa'i nga rgyal brten //
T09D4152:143a-27: khyim pa rnams la yid bde cung zad kyang ni med //
T09D4152:143a-28: khyim zhes bya ba de ltar dga' ba spangs nas ni //
T09D4152:143a-29: 'ching ba byed pa 'di ni myur du bdag 'dod pa //
T09D4152:143a-30: dka' thub rnams ni mngon par 'phel phyir nags nang du //
T09D4152:143a-31: de bas rab tu zhi ba'i gnas ni bdag gis brten //
T09D4152:143a-32: de ltar bdag nyid chen po des bsams nas khyim na gnas pa yongs su dor te /
T09D4152:143a-33: chu g-yo ba med cing 'bab pa 'gram gyi shing
T09D4152:143a-34: me tog skyes pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes pa
T09D4152:143a-35: / bstan bcos rnams la goms pas dri ma dang
T09D4152:143a-36: bral ba'i shes rab dang 'dra ba'i chu bos brgyan
T09D4152:143a-37: par byas pa'i sa 'dzin gyi phyogs gcig na /
T09D4152:143a-38: ri dags kyi tshogs dbugs 'byung ba'i so rnams kyis
T09D4152:143a-39: rtsva sngon po gcod pas yid dga' bas padmo'i nags
T09D4152:143a-40: kyi tshogs na ngang pa dang /
T09D4152:143a-42: ngur ba rnams kyis nye bar mdzes pa'i rnal 'byor
T09D4152:143a-43: pa rnams kyi yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i shin
T09D4152:143b-0: tu che ba nags kyi nang 'ga' zhig @143b na
T09D4152:143b-1: ; khri snyan sa le'i pags pas brang gi mthil
T09D4152:143b-2: 'dres par byas pa'i gnas kyi khyad par thob pa
T09D4152:143b-3: ; / kun nas dga' ba dang 'dra ba changs
T09D4152:143b-4: pa'i dpal gyis 'khyud par bya ba'i gzugs can chog
T09D4152:143b-5: ; / shes pa / gzugs dang ldan pa dang
T09D4152:143b-6: 'dra bar shing 'ga' zhig la brten nas rnal 'byor
T09D4152:143b-7: dang yid 'brel pas dka' thub bya ba'i phyir brtsams
T09D4152:143b-8: ; / shes pa / te / bsam gtan la
T09D4152:143b-9: ni rtse gcig yid ldan dbang pos rnam rgyal ba
T09D4152:143b-11: rnyed pas bde ba snying rje dang ni ldan pa
T09D4152:143b-13: rgya chen blo ldan gnyis skyes des ni gang zhig
T09D4152:143b-15: brten pa ni // shing des shing nyid don ni
T09D4152:143b-17: / rtsva yi gding ba bting byas nas //
T09D4152:143b-18: sna yi rtse mor mig brtan pas //
T09D4152:143b-19: bsgom pa rnams kyi mchog des ni //
T09D4152:143b-21: brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i lam //
T09D4152:143b-22: bzhon pa nyer bsags ngal ba ni //
T09D4152:143b-23: bsam gtan pha rol phyin bstan pa //
T09D4152:143b-24: de nas de ni ngal sos gyur //
T09D4152:143b-25: 'dod pa dge ba rnams dang ni //
T09D4152:143b-26: chos rnams la ni so sor gnas //
T09D4152:143b-27: rtog bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa //
T09D4152:143b-28: rnam dag bdag nyid dben pa las //
T09D4152:143b-29: dga' dang bde ba myong byas pa /
T09D4152:143b-31: // zhi ba'i bdud rtsi myang byas te //
T09D4152:143b-32: bsam gtan lam ni thob pa'i phyir //
T09D4152:143b-33: bsam gtan dang po des thob gyur //
T09D4152:143b-34: rtog med dpyod pa med pa dang //
T09D4152:143b-35: de nas dpyod pa la mkhas pa //
T09D4152:143b-36: des ni nang bdag nyid dang bcas //
T09D4152:143b-38: rim gyis dga' ba las bral te //
T09D4152:143b-39: dran pa dang ldan btang snyoms ldan //
T09D4152:143b-40: brtan pa lus bde myong ba can//
T09D4152:143b-41: bsam gtan gsum pa des thob 'gyur //
T09D4152:143b-42: btang snyoms kyis ni yongs dag pa //
T09D4152:143b-43: bde sdug dag ni spangs pa'i phyir //
T09D4152:143b-44: dga' bas 'dod chags bral ba'i phyir //
T09D4152:143b-45: de nas bsam gtan bzhi pa brnyes //
T09D4152:143b-46: de ltar 'di ni bsam gtan bzhi skyes par byas pa /
T09D4152:143b-47: gzugs dang ldan pa dang 'dra ba'i snying rjes 'khyud pa /
T09D4152:143b-48: nye bar zhi ba la rtse gcig pas dud 'gro
T09D4152:143b-49: rnams la yang gnyen dang 'dra bar nags de na
T09D4152:143b-50: dbugs 'byung ba'i rgyu gnas par gyur te /
T09D4152:143b-51: ri dags dang ni phug ron rma bya ri skegs rnams //
T09D4152:143b-52: bsam bzang sbrul dang ri dags rnams kyang de dang de //
T09D4152:144a-0: gnas nas slob ma ltar ni @144a * //
T09D4152:144a-2: de dang nye bar 'ongs te rnam par ngal bso gyur //
T09D4152:144a-3: de nas dus gcig gi tshe na bdag nyid chen
T09D4152:144a-4: po des skyil mo krung bcas pa'i de'i rkang pa
T09D4152:144a-5: dang nye bar gnas pa'i ri dags pho mo gnyis
T09D4152:144a-6: ni bsam gtan gyis g-yo ba med pa'i mig gis
T09D4152:144a-7: phug ron mo mngal btsa' ba dang nye bar rtsva
T09D4152:144a-8: rnams dang rtsva'i dum bu rnams kyang mchus bzung nas
T09D4152:144a-9: / ral pa'i tshogs rnam par bcings pa'i cod pan
T09D4152:144a-10: gyis mgo bo la 'dug nas cung zad dma' ba'i
T09D4152:144a-12: der sgo nga rnams bzhag nas rtsva dang sa bon
T09D4152:144a-13: rnams dang 'bras bu rnams za bar 'dod pas nam
T09D4152:144a-14: mkha' la song ste nags gzhan rnams la gnas nas
T09D4152:144a-16: sgo nga de rnams gzung zhing rnam par gnas par gyur to //
T09D4152:144a-17: de nas phug ron mo ni srab pa'i mjug sgros khyab //
T09D4152:144a-18: de yi yan lag kun nas btsir bas drod ni bsags pa yi //
T09D4152:144a-19: tshang na sgo nga dkar dang dmar ba'i yan lag can //
T09D4152:144a-20: phug ron phrug pa rnams ni kun nas 'bigs 'byung 'gyur //
T09D4152:144a-21: de nas phug ron mo ni phug pa rnams mthong ste /
T09D4152:144a-22: yang yang za bar 'dod pas mchu'i rtse phye ba ni //
T09D4152:144a-23: rang gi bkres chen ma bsams pri yang ku ta ni //
T09D4152:144a-24: ma rmos 'khrungs pa'i 'bras bu rnams kyis de rgyas gyur //
T09D4152:144a-25: phug ron de rnams lus las skyes pa rab 'byung ba //
T09D4152:144a-26: ma ni sa bon 'dzin pa la ni blta byas nas //
T09D4152:144a-27: skad cig rab g-yo rtse mo'i sgro can gdong rnams ni //
T09D4152:144a-28: rab tu phye zhing gnas gyur skad ni gdon byas pa //
T09D4152:144a-29: de nas bsam gtan rdzogs pa'i dus na shing dang 'bras don du //
T09D4152:144a-30: dbang po zhi ba thub pa de ni nags nas 'gro 'dod pa //
T09D4152:144a-31: phug ron mo ni rtsva dang shing gi 'bras bu 'dzin mthong nas //
T09D4152:144a-32: tshad dang ldan pa'i mgo la 'brel bzhin pa ni gnas par gyur //
T09D4152:144a-33: de nas byang chub sems dpas nges par bdag gi
T09D4152:144a-34: ral pa'i tshogs 'di rtsva dang shing bu'i dum bus
T09D4152:144a-35: tshang rnam par brtsams pa'i phug ron mo 'di btsas
T09D4152:144a-36: pa ste / gal te yang bdag gis langs nas shing rnams dang sdong bu dang rtsa ba dang /
T09D4152:144a-37: 'bras bu rnams 'ongs pa'i phyir 'gro bar gyur na
T09D4152:144a-38: de nas nges par dka' thub ma 'di ni gnas
T09D4152:144a-39: 'dir 'ongs te / 'di rnams dmar ba'i rkan dang ldan pa gsal byas pa //
T09D4152:144b-0: de ring phug ron phru gu mthong @144b bar ma gyur pa //
T09D4152:144b-1: shing rnams la ni yang yang mya ngan gyis gnas te //
T09D4152:144b-2: nam mkha' la ni 'phur nas kun nas 'khor bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:144b-3: ae ma skye ba brgyar 'khor ba'i //
T09D4152:144b-4: bag chags 'di ni rjes su 'jug / dud 'gro rnams kyang phru gu la //
T09D4152:144b-5: gang phyir mnyes gshin kun nas 'phel //
T09D4152:144b-6: gal te bu rnams med gyur na //
T09D4152:144b-7: gnyen rnams grogs po nyid gang du //
T09D4152:144b-8: rang nyid na med la 'gyur te //
T09D4152:144b-9: gnyen bshes sa bon med gang la //
T09D4152:144b-10: mnyes gshin med pa la sems ni //
T09D4152:144b-11: mi bde rnams ni yod mi 'gyur //
T09D4152:144b-12: yid mi bde med chags bral ba //
T09D4152:144b-13: zhi ba ldan pa bde bar gnas //
T09D4152:144b-14: bu zhes bya ba'i sdug bsngal rnams //
T09D4152:144b-15: nyon mongs kyis rmongs skye byas nas //
T09D4152:144b-16: rmongs pa'i skye bo la thob ste //
T09D4152:144b-17: phyi nas 'gyod pas gdung pa can //
T09D4152:144b-18: ba lang re lde mi 'dod kyang ni stobs ldan pa'i //
T09D4152:144b-19: re lde can gyis ji ltar nan gyis sbyor bar byed //
T09D4152:144b-20: skya bo blo ngan 'di ni dge dang mi dge bas//
T09D4152:144b-21: srid pa'i rgya mtsho la ni las kyis bskul bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:144b-22: de phyir phug ron phru gu rnams ni ji srid sgro skyes par //
T09D4152:144b-23: ma gyur bdag gi ral pa'i tshang na gnas pa de srid du //
T09D4152:144b-24: bsam gtan bdud rtsis nye bar bsags pa'i sems dang lus dga' ba //
T09D4152:144b-25: 'dir ni g-yo med gzugs dang ldan pa nyid du gnas par bgyi //
T09D4152:144b-26: de ltar byang chub sems dpas rnam par bsams te
T09D4152:144b-27: phug ron gyi phru gu rnams la rjes su brtse
T09D4152:144b-28: bas dkris pa la rnam par ma brtsis par yang
T09D4152:144b-29: skyil mo krung bcings nas bsam gtan gyi bde bas
T09D4152:144b-30: bdag nyid tshim zhing gnas so //
T09D4152:144b-31: phug ron phru gu sgro rab tu 'phel ba de
T09D4152:144b-32: rnams ma dang lhan cig nam mkha' la 'phur zhing
T09D4152:144b-34: de dang nye bar gnas pa'i lha mos kun nas nye bar 'ongs te /
T09D4152:144b-35: byang chub sems dpa' la bltas nas ngo mtshar bas
T09D4152:144b-36: kun nas lhag par gnas pa'i blo dang ldan pas
T09D4152:144b-37: ae ma'o bdag nyid chen po drang srong 'di sems
T09D4152:144b-38: can rnams la rjes su brtse ba ste /
T09D4152:144b-39: gang gi phyir sngar byung ba'i bsam gtan las langs
T09D4152:144b-40: te phug ron rnams kun nas bsrung ba'i phyir slar
T09D4152:144b-41: yang bsam gtan gyis bdag nyid g-yo ba med par
T09D4152:144b-42: byas shing yang dag par gnas te /
T09D4152:145a-0: bdag nyid chen po 'di yang phug ron 'di rnams song ba rnams la yang tshang 'di @145a * //
T09D4152:145a-1: mgo bo las kun nas med par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T09D4152:145a-2: de bas na bdag gi ral pa'i cod pan na
T09D4152:145a-3: rnam par bsags pa'i phug ron gyi tshang 'di bshig
T09D4152:145a-4: par bya'o snyam du rnam par bsams nas /
T09D4152:145a-5: 'ga' zhig sgo nga'i dum bu rnams kyis nang khyab pa //
T09D4152:145a-6: shin tu thob pa mchog gi tshang de de yis ni //
T09D4152:145a-7: rim gyis rim gyis 'dab ma ltar ni 'jam pa yi //
T09D4152:145a-8: lag pa gnyis kyis mgo bo las ni nyer khyer gyur //
T09D4152:145a-9: lha mo de yang song ba la byang chub sems dpas bsam gtan las sems bzlog ste /
T09D4152:145a-10: mgo bo'i yang pa nyid shes nas 'di ltar bsam zhing gnas te ;
T09D4152:145a-11: sgro rnams rab tu rdzogs pa phug ron phru gu rnams //
T09D4152:145a-12: ma dang lhan cig nags kyi nang du song ba la //
T09D4152:145a-13: nges par gus pa rtse gcig pa ni su zhig gis //
T09D4152:145a-14: de yi tshang ni bdag gi mgo las nyer khyer gyur //
T09D4152:145a-15: de ltar rnam par bsams nas bdag nyid chen po
T09D4152:145a-16: des langs nas shing dang ku sha dang me tog
T09D4152:145a-17: dang 'bras bu rnams 'ongs te khrus byas pa /
T09D4152:145a-18: 'phro ba'i 'od zer 'byung ba'i me la bsreg byas nyin phyed na //
T09D4152:145a-19: dri dang 'brel ba'i 'dam dang bral ba'i 'bras bu nyer zos te //
T09D4152:145a-20: sna yi rtse mor gnas pa'i mig ldan shing gi 'og tu ni //
T09D4152:145a-21: sems gcig pa ni slar yang rnal 'byor brtsams par gyur //
T09D4152:145a-22: de ltar bsam gtan gyis de kho na nyid rnam
T09D4152:145a-23: par mthong ba mya ngan las 'das pa nye bar
T09D4152:145a-24: 'gro ba'i phyir nus kyang bcom ldan 'das de byang
T09D4152:145a-25: chub sems dpar gyur pa na 'jig rten rnams la
T09D4152:145a-26: phan pa'i phyir nye bar 'tshe ba mang ba'i 'khor
T09D4152:145a-27: ba la yang kun nas 'khor bar 'gyur snyam du
T09D4152:145a-28: rnam par bsams nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
T09D4152:145a-29: mchog tu dang ba bskyed par bya zhes bya ba'o
T09D4152:145a-30: // drang srong 'bar ba can gyi skyes pa'i rabs te skyes rabs drug pa'o /
T09D4152:145a-32: // / shes rab bam ni brtson 'grus ldan pas kyang //
T09D4152:145a-33: bsod nams chen po rnam par dag pa 'am //
T09D4152:145a-34: mtho ba'i blo ldan chen po rnams kyis ni //
T09D4152:145a-35: 'di dag thams cad 'jig rten phan phyir ro //
T09D4152:145a-37: bstan bcos sna tshogs la yongs su 'dris pa /
T09D4152:145a-38: dri ma dang bral ba'i yid dang ldan pa /
T09D4152:145a-39: 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi gnyen du gyur pa //
T09D4152:145b-0: dul ba gzugs dang ldan pa 'dra bar gzhan la phan pa la 'bras @145b bu rtse gcig pa /
T09D4152:145b-1: 'dab chags ngal ba rnams la shing chen po 'dra
T09D4152:145b-2: bar skyes bu'i yon tan thams cad kyis brten pa
T09D4152:145b-3: / snyan par smra ba nyid kyis 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi yid 'phrog pa /
T09D4152:145b-4: legs par bshad pa rnams la rtsom pa po 'jig
T09D4152:145b-5: rten na mkhas pa gtsang ba bag dang ldan pa
T09D4152:145b-6: rgyal po'i rigs kyi rgyal mtshan du gyur pa de
T09D4152:145b-8: grong khyer 'ga' zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' ke
T09D4152:145b-9: sha pa zhes bya ba'i ming can byung bar gyur
T09D4152:145b-10: te / bdag nyid chen po des kyang 'tsho ba
T09D4152:145b-11: yongs su dag par slar su zhig yin snyam du
T09D4152:145b-12: te / sems so // bdag gis gang la gnas
T09D4152:145b-13: na bde bar 'jig rten la phan pa bsgrub par
T09D4152:145b-14: te / sems so // nus snyam mo // re zhig bsten pa ni mi bden pa dang /
T09D4152:145b-18: 'tshe ba'i skyon du ma rnams kyi rgyu yin pas
T09D4152:145b-19: de la gnas shing 'bad pa dang ldan pa yang
T09D4152:145b-20: nam zhig gi tshe zhi ba nye bar thob par
T09D4152:145b-22: mi yi bdag po sna tshogs ston pa'i 'dab ma la bsam nus pa yi //
T09D4152:145b-23: skyes bu rnams kyi sems ni dang ba skyes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ma yin //
T09D4152:145b-24: 'khrug pa mang ba'i 'dam can chu la gos ni 'khru bar byed bzhin pa //
T09D4152:145b-25: nam yang dkar ba nyid 'gro bar 'gyur ba nyid ni ma yin te //
T09D4152:145b-26: tshong yang nyo tshong gi dus na brdzun pa'i tshig mang bas chos las 'da' ba nyid do //
T09D4152:145b-27: zhing gi las kyang ba lang rnams la lcag dang
T09D4152:145b-28: dbyug pa brgyab pas sdug bsngal skyed par byed de
T09D4152:145b-29: / rnam pa thams cad du sman pa nyid bdag
T09D4152:145b-30: nyid dag pa dang 'jig rten la phan pa dang
T09D4152:145b-31: bde bar byed par mthong ba yin te /
T09D4152:145b-32: de bas na sman pa nyid tshol bar snyam du
T09D4152:145b-33: rnam par bsams nas dus ring pos de'i rtog pa
T09D4152:145b-35: lci ba'i sems ldan de la gnas pa yi //
T09D4152:145b-36: yon tan can dag nad pa rnams kyi nad gcod la //
T09D4152:145b-37: nam yang nad kyis gdung bar 'gyur min la //
T09D4152:145b-38: lus can rnams kyi lus ngal bsrung byas bzhin ;
T09D4152:145b-39: / bar chad med par dam pa rnams la smras //
T09D4152:145b-40: de ni med pas mdun sa mdzes mi 'gyur //
T09D4152:145b-41: gtsang ba'i mar me bral bas 'od med pa'i //
T09D4152:145b-42: mtshan mo la ni ri mo'i khyim bzhin du //
T09D4152:145b-43: 'gro la 'dod pa bskyed cing mun pa 'phrog / de ni bde ldan mdun sar gang zhig 'gro /
T09D4152:146a-0: @146a * // shin tu dga' bar gyur pa de 'gyur te //
T09D4152:146a-1: ri bong can ni shar la zla tshes ltar //
T09D4152:146a-2: chen po 'gro ba'i don ni byed pa yi //
T09D4152:146a-3: yon tan brten pa gsal ba'i de nyid mthong //
T09D4152:146a-4: zla ltar rnam dag sems ldan rnams kyis ni //
T09D4152:146a-5: skye bo yon tan ldan las 'byung bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:146a-6: de ltar 'gro ba'i lam ni gnod byed sel ba la mkhas pa //
T09D4152:146a-7: yon tan mang ba rnams kyi mngon sum du ni gter dang 'dra //
T09D4152:146a-8: de ni shes rab yongs su 'dris pas dag pa'i blor 'gyur te //
T09D4152:146a-9: kun nas yongs su 'dris pa med kyang gnyen ltar gyur pa yin //
T09D4152:146a-10: de nas dus gcig gi tshe na legs pa'i blo can gyi slob mas rjes su 'gro bzhin pa /
T09D4152:146a-11: byang chub sems dpa' yul gzhan du song ba la
T09D4152:146a-12: glags rnyed pa dang 'dra ba'i nad kyis bud med
T09D4152:146a-13: 'ga' zhig gi bdag po srid pa gzhan du nye
T09D4152:146a-15: des kyang 'jam pa'i lag pa gnyis kyis brdabs pas
T09D4152:146a-16: kun nas dkar dmar du byas pa'i lci ba'i 'o
T09D4152:146a-17: ma 'dzin pa mig gi mchi ma'i thigs pa rnams
T09D4152:146a-20: skra lo lhod pa dang rnam par grol ba'i khur
T09D4152:146a-21: gyis sku kunda ra'i me tog kun nas dor ba
T09D4152:146a-22: / kunda'i ljon shing ltar sbrang byed kyi tshogs kyis me tog 'gegs pa /
T09D4152:146a-23: me tog mtshon cha'i bud med dang 'dra ba /
T09D4152:146a-24: kyi hud khyim thab khyod gang du song snyam du
T09D4152:146a-25: rnam pa mang po de ltar smre sngags 'don cing
T09D4152:146a-27: de nas dran pa rnam par rmongs pa nyid kyis smras //
T09D4152:146a-28: rang gi skye bo mchi ma grol bar nyer 'ongs dang //
T09D4152:146a-29: de ring bdag gi khyim 'dir ci phyir du ba ste //
T09D4152:146a-30: 'jigs pa bral ba bdag gi khyim thab gson pa yin //
T09D4152:146a-31: de ltar smras nas dgod dang bcas pas mi 'khrugs par //
T09D4152:146a-32: ri bong can gyi gdong can khyad par rnam bsams te //
T09D4152:146a-33: shin tu ma thug par dga' bas kun nas 'khyud byas te //
T09D4152:146a-34: bdag po shi ba la ni mal gyi steng gnas smras //
T09D4152:146a-35: de ring bdag la mngon par mi smra ci phyir 'di ;
T09D4152:146a-36: / mdza' bo khro ba dga' ba la gnod dor bar mdzod //
T09D4152:146a-37: gal te bdag ni nongs par byed pa 'byung 'gyur na //
T09D4152:146a-38: khyed kyi yid ni khros pa don med 'byung ba min //
T09D4152:146a-39: kye lags btsums pa'i mig ldan g-yo sgyu nyid kyis ni //
T09D4152:146a-40: 'on kyang khyod kyi skyon bcas nyid ni bdag gis shes //
T09D4152:146b-0: de ltar @146b dgod cing phrad par 'dod pa'i yid can gyis //
T09D4152:146b-1: de la nye bar sbas nas 'gram du 'ong byed 'gyur //
T09D4152:146b-2: nges par khyod ni zla 'dra bzhin dang ldan pa su zhig gi //
T09D4152:146b-3: 'dod pa dga' ba gzhon nu ma ni gzhan la dga' bar byed //
T09D4152:146b-4: de bas song la yun ring khyod kyis 'dod pa 'bras bcas gyis//
T09D4152:146b-5: chags la rtse gcig khyed la 'di ltar bdag gis gegs mi byed //
T09D4152:146b-6: shin tu ring shar ma lus ri bong can mtshan mthong nas ni //
T09D4152:146b-7: mchi ma'i chu yis lta ba 'gegs pa dbugs ni phyung byas te //
T09D4152:146b-8: de ni khyod dang phrad pa'i yid re khur gyis ngal ba la //
T09D4152:146b-9: mal gyi dbus su yan lag rnams ni rgyags bzhin bsnyal bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:146b-10: mdzes pa khyod ni nges par 'jigs te bdag gi tshogs 'di ni //
T09D4152:146b-11: mnyan nas gang gi khyed ni rtsub pa nyid du nyer song ba //
T09D4152:146b-12: longs shig bdag ni khros pa min zhes kun nas brjod bzhin pa //
T09D4152:146b-13: des ni de yi mig ni sor mo rnams kyis phye bar gyur //
T09D4152:146b-14: de nas de yi rang gi skye bo'i tshogs des
T09D4152:146b-15: nges par 'di dka' thub ma 'byung pos bzung ba
T09D4152:146b-16: ste / gang gis khyo shi ba la yang 'khyud
T09D4152:146b-17: nas 'di ltar mang po smra ba nyid du nye
T09D4152:146b-18: bar song ba zhes bya ba brjod de ngu bas
T09D4152:146b-19: kun nas ngal bas gnyid kyi dbang du song bar
T09D4152:146b-20: ste / gyur to // khyim na skye bo'i sgra
T09D4152:146b-21: med pa mthong nas des srog dang bral bas bya
T09D4152:146b-22: ba dang bral ba'i lus khyo bo de phrag pa
T09D4152:146b-23: la bkal te mtshan mo yongs su smin pas 'od
T09D4152:146b-24: med pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i nam
T09D4152:146b-25: mkha' la grong khyer gyi sgo rnams rnam par grol
T09D4152:146b-26: bar gyur pa'i sgo dang ldan pa rnams la /

T09D4152:146b-28: khyer gyi shing rnams yod pa dang mkha' snang gi
T09D4152:146b-29: rnam pa'i mar me'i rtse mo rnams yod pa dang
T09D4152:146b-30: / lhag ma dang bcas pa'i gnyid kyis khyab pa'i
T09D4152:146b-31: mig dang ldan pa'i skas kyi rim pas mtshan pa'i
T09D4152:146b-32: rkang pa byas nas lam nas 'gro ba rnams so
T09D4152:146b-33: sor gnas par gyur pa dang /
T09D4152:146b-34: nyi ma sprin gyis bsgribs pa'i dus ltar kun nas

T09D4152:146b-36: dang / tho rangs kyi rnga'i sgras kun nas gang

T09D4152:146b-38: pa dang khyim bya'i sgra kun nas thos par gyur
T09D4152:146b-39: pa dang ldan pa'i grong dang grong khyer rnams yod

T09D4152:147a-0: dang / @147a * // par gyur pa de dang de nyid du /
T09D4152:147a-1: dus ring nyid kyis rnam par rnyings pa yi //
T09D4152:147a-2: dri ma can gyi gos ni gon bzhin pa //
T09D4152:147a-3: pheg rdob byed pa'i sgra ldan byis rnams kyis //
T09D4152:147a-4: kun nas 'od med mdzes pa yongs su bskor //
T09D4152:147a-5: de ni mthong nas byis pa rnams dgod 'gyur //
T09D4152:147a-6: mig ni mchi ma dang bcas bud med rnams //
T09D4152:147a-7: 'gyur te rang nyid kyis 'di kye ma rmongs //
T09D4152:147a-8: dri med blo ldan mi rnams kyis 'di smras //
T09D4152:147a-9: de nas dus kyi rim pas rnag dang bcas pa
T09D4152:147a-10: sha dang pags pa lhung bas dkar rtsis rjes su
T09D4152:147a-11: byugs pa dang 'dra bar rus pa'i lhag ma can
T09D4152:147a-12: lus de des 'dzin par byed cing dus gcig gi
T09D4152:147a-13: tshe na // ri'i gnas gzhan rnams dang dur khrod rnams su yang kun nas 'khor bar gyur to //
T09D4152:147a-14: dus gang gi tshe yongs su ngal ba dang ldan
T09D4152:147a-15: par gyur pa de'i tshe shing gi rtsa ba 'ga'
T09D4152:147a-17: de'i lus dri ma dang bral ba'i chu bo la
T09D4152:147a-18: khrus byas nas nyi ma'i 'od zer rtsub pas bdag
T09D4152:147a-19: gi khyim thab kun nas ngal ba zhes bya ba
T09D4152:147a-20: brjod cing / skad cig skad cig du ni keng rus dkar po de //
T09D4152:147a-21: rim gyis rim gyis pad rtsa ma yin pas ni byugs //
T09D4152:147a-22: de yi mgo las skyes pa 'phos pa'i mgo la ni //
T09D4152:147a-23: gsal zhing autpa la sngon po'i phreng ba bcings par gyur //
T09D4152:147a-24: kun nas dmar ba'i 'dab ma nags kyi nang nas ni //
T09D4152:147a-25: nye bar btus nas rna ba'i bu gar sbyor bar gyur //
T09D4152:147a-26: dpral ba dkar po ri mo mthong la btsag gis ni //
T09D4152:147a-27: thig le kun nas rdzogs par byed pa nyid du 'gyur //
T09D4152:147a-28: so rnams rtsa ba gsal ba mang ba'i rgya skyegs kyis //
T09D4152:147a-29: tshon gyis dmar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa byas par 'gyur //
T09D4152:147a-30: kun nas 'khrugs pa'i padma'i rtsa ltar dkar ba'i 'od //
T09D4152:147a-31: lag pa gnyis pa me tog rtsi ni sbyar bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:147a-32: srab pa'i mar me'i rtse mo'i mig sman gyis nag pa //
T09D4152:147a-33: smin mtshams gnyis kyi shul dag rim gyis byas par gyur //
T09D4152:147a-34: rgya chen mig gi bug pa dag la dgod bcas pas //
T09D4152:147a-35: mig thur yang nas yang du 'khor zhing gnas //
T09D4152:147a-36: de nas sprin med zla ba'i 'od zer gyis dag pa //
T09D4152:147a-37: padmo'i lo ma'i nang na chu ni bzhag byas te //
T09D4152:147a-38: dgod pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi keng rus der //
T09D4152:147a-39: dga' bas rnam par lta bar byed cing kun nas smras //
T09D4152:147b-0: khyod kyi lus ni rgyan @147b rnams nges par byas pa ni //
T09D4152:147b-1: skal bzang nyid kyis dga' ba nyid du nyer song ba //
T09D4152:147b-2: dri ma med pa'i chu yi me long 'di la khyod //
T09D4152:147b-3: brtse ldan re zhig bzhin gyi zla ba rnam lta mdzod //
T09D4152:147b-4: de nas mtshan mo 'ongs pa dang mi'i rus pa
T09D4152:147b-5: bzhis la brkos shing de'i dbus su ni 'dab ma
T09D4152:147b-6: rnams kun nas bkram ste padmo'i 'dab ma rnams kyi
T09D4152:147b-8: keng rus de la 'phags pa'i sras tshur shog /
T09D4152:147b-9: aa ga ru dang spos kyis bsgos shing gnas pa'i
T09D4152:147b-10: khang pa bdag gis brtsams pa 'dir glang po che
T09D4152:147b-11: phru gu'i so'i rang bzhin rkang pa dang ldan pa
T09D4152:147b-12: 'jam pa'i mal cha dang bcas pa la zhugs shig
T09D4152:147b-13: ces smras so // de nas mon lug so rnams kyis ni dum byas te //
T09D4152:147b-14: keng rus de yi kha la dgod par byas nas ni //
T09D4152:147b-15: de la de nyid du ni rmongs pas kun 'khyud de //
T09D4152:147b-16: mi yis snang bar byas pa shing khang mthar ni bsnyal //
T09D4152:147b-17: de nas byang chub sems dpas slob ma dang rjes
T09D4152:147b-18: su 'gro ba skye bo'i drung nas kun nas mngon
T09D4152:147b-19: par 'ongs te // skye bo rnams kyi drung nas
T09D4152:147b-20: bud med de gdon gyis bzung ba mthong nas slob
T09D4152:147b-22: yang dag ma yin kun brtags kyis //
T09D4152:147b-23: de ltar skye bo 'di rmongs pa //
T09D4152:147b-24: shin tu bdag 'dzin byed pa ste //
T09D4152:147b-25: ci ltar dngos po med pa yang //
T09D4152:147b-26: bdag gi nang ldan rnams kyi nad //
T09D4152:147b-27: sman rnams kyis ni zad par byas //
T09D4152:147b-28: bud med de yi gdon thabs kyis //
T09D4152:147b-29: bdag gis zad par byed par 'gyur //
T09D4152:147b-30: ji ltar me tog mthe bo ni //
T09D4152:147b-32: de bzhin thabs dang rnam bral ba'i //
T09D4152:147b-35: blo dang ldan pa rnams la ni nus par bya
T09D4152:147b-36: ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba ci zhig yod
T09D4152:147b-37: de / bdag nyid chen po de yang snying rje'i
T09D4152:147b-38: kha lo sgyur bas rab tu bskul bar gyur pa'i
T09D4152:147b-39: yid kyi shing rta khyim du mi 'gro zhing /
T09D4152:147b-40: nyin mor byed pa nub pa'i dus kyi mtshams bgrod par dka' ba la ma brtsis shing ;
T09D4152:147b-41: nges par bud med de khyim dang yongs su 'dris
T09D4152:147b-42: par dur khrod kyi sa nyid la mngon par dga'
T09D4152:147b-43: bar byed snyam du rnam par bsams te /
T09D4152:147b-44: 'bar ba'i sreg lugs 'dzin pa'i snang bas n+ya gro
T09D4152:147b-45: dha'i shing la gnas pa'i bya rgod dang bya'i mtha'
T09D4152:148a-1: 'khor la gnas pa'i glang po che'i tshogs ltar nag
T09D4152:148a-2: pa'i yun ring po nas mun pas lta bar gyur
T09D4152:148a-3: pa dang 'dra bar ce spyang gi tshogs kyis lus
T09D4152:148a-4: mi snang bar byas pa dang /
T09D4152:148a-5: bar med par rtsub pa'i skra shad kyis sa'i dkyil khyab pa dang /
T09D4152:148a-6: me'i dbus su btsos bzhin pa'i kha zlum pa'i mi lus dang ldan pa dang /
T09D4152:148a-7: padma'i rtsa ba gsar pa ltar kun nas dkar ba'i sdug pa rnams kyis khyab pa dang /
T09D4152:148a-8: 'ga' zhig tu ri mor bris pa'i bum pa'i gyo mo rnams kyis bar mtshams med pa dang /
T09D4152:148a-9: phyed tshig pa'i shi ba'i gos dri ma can gyi dum bu rnams kyis kun nas khyab pa dang /
T09D4152:148a-10: nye bar gnas pa'i sha za'i bud med kyi skye
T09D4152:148a-11: bo rnams kyis mi'i sha rnam par 'god par 'gyur
T09D4152:148a-12: ba dang / gzhan du glo bur du byung ba'i
T09D4152:148a-13: skyes pa rnams kyis sha chen 'tshod par gyur pa
T09D4152:148a-14: ba dang / dang / gang zhig tu tshig par
T09D4152:148a-15: gyur pa'i lus las 'pho bar gyur pa'i tshil gyi
T09D4152:148a-16: thigs pa'i 'phreng ba rnams kyis sol ba 'am mi
T09D4152:148a-18: rab tu tsha ba'i me lces kun nas dmar skya'i
T09D4152:148a-19: rtsa bas steng du chu 'dzin pa ltar sngo ba'i
T09D4152:148a-20: sin dh'u ra dang rnams kyis btsos pa'i snam bu
T09D4152:148a-21: gnyis dang 'dra ba'i du ba'i tshogs chen pos steng
T09D4152:148a-22: nas bsgribs par byas pa dang /
T09D4152:148a-23: skye bo ma lus pa rnams yid 'byung ba skyed
T09D4152:148a-24: par 'dod pa nyid dang 'dra ba'i mi rtag pa
T09D4152:148a-26: shi ba'i lus kyi rang bzhin g-yul ngo'i gnas dang 'dra bar shin tu 'jigs pa /
T09D4152:148a-27: sv'a h'a'i bdag po'i rlung gi shugs kyis rnam par 'dra ba yis //
T09D4152:148a-28: kun nas spyan drangs ltar ni 'bar ba'i 'od ldan mi rnams kyis//
T09D4152:148a-29: 'byung ba'i ce spyang pho mo'i tshogs ltar gho ka'i skra ldan pa //
T09D4152:148a-30: dogs pa med pa'i yid can des ni dur khrod zhugs par gyur //
T09D4152:148a-31: bud med de ni gang na gnas par 'gyur snyam
T09D4152:148a-32: du kun nas 'khor zhing des sha za mo rnams
T09D4152:148a-33: kyi lus kyi bya ba de rnams kun nas mthong
T09D4152:148a-34: nas / slob ma'i bsrung ba'i sngags kyis gtsug phud 'ching bar byas par gyur to //
T09D4152:148a-35: der yang mi yi khrag gis dpral bar thig le byas nas ni //

T09D4152:148a-37: khyo phos 'dzin par byas pa rno ba'i so ldan pa'i //
T09D4152:148b-0: dgra sta la ni la la zhig gis gdong mthong @148b 'gyur //
T09D4152:148b-1: khrag gi chang gis gang ba zla ba ltar dkar ba //
T09D4152:148b-2: thod pa'i snod ni gzhan gyis sa la rnam bkod nas //

T09D4152:148b-4: dgra sta g-yam pa la ni brdar bar byas par gyur //
T09D4152:148b-5: me yi tsha bas btsums par byas pa'i mig ldan pa ;
T09D4152:148b-6: / gzhan dag mi ni phyed ni tshig pa'i lus ldan pa //
T09D4152:148b-7: lhung zhing dro ba'i rkang mar cha ldan zhu ba ni //
T09D4152:148b-8: glo bur du ni dur khrod dbus nas 'gugs par 'gyur //
T09D4152:148b-9: khrag 'dzag pa yi rkang mar cha yis nye bar byugs pa yi //
T09D4152:148b-10: rdo la kha chu skyes bzhin pas ni rnam par bzhag pa ni //
T09D4152:148b-11: skyes pa'i dum bu bcag pas yang dag 'byung ba'i 'jigs sgra ldan //
T09D4152:148b-12: gzhan dag gis ni rdo bas rnam par gcod pa nyid du 'gyur //
T09D4152:148b-13: mdza' bo'i lag pa'i mthil gyis nye bar khyer bar byed bzhin pa //
T09D4152:148b-14: ya ba'i me tog ltar ni mngon par dmar po dmar ldan pa //
T09D4152:148b-15: thod pa yang dag gnas pa'i khrag gi chang gis gzhan dag ni //
T09D4152:148b-16: 'gyur ba'i gdong can sha dang nye bar bcas pa 'thung bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:148b-17: sha za mo de rnams kyang 'di ltar bya ba la rtse gcig par yang dag par mthong nas /
T09D4152:148b-18: ae ma'o mtshan mo rgyu ba 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin ni drag pa ste /
T09D4152:148b-19: drag pa zhes bya ba rnam par bsams nas phyogs gzhan la /
T09D4152:148b-21: chang bcas nya yis 'ga' zhig kyang //
T09D4152:148b-22: sa yis mthar thug khyab pa ni //
T09D4152:148b-23: ri yi gtor mas 'ga' zhig tu //
T09D4152:148b-24: dur khrod me yi grib mas ni //
T09D4152:148b-25: gsal bar byas pa'i lus ldan pa //
T09D4152:148b-26: shugs dang bral ba'i ral grir ldan ;
T09D4152:148b-27: / phyogs skyong rnams kyis snang bar byas //
T09D4152:148b-28: rig pa'i dngos grub mngon 'dod pa'i //
T09D4152:148b-29: brten par bzlas pas rab mgul chu //
T09D4152:148b-30: bdag nyid chen po rab 'byung bas //
T09D4152:148b-31: dbus su byin gyis brlabs par byas //
T09D4152:148b-32: thal bar rtse gsum rnams bkod pas //
T09D4152:148b-33: bar du 'gro bar byas pa ni ;
T09D4152:148b-34: / me tog dmar po kun khyab pa'i //
T09D4152:148b-36: 'ga' zhig tu yang khrag gis mngon par dmar bar
T09D4152:148b-37: byas pa'i so dang ldan pa'i ri dags skyon can
T09D4152:148b-38: rnams kyis kun nas dbugs phyung bar gyur pa'i phyir
T09D4152:148b-39: rgyu ma'i dra ba rdol ba /
T09D4152:149a-1: mchus mig phyung ba'i bu ga rnams kyis 'jigs su rung ba'i gdong dang ldan pa /
T09D4152:149a-2: shi ba'i chom rkun pas 'tsho ba'i yo byad phrogs
T09D4152:149a-3: par byas pa'i bud med mthong nas yid byung ba'i
T09D4152:149a-5: kye ma 'dod chags dang ldan pa rnams kyis 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid du 'dug pa ste /
T09D4152:149a-6: gang rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i lus las bde ba'i blo skye bar 'gyur snyam nas smras pa /
T09D4152:149a-7: yang yang kun nas nyams pa 'dod cing 'dod pa ni //
T09D4152:149a-8: skye bo'i mig gi bung ba'i tshogs kyis gang zhig la //
T09D4152:149a-9: de ni de ring bud med ljon shing las byung ba'i //
T09D4152:149a-10: yid 'ong mdzes dgod me tog ji ltar mthong mi 'gyur //
T09D4152:149a-11: yan lag med pa khyod kyis dgod pa'i bdag nyid kyis //
T09D4152:149a-12: gang la 'dab rten sngon du yang dag 'gengs pa ste //
T09D4152:149a-13: khyod kyis di ring bud med lus can de la ni //
T09D4152:149a-14: skyon can btsan thabs kyis ni ci phyir mda' mi gtong //
T09D4152:149a-15: gang zhig yang yang 'dod pa'i bdag nyid 'khyud byas pa //
T09D4152:149a-16: pags pas g-yogs la 'dod chags can gyi skye bo gang //
T09D4152:149a-17: de ring de 'di rus pa'i rang bzhin lus 'di ni //
T09D4152:149a-18: sna ni 'gegs pa nyid ni spangs nas grol bar 'gyur //
T09D4152:149a-19: mchi ma dang bcas mig dang ldan pa'i ngo gdong 'di ni ci phyir 'dud mi byed //
T09D4152:149a-20: ri bong can gyi gdong can skyo na dang bral
T09D4152:149a-21: ba'i mthun pa bdag la don med khros pas ci
T09D4152:149a-22: // de ltar nges par brjod par byed pa'i bdag pos gang la mgo bo rnams zhugs pa //
T09D4152:149a-23: de yi rkang pa gnyis po la ni 'di yi khyed rnams kyis ni so rnams gnas //

T09D4152:149a-25: ngal ba byis pa'i skye bo sems kyi ri dags sngon du gang gis bkri bar byas pa ni //
T09D4152:149a-26: 'bad pas 'dod pa'i lha yi rngon pas de ni brtsams par gyur pa ji ltar gang gis kyang //
T09D4152:149a-27: snang rung min pa'i gzugs can gyis ni chung rol pa yi rang bzhin 'dra ba rnams ched byas //
T09D4152:149a-28: de ltar bdag nyid chen po des bud med kyi
T09D4152:149a-29: lus mthong bas 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag
T09D4152:149a-30: par byung bas smras par gyur pa //
T09D4152:149a-31: kye ma mi ro'i dri mi zhim pas sna yi dbang po skyo bar byas pa /
T09D4152:149a-32: sdong khang gi me'i du bas yang dag par reg
T09D4152:149b-0: pas bdag nyid @149b mi gcang ba rlom par byed
T09D4152:149b-2: 'di yang chu 'dzin lto ba'i 'od ni 'phrog pa'i
T09D4152:149b-3: du ba 'dis ni yun ring por ni song ba
T09D4152:149b-4: yin // dur khrod las byung rnam par 'phro byed
T09D4152:149b-5: 'od ni 'phro ba dri ma can du khyer bar
T09D4152:149b-6: yin // byed // chu gter rlabs ldan chu la
T09D4152:149b-7: khrus ni byas ltar grong bas khyab pa rim gyis
T09D4152:149b-8: yin // byed // nub pa ni // ri bong
T09D4152:149b-9: can ni zla tshes gos rlon lta bur 'dzin cing
T09D4152:149b-12: bdag gi sdug bsngal mi bzod cing //
T09D4152:149b-13: the tshom byed par gyur pa yang //
T09D4152:149b-14: gzhan gyi rjes 'dzin bya ba'i phyir //
T09D4152:149b-15: so so'i skye bos nus pa min //
T09D4152:149b-16: byang chub sems dbas smras pa ;
T09D4152:149b-17: / tshe dang ldan pas yang dag par mngon par smras te /
T09D4152:149b-18: da ni de bas na ma mo'i khyim rnying pa
T09D4152:149b-19: 'di ru dur khrod kyi sreg lugs 'dzin pa'i snang
T09D4152:149b-20: bas rtsig ngos la bris pa'i phyugs kyi khrag gis
T09D4152:149b-21: rtse gsum pa gsal bar byas pa la rjes su
T09D4152:149b-22: zhugs te / mtshan mo'i lhag ma 'da' bar byed cing /
T09D4152:149b-23: da nas shing gis kun nas mtshan pa'i sgo dang dril bu'i tshogs ldan pa //
T09D4152:149b-24: rgyal mtshan las lhung rma bya'i mgrin pa rdul ni 'byung ba'i sa ldan pa //
T09D4152:149b-25: phyi dang nang du me tog rnying por skud rnams kyis nyer bsags pa //
T09D4152:149b-26: ma he'i mgo bo gang la bya rgod 'di ni nges par gnas pa yin //
T09D4152:149b-28: mkhan po ji ltar bka' stsol ba bzhin du bya'o zhes zer ro //
T09D4152:149b-29: de nas ke sha bas ma mo'i khyim nger zhugs nas cung zad gnyid log par byas te /
T09D4152:149b-30: so sor rnam par sad par byas nas smras pa /
T09D4152:149b-31: tshe dang ldan pa phyi rol du byung la re
T09D4152:149b-32: zhig mtshan mo'i lhag ma ci tsam yod pa de
T09D4152:149b-33: shes par byos shig / des kyang de ltar bgyi
T09D4152:149b-34: zhes so sor mnyan nas mngon par byung ste smras
T09D4152:149b-35: pa / mkhan po tho rangs nyid yin te /
T09D4152:149b-37: mtshan mo chad par shes nas shing gi tshang 'di
T09D4152:149b-38: la ni bzod pa can nyid 'di la brten par
T09D4152:149b-39: byed // zad par gyur pa'i bud shing ldan pa
T09D4152:149b-40: ro bsregs me'i 'od rnams cung zad dri ma can
T09D4152:149b-41: byed // 'dzin te // nyi ma shar ba'i 'od
T09D4152:149b-42: zer 'phro ba rnams kyis reg par 'gyur ba'i sa
T09D4152:149b-44: bar ni sngo bar byas pa'i bung ba ltar ni
T09D4152:149b-45: ser skya'i 'od ldan sa phyogs mnyam par skye ba
T09D4152:150a-0: yin // de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyir byung ste @150a * //
T09D4152:150a-2: tshe dang ldan pas nad pa rnams nad med par bya ba'i phyir grong khyer du song shig dang /

T09D4152:150a-5: la gsong por smras te shin tu rings par grong
T09D4152:150a-6: khyer du song bar gyur to //
T09D4152:150a-7: byang chub sems dpas kyang bud med dka' thub can

T09D4152:150a-17: padmo'i 'dab ma rnams kyis ma la ni byas pa 'di //

T09D4152:150a-19: mtshan ma nye bar mnan pas dbus ni rnam nub cing //

T09D4152:150a-28: gi sdong po la bcings nas gzhag cing smras pa

T09D4152:150b-1: / dgod par gsal bar byas pa'i so yi phreng ba can //

T09D4152:151a-27: thub pa rnams kyi sems kyang gzhan du 'gyur ba ste //

T09D4152:152a-25: rmongs pas don med dgon par du ba des ni byed par 'gyur //
T09D4152:152a-26: bdag gis khyod la yang dang yang du smras pa ste /

T09D4152:159b-21: kun nas 'gro ba 'di yang sgeg cing rkang pa rnams par bkod pas 'jam pa ni //
T09D4152:159b-22: de ltar brjod cing ltad mo ba ni 'phrog byed gar mkhan la yang spro ba skyed //
T09D4152:159b-23: de lta bur gyur pa'i lha yang ltad mo ba
T09D4152:159b-24: ste de bas na bdag gi rjes su 'dzin pa
T09D4152:159b-25: ste gal te bdag gar gyi bstan bcos rab tu
T09D4152:159b-26: sbyor zhing lhas mthong bar 'dod ces zer ro //
T09D4152:159b-28: de bas na dus 'da' bas chog ste gar gyi

T09D4152:159b-30: ces zer ro // de ltar bgyi 'o zhes bya
T09D4152:159b-31: ba gtso bo des so sor mnyan nas mig la
T09D4152:159b-32: dga' bar gyur pa ltad mo'i khyim rnam par bsams
T09D4152:159b-33: ces zer ro // na // btsun mo'i 'khor dang

T09D4152:159b-35: rgyal po de yang dag par nye bar bzhugs pa

T09D4152:159b-37: po'i pho brang du zlos gar mkhan gyis shis pa
T09D4152:159b-38: brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gdon pa sngon du
T09D4152:159b-39: 'gro bar gar gyi cho ga rab tu skabs phye
T09D4152:159b-41: gtso bo des dpe med ma dang lhan cig tu
T09D4152:159b-42: ltad mo ba rnams kyi sar rab tu zhugs par
T09D4152:159b-43: gyur to // kun nas thos par byed cing rdza rnga'i sprin gyi sgra chen po //
T09D4152:159b-44: gar de sprin gyi dus na mig rnams la ni mngon par dga' //
T09D4152:160a-1: byas pa'i gdong can sgeg cing mngon dga' ba //
T09D4152:160a-2: gar mkhan mo yi glog de ma lus pa ni brgyan par byas //
T09D4152:160a-3: gtso bo'i dpyid ni mdzes pa ma nyams yang dag thob nas ni //

T09D4152:160a-5: sor phreng 'od zer ze'u 'bru can na cung zad du //
T09D4152:160a-6: dpe med ma yin padmo sgeg dang bcas par gsal byas gyur //
T09D4152:160a-7: nyams ni gang gang ston par byed cing sgeg dang bcas par nyams ldan nas //
T09D4152:160a-8: de ni gang du shin tu dgar 'gyur yan lag srog shing can //
T09D4152:160a-9: mtshar bas legs so legs so zhes ni skye bo kun brjod cing ;
T09D4152:160a-10: / de la bltas nas phrad 'dod phyir ni de rang bzhin ltar 'gyur //
T09D4152:160a-11: bud med gzugs ni zla ba ltar ni yid 'ong sgeg spangs kyang //
T09D4152:160a-12: skye bo sems ni phrad par 'dod pa byed pa nyid yin te //
T09D4152:160a-13: ngo tsha sgeg dang 'jam pa'i dgod pas mchu ni bskum byas pa //
T09D4152:160a-14: yid kyi rnam 'gyur ldan pa'i sna tshogs cha mkhas smos ci dgos //

T09D4152:160a-16: spyod pa'i yongs su ngal bas yid skyob nyid kyis

T09D4152:160b-11: 'di ltar gyur pa'i gzhon nu ma yi gzugs ni ae ma sgeg pa yi //
T09D4152:160b-12: mdzes pa yid 'ong su zhig yid la bde bar byed ma yin //

T09D4152:160b-14: kyi nags na gnas pa rnams kyi mig gi yul

T09D4152:160b-25: 'o ma 'dzin pa gnyis ni 'byung ba srab pa'i dbus kyi cha //

T09D4152:166a-7: bdag gi yid ni pha yi khang par phrad par 'dod pa ste //
T09D4152:166a-8: gang gi pha yi khyim du bdag ni gnas nas de yi tshe //
T09D4152:166a-9: shin tu phrad par 'dod pas slar yang bdag po'i khyim ni dran //
T09D4152:166a-11: sems la gnod byed mi 'gyur ba //
T09D4152:166a-12: de ltar de nyid sa skyong ni //
T09D4152:166a-13: blo gros chen pos shes pa yin //
T09D4152:166a-14: de nas tshang las 'phye ba'i lcags kyi srog shing
T09D4152:166a-15: ltar gzugs nag pa lce gnyis rab tu 'phrog par
T09D4152:166a-16: byed pa'i lto 'phye phyi rol du byung ste /
T09D4152:166a-17: dbyig pa can la smras pa /
T09D4152:166a-19: bdag gi tshig gis rgyal po me long gdong can la khyod kyis dri bar byas te /
T09D4152:166a-20: sems 'di sreg par 'dod cing me ltar ci yi phyir na ni //
T09D4152:166a-21: tshang las phyi rol byung zhing bdag la bzod pa'i dgra 'byung ste //
T09D4152:166a-22: de la gnas shing khros pa nye bar bral ba zhi ba ni //
T09D4152:166a-23: ting nge 'dzin la rtse gcig thub pa ltar ni sems ni 'gyur //
T09D4152:166a-24: de las mda'i snye ma'i rtsa las shang shang de'u mngon par smras par gyur pa /
T09D4152:166a-25: bram ze chen po bdag gi tshig gis kyang 'di
T09D4152:166a-26: ltar rgyal po me long gdong can la dri bar
T09D4152:166a-27: bya ste / ji ltar zhe na /
T09D4152:166a-28: mda' yi snye mar 'dir gnas shing //
T09D4152:166a-29: brtan pa mchog ni bdag gis rnyed //
T09D4152:166a-30: gzhan du gnas pas ci phyir ni //
T09D4152:166a-32: dbyug pa can gyis smras pa /
T09D4152:166a-33: gal te 'di rnams kyi drung nas bdag la grol bar 'byung bar gyur na /
T09D4152:166a-34: de nas gtam 'di thams cad rgyal po la bdag gis zhus par gyur zhes bya ba'o //
T09D4152:166a-35: rim gyis kyang de rnams song ba nyid la nyi
T09D4152:166a-36: ma nub pa'i ri la lhag par 'dzegs pa ste
T09D4152:166a-37: / de nas de rnams thams cad nyid ni shing
T09D4152:166a-38: nya gro dha'i 'og tu shing gel ba'i gnas la
T09D4152:166a-40: de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus la de rnams gnyid
T09D4152:166b-0: log pa la dbyug @166b pa can gyis 'di ltar
T09D4152:166b-2: gal te ji ltar yang bdag 'di rnams kyi tha
T09D4152:166b-3: snyad kyis pham par gyur na de nas chad pa
T09D4152:166b-4: bdag gis gang nas sbyin par bya zhes zer ro
T09D4152:166b-5: // rgyal po'i skye bo rnams kyis sdug bsngal sbyin
T09D4152:166b-6: par byed pa sdug bsngal chen po bzod par nus
T09D4152:166b-8: de bas na shing n+ya gro dha la 'dzegs nas
T09D4152:166b-9: bdag nyid lcebs par 'gyur ba zhes rnam par bsams
T09D4152:166b-10: nas yang bcings pa bkrol nas shing n+ya gro dha
T09D4152:166b-11: la 'dzegs pa ste bdag nyid la thag pas 'gag
T09D4152:166b-13: de nas de mi khur chen pos /
T09D4152:166b-14: ro langs mnyam pa'i chos ldan pa'i//
T09D4152:166b-15: shing gi yal ga chag gyur te //
T09D4152:166b-16: de las yang dag skyes pa'i sgra //
T09D4152:166b-17: de nas gel ba'i bdag po de //
T09D4152:166b-18: gnyid log stong du skad cig gis //
T09D4152:166b-19: lus che ba ni lhung 'gyur te //
T09D4152:166b-20: thag pas bcings pa'i skye bo can //
T09D4152:166b-21: gel ba'i bdag pos 'jigs pa ni //
T09D4152:166b-22: de nas lag ngar chag langs nas //
T09D4152:166b-23: gnyen rnams longs shing gnas pa ste //
T09D4152:166b-25: shing n+ya gro dha 'di las sha za lhung bas bdag gi rje ngar 'di chag pa ste /
T09D4152:166b-26: de bas khyed cag rnams kyis mar me rab tu sbar bar mdzod cig ces zer ro //
T09D4152:166b-27: de nas der kha cig rang bzhin gyis 'jigs pa
T09D4152:166b-28: rnams sha za zhes bya ba thos nas phyogs rnams
T09D4152:166b-29: su mi snang bar gyur ro //
T09D4152:166b-30: gzhan dag ni me mar sbar bar bya ste //
T09D4152:166b-31: bram ze de la mthong bar gyur te //
T09D4152:166b-32: lhung bas rma byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis kun nas
T09D4152:166b-33: 'khrugs pa'i blo can dbugs dbyung ba mthong nas kyang
T09D4152:166b-35: khyod kyis gel ba'i bdag po'i rje par chag pa ste /
T09D4152:166b-36: de bas na tshur shog rgyal po'i drung du 'gro bar bya zhes zer ro //
T09D4152:166b-37: gel ba srung ba de rnams kyis kyang tho rangs
T09D4152:166b-38: kyi dus na gzhan de rnams dang lhan cig tu
T09D4152:166b-39: rgyal po'i drung du khrid par gyur to //
T09D4152:166b-40: de nas mdun sar bzhugs pa'i dus la dbyig pa
T09D4152:166b-41: can dang lhan cig tu de rnams thams cad sgo
T09D4152:166b-42: bas rgyal po me long gdong can gyi drung du
T09D4152:166b-44: gnyis skyes de ni shin tu 'jigs pas brgyal ba'i yid //
T09D4152:166b-45: de nas sa yi bdag pos de ni mthong gyur na //
T09D4152:166b-46: snying rje'i dbang gis brlan pa'i yid ni 'gyur ba ste //
T09D4152:166b-47: sa gsum la ni gcig tu phan phyir yang dag brtson //
T09D4152:167a-1: rnams thams cad kyis kyang rim gyis dbyig pa can
T09D4152:167a-2: gyi nyes pa brjod par gyur pa dang de nas
T09D4152:167a-3: rgyal po des yin par gyis shig / thabs dang
T09D4152:167a-4: bcas par bdag gis bram ze 'di grol bar byed
T09D4152:167a-5: par 'gyur snyam du rnam par bsams nas smras pa
T09D4152:167a-6: / tha snyad ma thob pa'i bram ze 'di ci'i
T09D4152:167a-7: phyir khyed rnams kyis bsad pa dang bcings pa'i kun
T09D4152:167a-8: nas nyon mongs pas kun nas khyer ba ste /
T09D4152:167a-9: de bas na khyed rnams thams cad nyid chad pa gcad par 'os so zhes zer ro //
T09D4152:167a-10: yang na bram ze 'di grol bar gyis shig ces zer ro //
T09D4152:167a-11: de rnams kyang chad pas 'jigs pas de bkrol nas
T09D4152:167a-12: gnas ji lta bar kun nas song bar gyur to
T09D4152:167a-13: // dbyig pa can dga' ba'i yid can des kyang
T09D4152:167a-14: rgyal po de la shis pa brjod pa rnams kyis
T09D4152:167a-15: mngon par bstod par byas te /
T09D4152:167a-16: rigs kyi bud med la sogs pa de rnams kyi gtam de zhus par gyur to //
T09D4152:167a-17: de nas rgyal po des thos nas smras pa /
T09D4152:167a-18: rigs kyi bud med de la 'di ltar brjod par bya ba ste /
T09D4152:167a-19: bdag po'i khyim du song ba pha'i khyim du yang //
T09D4152:167a-20: skyes pa gzhan dag 'dod pa gdungs pa mngon par 'dod //
T09D4152:167a-21: de ltar 'dar bar byed cing me dang sol bltar //
T09D4152:167a-22: gzhan dang 'brel ba'i sems ldan brtan pa khyod mi rnyed //
T09D4152:167a-24: de dag las ni sems zlog cig / don med kun rtog gis rmongs pa'i //
T09D4152:167a-25: skye bo 'ga' zhig bde ba med //
T09D4152:167a-26: sbrul la yang ni brjod bya ste //
T09D4152:167a-27: gal te khyod ni bde bar 'dod //
T09D4152:167a-28: srog chags su zhig mthong nas ni //
T09D4152:167a-29: khro ba byed par 'os pa min //
T09D4152:167a-30: gang zhig khro pa'i me ni spar byas nas //
T09D4152:167a-31: rang gi yid ni tshig ste gzhan yang sreg / nges par rmongs pa'i sems dang ldan bde //
T09D4152:167a-32: dmyal ba'i me yi bud shing nyid du 'gro / shang shang de'u la yang smra bar bya ste /
T09D4152:167a-34: mda' yi gel ba'i 'og tu ni //
T09D4152:167a-35: gter ni yod pa des khyod ni //
T09D4152:167a-36: gnas shing shin tu de la yang //
T09D4152:167a-37: yid ni brtan ldan skye ba yin //
T09D4152:167a-38: gter de yang brkos nas khyed dbul ba'i sdug bsngal
T09D4152:167a-39: dang rnam par bral ba bde bar khyim gyi gnas
T09D4152:167a-41: de bas na song shig ces bya ba'o //
T09D4152:167a-42: de nas dbyig pa can rgyal po de'i blo'i khyad
T09D4152:167a-43: par gyis blo la ngo mtshar skyes pas zhus par
T09D4152:167b-0: @167b gyur te / 'os so // byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
T09D4152:167b-1: bla na med pa'i byang chub bdag / zhi ba'i phyir ni thob par 'dod //
T09D4152:167b-2: srid gsum rgya mtshor nub gyur pa'i //
T09D4152:167b-4: dbyig pa can gyis smras pa /
T09D4152:167b-5: gang tshe khyod kyis byang chub thob //
T09D4152:167b-6: mi shes rab rib gcod pa ni //
T09D4152:167b-7: de tshe khyod kyis sleb par bdag / gyur cig des ni so sor thos //
T09D4152:167b-8: de nas bram ze de song nas gtam de de rnams la smras te /
T09D4152:167b-9: gter de bton nas dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa
T09D4152:167b-10: gnyen 'dun rnams dang lhan cig tu nor gyis phongs
T09D4152:167b-11: pa'i sdug bsngal rnam par bsal te bde bar gnas
T09D4152:167b-12: par gyur to // de nas blon po'i gtso bo
T09D4152:167b-13: la la zhig byang chub sems dpa' la yang nas
T09D4152:167b-14: yang du 'di ltar bstod pa'i skud par brgyus pa'i
T09D4152:167b-15: tshig gi me tog rnams kyis mngon par mchod cing
T09D4152:167b-16: par gyur to // gnas so // lha'i 'di lta
T09D4152:167b-17: bu shes pa che ba'i bdag nyid kyis su zhig
T09D4152:167b-18: ces bya ba ngo mtshar par bkug pa ma yin
T09D4152:167b-19: par gyur to // gnas so // zhes smas te
T09D4152:167b-20: / ril gnas pa'i me ni ring po nas kyang
T09D4152:167b-21: du ba'i rjes su dpag pas rjes dpog byed //
T09D4152:167b-22: 'jig rten 'di na rjes su dpog byed dpag par bya ba'i yul can rjes dpog blo ni mthong //
T09D4152:167b-23: rjes su dpag bya'i dngos po the tshom can la skye bo the tshom bskyed //
T09D4152:167b-24: the tshom med pa'i blo ldan khyed 'dra rnams la dbang po las ni 'das kyang mngon sum ldan //
T09D4152:167b-25: gang phyir 'jig rten 'di na yid ni chung ba yul can dbang po rnams kyi dbang byas te //
T09D4152:167b-26: de phyir mkhas pa rnams ni dbang po zhes brjod de la dbang du byed pa yod pa la //
T09D4152:167b-27: khyed ni ma lus shes bya'i pha rol phyin la gang phyin dbang po rnams lhag dbang byed pa //
T09D4152:167b-28: khyed la dbang ba nyid ni ma thob dbang po shes par bya ba don med brjed pa yin //
T09D4152:167b-29: de bas nor ldan kun mchog bcas //
T09D4152:167b-30: rdo rje can gyis mtho ris ltar //
T09D4152:167b-31: srid pa rnams gcod rnam zhugs pa'i //
T09D4152:167b-32: sems dang ldan pa khyod nyid kyis //
T09D4152:167b-33: de ltar na bcom 'das de byang chub sems dpar
T09D4152:167b-34: gyur pa na skyon mong ba'i rgyal srid kyang rjes
T09D4152:167b-35: su skyong bar mdzad pas shes rab che ba'i bdag
T09D4152:167b-36: nyid kyis rgud par song pa rnams la kun nas
T09D4152:167b-37: gdon par mdzad do snyam du rnam par bsams nas
T09D4152:168a-0: / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dad pa rtse gcig pa rnams kyis gnas par @168a * //
T09D4152:168a-2: me long gi gdong can gyi skyes pa'i rabs te skyes rabs bcu pa'o //
T09D4152:168a-4: sbrul dang ri dags gnod sbyin gnod //
T09D4152:168a-5: rtsa ba can dang mi ci mo //
T09D4152:168a-6: 'bar can sman ba rkang rjes shes //
T09D4152:168a-7: gar byed me lang gdong can no /
T09D4152:168a-9: // / bde ba'i cha yis kun rtog rmongs sems kyi //
T09D4152:168a-10: sems ni shin tu bcings pa'i rtsa ba can //
T09D4152:168a-11: dam pa rnams ni chags bral gtam gyi chus //
T09D4152:168a-12: chags pa'i me ni zhi bar mdzad pa yin //
T09D4152:168a-14: yo byad yongs su rdzogs pas rab tu dga' ba'i skye bo rnams kyis dga' bar gyur pa /
T09D4152:168a-15: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skyed mos tshal rnams kyis
T09D4152:168a-16: mtha' kun nas khyab pa'i 'jog po'i brag ces bya
T09D4152:168a-18: bstan bcos du ma rnams la kun nas 'dris pas rnam par dag pa'i blo /
T09D4152:168a-19: dam pa ma yin pa'i skye bo dang 'brel pa la rgyab tu phyogs pa /
T09D4152:168a-20: skye bo bzang po dang 'brel pa la mngon par dga' ba //
T09D4152:168a-21: dul ba dang des pa dang bzod pas rnam par brgyan pa /
T09D4152:168a-22: 'jig rten thams cad kyi gnyen dang 'dra ba'i ded
T09D4152:168a-23: dpon legs 'gro zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
T09D4152:168a-25: mun pa 'joms byed blo yis ni //
T09D4152:168a-26: des ni mtshan rnams byas par gyur //
T09D4152:168a-27: 'od kyis skye bo la bde ba //
T09D4152:168a-28: cha dang bcas pa'i zla ba ltar //
T09D4152:168a-29: 'gro la mi phan sel ba la ni gcig tu mkhas //
T09D4152:168a-30: mdun sa mdun sa la ni snang bar gyur pa'i blo //
T09D4152:168a-31: grogs po ltar ni yon tan rnams kyis de 'khyud pa //
T09D4152:168a-32: byas nas 'bras bu ma lus can ni kun nas 'ongs //
T09D4152:168a-33: de nas dus gcig gi tshe na bdag nyid chen
T09D4152:168a-34: po de b'a r'a na s'ir lha'i bu mo'i gzugs
T09D4152:168a-35: dang mnyam pa'i bzang mo zhes bya ba res ma'i
T09D4152:168a-36: gtso mo zhes bya ba res ma'i gtso mo thob
T09D4152:168a-37: par gyur to // gang gis gzugs mdzes shing rnam par sgeg pa'i zhags pa rnams kyis bkug ste /
T09D4152:168a-38: ded dpon mang po rnams bdag gis byas te /
T09D4152:168a-39: de nas de'i gzugs bzang ba'i nga rgyal bsal ba'i
T09D4152:168a-40: don du de dang 'brel pa can rnams la yang
T09D4152:168a-41: dul ba'i phyir grogs mang po 'dzin pas legs 'gro
T09D4152:168a-42: b'a r'a na s'ir kun nas song bar gyur to
T09D4152:168a-43: // legs 'gro 'ongs pa thos nas kyang res ma'i
T09D4152:168b-0: gtso mo de la @168b skyon can rnams kyis rab
T09D4152:168b-2: khyod kyi skal bzang phun sum tshogs pa 'di //
T09D4152:168b-3: nor sbyin lta bu mdzes pa mo legs 'gro //
T09D4152:168b-4: ts'u ta'i srog shing las ni bud ba ltar //
T09D4152:168b-5: me tog 'byor pas de ring kun nas bkug / de bas mkhas shing tshig gis gsal ba ni //
T09D4152:168b-6: yid 'ong spos dang dri sogs rab 'dzin pa //
T09D4152:168b-7: khyod kyis der ni rab tu gtong mdzod cig / pho nya mo ni su zhig legs 'gro la //
T09D4152:168b-8: dpal ldan bstod pa gsal ba sgeg rnams kyis //
T09D4152:168b-9: de la spyod yul du ni 'ongs byas nas //
T09D4152:168b-10: snying po bzung nas phyis ni dor 'gyur te //
T09D4152:168b-11: smin pa'i aa mra'i 'bras bu'i rus pa ltar //
T09D4152:168b-12: de ltar dgod dang bcas pa mnyan nas ni //
T09D4152:168b-13: skyon can gyi tshig nor 'dod bzang mo yis //
T09D4152:168b-14: brtan pa de la nye bar 'ongs pa'i phyir //
T09D4152:168b-15: tshig la mkhas pa pho nya mo ni btang //
T09D4152:168b-16: me tog de rnams yid ni 'phrog par byed pa blangs nas ni //
T09D4152:168b-17: tamba la dang zla ba'i 'od zer ltar dkar tsan dan ni //
T09D4152:168b-18: gnod sbyin ltar spyod rim gyis pho nya mo ni mngon spong ba //
T09D4152:168b-19: legs 'gro 'jig rten pa yi ltad mo rnam par ma nyams pa //
T09D4152:168b-20: nye bar spyod pa dang bcas par byang chub sems
T09D4152:168b-21: dpa' la yang dag par nye bar 'ongs shing phyag
T09D4152:168b-22: btsal bar byas te smras pa /
T09D4152:168b-23: skal ba chen po bzang mo zhes bya ba'i res
T09D4152:168b-24: ma'i gtso mo'i bu mo res ma'i gtso mo thams
T09D4152:168b-25: cad kyi dpal 'phrog par byed cing /
T09D4152:168b-26: skar ma rnams kyi nang na ri bong can gyi
T09D4152:168b-27: cha ltar gnas pa las 'di ltar zhu bar byed
T09D4152:168b-28: de / ji ltar rang gi khyim 'di dor nas
T09D4152:168b-29: ci'i phyir 'phags pa'i sras gzhan du gnas zhes zer
T09D4152:168b-30: de / ro ; / ae ma'o dka' ba nyid ni 'di yin te /
T09D4152:168b-31: de bas na 'dir 'ongs pa kho bo cag la
T09D4152:168b-32: rjes su gzung bar byed par khyed kyi 'os so
T09D4152:168b-33: zhes zer te / bdag cag gi bdag mo gzugs
T09D4152:168b-34: kyi yon tan thos pa skal ba chen po la
T09D4152:168b-35: shin tu phrad par 'dod bzhin pas gnas pa ste
T09D4152:168b-36: zhes zer te / / nges par khyed la de rna ba'i lam du 'ong ba ma yin na /
T09D4152:168b-37: gang gi phyir gzhan du rol pa mdzad ces zer ro //
T09D4152:168b-39: cha rnams ma lus pa la mkhas pa su zhig de mi shes //
T09D4152:168b-40: sems kyi sar 'gro la ni gzugs dang ldan pa 'dra ba'i sngags //
T09D4152:168b-41: ze'u 'bru 'byung ba'i ku mu ta rnams rnam par phye byed cing //
T09D4152:169a-1: gsal bar nye bar 'gro ba mar me rnams kyis min //
T09D4152:169a-2: bdag gis b'a r'a na s'ir 'ongs pa la dgos
T09D4152:169a-3: pa gzhan yod pa ma yin te de bas na
T09D4152:169a-5: de ltar smra zhing pho nya mo des chu bo'i
T09D4152:169a-6: chu'i tshogs kyis rab tu rgyas pa ltar 'gram gyi
T09D4152:169a-7: shing 'gugs bzhin pa rim gyis g-yog mo rnams kyis
T09D4152:169a-8: kun nas brten bzhin pa'i gos dkar po dang ldan
T09D4152:169a-9: pa dang / ri mo bris pas dga' bar gyur pa'i khyim gyi rtsig pa can dang /
T09D4152:169a-10: btags par gyur pa kha dog can gyi dris na dri zhim par byas pa dang /
T09D4152:169a-11: ma lli ka sar pa'i me tog gi phreng bas
T09D4152:169a-12: brgyan pa'i ras la ri mo bris pa'i chu srin
T09D4152:169a-13: gyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa dang /
T09D4152:169a-14: bzhad gad can gyi skye bo du ma dang thun mong ba dang /
T09D4152:169a-15: res ma'i gtso mo'i ma rnams kyis 'dod pa can khro ba bzlog par gyur pa dang /
T09D4152:169a-16: shin tu mang pa'i yul la gnas pa'i skye bo rnams kyis der 'phrog pa la mkhas pa dang /
T09D4152:169a-17: dul ba ma yin pa dang yang ba nyid kyi
T09D4152:169a-18: rgyus bzang mo'i khyim du rjes su zhugs par gyur
T09D4152:169a-19: te / de nas res ma'i gtso mos legs 'gro mthong nas ni //
T09D4152:169a-20: langs te yid 'ong dgong pas 'dar ba'i chu ldan ma //
T09D4152:169a-21: sgeg dang bcas pas rkang bar lag pa bzhag nas ni //
T09D4152:169a-22: gsal bar byas pa'i mig gi mtha' ldan 'dud par gyur //
T09D4152:169a-23: 'dud cing rgyas pa'i mig ldan 'di yang smras pa ste //
T09D4152:169a-24: gos kyi phyogs gcig la ni rnam par sgeg byed cing //
T09D4152:169a-25: sgeg dang bcas par chu skyes ltar ni dkar dmar ba'i //
T09D4152:169a-26: rkang pa cung zad tsam ni sa la mnan byed cing //
T09D4152:169a-27: khyad par du ni bsams pa'i mun pas ba sgribs

T09D4152:169a-30: phrad par 'dod pa'i skye bo 'di ni shi ba'i phyir //
T09D4152:169a-31: zla ba 'di ni gang nas ma dpyad kun nas langs //
T09D4152:169a-32: da ni bdag gi bud med yon tan bdag gis shes //
T09D4152:169a-33: dge ba la brten 'bras bu 'gro la ma nyams pa //

T09D4152:169a-35: mchog gi bud med sems ni 'joms pas brgyan par byas //
T09D4152:169a-36: dri min 'od zer can mdzes khyod kyis ngo tsha byed pa ltar //
T09D4152:169a-37: de ltar mthong ste bdag gi yid la rnam rtog kun nas 'byung //
T09D4152:169a-38: gcig pa nyid kyis 'gro ba mngon par 'du ba mi nus pas //
T09D4152:169b-0: nges par yid skyes @169b mda' rnams kyis ni bdag nyid gnyis su byas //
T09D4152:169b-1: de nas bzhad gad can rnams kyis ded dpon 'di
T09D4152:169b-2: nya dang 'dra bar gyur pa zhes bya ba 'dod
T09D4152:169b-3: bar gyur pa res ma'i gtso mo la 'di skad
T09D4152:169b-5: me tog yid 'ong mngon par 'byung bas ljon shing ltar //
T09D4152:169b-6: rang gi gzi brjid kyis ni nor bu'i thur ma ltar //
T09D4152:169b-7: nye bar gnas par byed pa'i mdzes pa 'di yis ni //
T09D4152:169b-8: mtshan mo zla ba ltar ni khyod ni rnam par mdzes //
T09D4152:169b-9: de nas legs 'gros res ma'i gtso mo de dang
T09D4152:169b-10: lhan cig tu dga' ba nyams su myong ba ste
T09D4152:169b-11: tho rangs kyi dus na stong phrag brgya'i rin thang
T09D4152:169b-12: mu tig gi har byin par gyur ro //
T09D4152:169b-13: gnyis ba'i zhag la gser gyi rgyan chas mngon par brgyan par gyur ro //
T09D4152:169b-14: gsum pa'i zhag la dngul gyi rang bzhin rgyan rnams nyung ba rab tu byin par gyur to //
T09D4152:169b-15: de nas res ma'i gtso mo des kun nas nye
T09D4152:169b-16: bar 'ongs te khro ba dang ldan pa rgyal po
T09D4152:169b-17: tshangs pas byin la gtam de zhus shing gsol bar
T09D4152:169b-18: gyur pa / bdag gis nye bar spyad pa bcos ma yin //
T09D4152:169b-19: nyi ma re rer lhag par byed 'gyur te //
T09D4152:169b-20: de lta na yang des ni mi shes slar //
T09D4152:169b-21: legs 'gro mnyes gshin med yid ci yi phyir //
T09D4152:169b-22: de nas rgyal po des legs 'gro la bos nas //
T09D4152:169b-23: gdan kun nas 'dzin par byas pa'i de la res
T09D4152:169b-24: ma'i gtso mo slad pa de bshad cing zhugs so
T09D4152:169b-25: // res ma'i gtso mos gsol ba /
T09D4152:169b-26: lha lags ma nyes gshin pa med pa'i yid 'di smod par byas pas ci zhig bya ste /
T09D4152:169b-27: ngo tsha bral ba skyon med pa yi skye po la //
T09D4152:169b-28: gang zhig shin tu drang ba'i phyir ni dga' rnams smra //
T09D4152:169b-29: don med kun nas nyon mongs pas ni khyab pa'i yid //
T09D4152:169b-30: des ni chu med pa la zam pa 'dzugs par byed //
T09D4152:169b-32: ded dpon chen po 'o na 'di la lan thob cig zer ro //
T09D4152:169b-34: btsong bya brtag la bdag cag ni //
T09D4152:169b-35: rgyal po chen po mdzes pa'i blo //
T09D4152:169b-36: res ma'i gtso mo'i btsong bya 'di //
T09D4152:169b-37: rang bzhin gzhan gyi skyon dang bcas //
T09D4152:169b-38: ji ltar 'di yi mdzes ldan dang po'i zhag la 'gyur //
T09D4152:169b-39: de ltar gnyis ba la ni lus 'di ma mthong ngo //
T09D4152:169b-40: gzugs ni gzhan pa thob pa 'di la mthong nas ni //
T09D4152:169b-41: rgyan ni ster ba rgyan rnams gzhan ni bdag gis byas //
T09D4152:170a-0: gser gyi sbram bu min pa ji srid me yis @170a * //
T09D4152:170a-2: / rab tu gdung byas de srid shin tu 'od gsal ba //
T09D4152:170a-3: bsreg lugs za ba 'bar ba la ni zhugs byas pa //
T09D4152:170a-4: dri ma can nyid nges par kun nas 'ongs pa yin //
T09D4152:170a-5: skye bos kyang ni de srid yid 'ong nyer 'gro ba //
T09D4152:170a-6: ji srid shin tu spyod yul du ni nyer 'gro ba ;
T09D4152:170a-7: / song ba longs spyod nye bar 'gro ste skye bo yi //
T09D4152:170a-8: skad cig gis ni me tog rnying ltar phyed ltag nyid //
T09D4152:170a-9: me tog rnam par phye ba dri mas nges 'brel la zhugs nas //
T09D4152:170a-10: bung bas snying po de ni ma dpyad par ni dor bar byed //
T09D4152:170a-11: phal cher dngos po sar pa chags pa nyid du byed pa ste //
T09D4152:170a-12: shin tu yid 'ong 'jig rten 'dir ni cung zad yod pa min //
T09D4152:170a-13: rgas pas gzugs ni mig la ngal so byed cing 'phrog pa ste //
T09D4152:170a-14: chags pa stobs ldan rnams kyi stobs kyang sems la gnod par byed //
T09D4152:170a-15: tshe ni zil gyis mnan nas de bzhin ma spyad mthar byad pa //
T09D4152:170a-16: rgyal srid zas dang 'od rnams ltar ni dngos po skad cig ma //
T09D4152:170a-17: de ltar rga dang na dang 'chi dang 'pho ba'i sdug bsngal gyi //
T09D4152:170a-18: mda' rnams phog pas sems kyi brtan pa lhod par byas pa la //
T09D4152:170a-19: bud med ces bya rus pa'i khyim na rang bzhin mig gtsang pa //
T09D4152:170a-20: mthong nas yon tan gang mthong nas ni byis pa chags pa bskyed //
T09D4152:170a-21: ae ma gzugs ldan bud med ces //
T09D4152:170a-22: rmongs pas kun nas rmongs par gyur //
T09D4152:170a-23: rus pa'i phreng ba zhes bya 'di //
T09D4152:170a-24: mkhas pa rnams kyis smad pa ste //
T09D4152:170a-25: bud med dga' bar gyur pa yang //
T09D4152:170a-26: de ltar skyon mar shes byas nas //
T09D4152:170a-27: blo ldan rnams kyis ring du spangs //
T09D4152:170a-28: ma la ti shing khyis mya ngas ltar //
T09D4152:170a-29: de nas rgyal po des legs so legs so zhes
T09D4152:170a-30: bya bas byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par bstod
T09D4152:170a-31: cing bzhugs so // res ma'i gtso mo de yang
