T09D4152:194b-6: gsum bo la gnas pa'i shed bu ni snying stobs 'da' bar byed nas 'jug pa ma yin te /
T09D4152:194b-10: rnam par kun nas mchongs pa dang /
T09D4152:194b-14: mngon par lhung ba rnams te /
T09D4152:194b-15: de la rkyen dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni phyin ci log tu 'jug pa'o //
T09D4152:194b-16: bdag ni mngon par smra ba dang /
T09D4152:194b-17: bdag ni shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nga rgyal lo //
T09D4152:194b-18: gang zhig the tshom med pa'i dngos po rnams kyang
T09D4152:194b-19: 'dag pa'i ri lu ltar gcig po'i dngos pos mthong
T09D4152:194b-20: ba de ni the tshom zhes bya bar shes par
T09D4152:194b-21: bya'o // gang zhig bdag de rnams nyid 'di yid dang blo dang las rnams so //
T09D4152:194b-22: gang zhig tshogs 'di de ni bdag ces bya ba
T09D4152:194b-23: mngon par kun nas mchongs pa smra ba yin no
T09D4152:194b-24: // khyad par med pa ni slar rab tu sad
T09D4152:194b-25: pa dang ma sad pha dag gi rang bzhin med
T09D4152:194b-26: pa rnams kyi khyad par shes pa nyid de de
T09D4152:194b-27: ni khyad par med pa ste zhes bya bar shes
T09D4152:194b-28: // par bya'o // sv'ah'a byed pa dang /
T09D4152:194b-30: bsang gtor mngon par bsang gtor la sogs pa rnams
T09D4152:194b-31: ni thabs ma yin pa zhes bya bar shes par
T09D4152:194b-32: bya'o // dngos po gang la shes rab dang /
T09D4152:194b-34: blo dang las rnams kyis chags pa nye bar 'gro
T09D4152:194b-35: ba de ni chags pa zhes bya bar brjod pa
T09D4152:194b-36: yin no // 'di ni bdag gi yin no //
T09D4152:194b-37: 'di'i bdag ces bya ba gang zhig sdug bsngal rlom sems pa de ni mngon par lhung ba'o //
T09D4152:194b-38: srog chags rnams kyis 'khor ba'i le lo zhes bya ba'o //
T09D4152:194b-39: mun pa dang gti mug dang rga ba dang 'chi ba dang skye ba rnams te /
T09D4152:194b-40: gti mug chen po ni 'dod pa zhes bya bar ming btags pa'o //
T09D4152:194b-41: mun pa ni khro ba zhes bya bar shes par
T09D4152:194b-42: gyis shig slar ni sdug bsngal dmus lod nyid mun
T09D4152:194b-44: ma rig pa 'di tshigs pa lnga dang ldan pas
T09D4152:194b-45: rmongs pa bcings pa yid can skye ba la sogs
T09D4152:194b-46: pa'i sdug bsngal chen po la yang nas yang du
T09D4152:194b-48: der yang bdag ni mthong ba po dang /
T09D4152:194b-51: 'bras bu dang rgyu zhes bya ba 'di ltar ma
T09D4152:194b-52: shes nas 'khor bar yongs su 'khor ba yin te
T09D4152:194b-53: / rgyu 'di rnams kyi ni skye ba'i rgyun gyi
T09D4152:194b-54: 'jug pa mthong ba yin te rgyu med pas skye
T09D4152:194b-55: ba med pa zhes bya ba'o //
T09D4152:194b-56: de la thar pa 'dod pas rab tu sad pa dang rab tu ma sad pa dag dang /
T09D4152:195a-2: bzhi po 'di rtogs nas zhing shes pa sdug bsngal
T09D4152:195a-3: thams cad las rnam par grol te mi zad pa'i
T09D4152:195a-4: go 'phang thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
T09D4152:195a-5: thog mar khyim gyi 'ching ba khong nad sa bon dor nas ni //
T09D4152:195a-6: rtags ni bzung nas thar pa'i bde ba nye bar 'dod pa yi //
T09D4152:195a-7: chog shes dang ni ldan ba bla med go 'phang thob 'dod pa //
T09D4152:195a-8: tshul khrims rnam par dag pa nyer bzung nags nang gnas par dben //
T09D4152:195a-9: phyis ni chags pa chags bral dag las rab tu
T09D4152:195a-10: byung ba'i 'jigs pa dang bde ba dag shes nas
T09D4152:195a-11: dbang po'i tshogs thams cad tshar bcad nas yid kyis
T09D4152:195a-14: sdang ba la sogs pa rnams las rnam par dben
T09D4152:195a-15: pa rnam par dben pa las skyes pa'i bsam gtan
T09D4152:195a-16: dang po rtog pa dang bcas pa thob pa yin
T09D4152:195a-17: no // des kyang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'dod
T09D4152:195a-18: pa la sdong zhing smod pa'i zhi ba dang ldan
T09D4152:195a-19: pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T09D4152:195a-20: rnam par rtog pa de rnams kyang yid kun nas
T09D4152:195a-21: 'khrugs par byed pa shes nas de dang rnam par
T09D4152:195a-22: bral ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba'i bdag nyid can
T09D4152:195a-23: bsam gtan gnyis pa thob pa yin no //
T09D4152:195a-24: dga' ba des kyang yid 'phrog par gyur pa 'od gsal gyi lha rnams su skye ba yin te /
T09D4152:195a-25: gang zhig slar dga' ba'i bde ba de las sems
T09D4152:195a-26: 'don par byed pa de ni gsum pa bde ba
T09D4152:195a-27: dang dga' ba dang rnam par bral ba'i bsam gtan
T09D4152:195a-29: de tsam gyi bde ba la yid nub pa de
T09D4152:195a-30: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams su skye ba so sor
T09D4152:195a-32: bde ba de lta bu thob nas gang zhig btang
T09D4152:195a-33: snyoms byed pa de ni bzhi pa bde ba dang
T09D4152:195a-34: sdug bsngal rnam par bral ba'i bsam gtan nye bar
T09D4152:195a-36: de ni tshe ring ba nyid kyis kha cig ni grol ba nyid nges par byed pa yin no //
T09D4152:195a-38: bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnam par gcad pa'i phyir dang /
T09D4152:195a-39: sems la bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T09D4152:195a-40: bsam gtan 'di'i 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams su
T09D4152:195a-41: thun mong gi 'bras bu mkhas pa rnams smra ba
T09D4152:195a-42: yin te / ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas lus can rnams kyi skyon rnams mthong ste /
T09D4152:195a-43: lus rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T09D4152:195a-44: bsam gtan de yang spangs nas khyad par 'dod pa
T09D4152:195a-45: gzugs la shin tu 'dod chags dang bral ba yin
T09D4152:195a-46: te / lus 'di la sdug bsngal rnams gang zhig
T09D4152:195a-47: yod pa de rnams ni dang por blos kun nas
T09D4152:195a-48: lta bar byed cing sdug cing mthug pa'i yang rdzas
T09D4152:195b-0: rnams la yang @195b nam mkhar lhag pa'i mos pa
T09D4152:195b-2: nam mkha' la song ba'i bdag nyid mngon par bsdus
T09D4152:195b-3: nas nam mkha' mtha' yas pa mthong zhing khyad par
T09D4152:195b-4: rtogs pa'i phyir dang bdag nyid la mkhas pa yin
T09D4152:195b-5: pa'i phyir bdag nyid la bsdus te cung zad med
T09D4152:195b-6: ces bya ba ni ci yang med pa zhes bya
T09D4152:195b-7: ba'i 'du shes su nye bar song ba lus dang
T09D4152:195b-8: bral ba'i grol ba zhes brjod pa yin no //
T09D4152:195b-9: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
T09D4152:195b-10: gal te sems pa po yod na //
T09D4152:195b-12: dge dang mi dge'i bya ba rnams //
T09D4152:195b-13: de yod la ni 'jug pa yin //
T09D4152:195b-14: ji ltar yang chu dang sa rnam par bral bas
T09D4152:195b-15: sa bon ni gang gis kyang rab tu btsugs pa
T09D4152:195b-17: de'i rkyen las rnam par btsugs pa mthong ba yin no //
T09D4152:195b-18: de bzhin du bdag kyang gzung bar bya'o //
T09D4152:195b-19: las dang mi shes pa dang sred pa dor bas
T09D4152:195b-20: thar pa gang zhig nges pa yin pa de ni
T09D4152:195b-21: bdag po yod ba la de yongs su dor ba
T09D4152:195b-22: dmigs par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T09D4152:195b-23: de yongs su mdor ba ni thar pa ga la yod /
T09D4152:195b-24: de ltar nga rgyal yongs su dor ba ni bdag yod pa ga la 'gyur /
T09D4152:195b-25: nga rgyal yod pa la yang skye ba'i rgyun mi
T09D4152:195b-26: gnas pa nyid yin te zhes bya bar gsungs nas
T09D4152:195b-27: / sbyil bo de las aa ra la'i //
T09D4152:195b-28: blo gros chen po de byung nas //
T09D4152:195b-29: dka' thub dka' ba drag rnams kyis //
T09D4152:195b-30: lus ni skam zhing bzhugs par gyur //
T09D4152:195b-31: dka' thub 'dis ni de kho na nyid rtogs par
T09D4152:195b-32: 'gyur ba ma yin snyam du dgongs te langs nas
T09D4152:195b-33: ; kun nas stobs chung ba'i lus can byang chub
T09D4152:195b-34: sems dpas chu bo nee r'anydza na la khrus mdzad
T09D4152:195b-35: ; nas / dga' mdzes kyis phul ba'i bsod snyoms
T09D4152:195b-36: gsol nas dus kyi lto 'phye'i rgyal pos mngon par
T09D4152:195b-37: ; nas / bstod pa / de ni rtsa sha'i phreng bas rgya che sngo pa'i sgros //
T09D4152:195b-38: kun nas dmar ser yan lag can gyis sku khyab pa //
T09D4152:195b-39: mtsho skyes rnams kyi rab tu g-yo ba'i 'dab ma can //
T09D4152:195b-40: autpal sngon po'i 'dab ma bsres pa'i phreng ba ltar //
T09D4152:195b-41: de nas gom pa dal gshegs nas //
T09D4152:195b-42: blo ldan gser gyi ri ltar 'ongs //
T09D4152:195b-43: byang chub shing gi 'og tu ni //
T09D4152:195b-44: byang chub phyir ni de bzhugs gyur //
T09D4152:195b-45: de nas bu mo rnams lhan cig / me tog gi gzhu blangs nas ni //
T09D4152:195b-46: de yi yid ni dkrugs pa'i phyir //
T09D4152:195b-47: yid kyi skye gnas kun nas 'ongs //
T09D4152:195b-48: shirsha'i me tog sar pa ni //
T09D4152:195b-49: de yi mdun du sgom byed cing //
T09D4152:195b-50: 'bras bu kun g-yo lta ba ni //
T09D4152:195b-51: la la zhig gis cung zad bzung //
T09D4152:195b-52: grogs mo'i rna bar gzhan gyis ni //
T09D4152:195b-53: dgod pa sngon 'gro ci yang smras //
T09D4152:195b-54: blo ldan de la lta ba ni //
T09D4152:195b-55: sgeg dang bcas par gtad cing gnas //
T09D4152:196a-2: mig ni ngo tsha bar byed cing //
T09D4152:196a-3: gos ni mtshan ma las lhung ba //
T09D4152:196a-4: ska rags lhod par bkag par gyur //
T09D4152:196a-5: zla ba ltar mdzes lang tsho 'di ni gang du ste //
T09D4152:196a-6: dka' thub 'di ni gang du ae ma 'di ni 'gal //
T09D4152:196a-7: yul rnams nyams su myong nas 'di ltar rigs pa ste //
T09D4152:196a-8: yongs su smin pa khyed kyis 'bras bu thob ba'i phyir//
T09D4152:196a-9: phan par 'dod pa nyid kyis khyed la smra ba ste //
T09D4152:196a-10: dus min yongs su ngal du 'jug pa ci phyir lus //
T09D4152:196a-11: de ltar la la 'dud pa'i yan lag can ni smra ba ste //
T09D4152:196a-12: yan lag med pa'i so sor gnod pa che de la //
T09D4152:196a-13: de ltar la la 'dod pa'i yan lag smras par gyur //
T09D4152:196a-14: khyed la ngan 'gror phrad 'dod bud med rnams la ni //
T09D4152:196a-15: blo ldan khyed kyi rjes su mthun min ci phyir 'di //
T09D4152:196a-16: 'di ltar de la mngon par smras gyur la la
T09D4152:196a-17: zhig / padma'i 'dab ma rnams ni sen mos gtubs
T09D4152:196a-18: byed cing // gang gi tshe de rnams la byang
T09D4152:196a-19: chub sems dpas brnyas pa dang bcas pa'i lta ba
T09D4152:196a-20: sbyin par ma byas pa de'i tshe bdud kyi bka'
T09D4152:196a-21: byed rnam pa du mar 'gyur ba'i gdod can de
T09D4152:196a-23: 'jigs su bcug nas 'di bslang bar gyur cig ces bya ba'o //
T09D4152:196a-24: de nas seng ge'i gdong la ni //
T09D4152:196a-25: h'um byas pas ni yang yang du //
T09D4152:196a-27: 'bar ba'i gdong las grol bar gyur //
T09D4152:196a-28: de rnams de yi bka' byed gdong las byung //
T09D4152:196a-29: lhung zhing skad cig gis gsungs te //
T09D4152:196a-30: rab rgyas mya ngan me tog nyid ;
T09D4152:196a-31: / byang chub sems dpa'i steng du 'phangs //
T09D4152:196a-32: me ldan 'khor lo su zhig gis //
T09D4152:196a-33: rnam rgyas ze'u 'bru'i tshogs ldan pa //
T09D4152:196a-35: so bsdams gzhan dag nyid kyis ni //
T09D4152:196a-36: glog bzhin kham pa'i smin ma can //
T09D4152:196a-37: kha ba'i rtse mo steng du 'bebs //
T09D4152:196a-38: kun da'i phung po nyid du 'gyur //
T09D4152:196a-39: gzhan dag ser skya'i mig can ni //
T09D4152:196a-40: ral gri dang bcas dpung ba bteg / lcags kyi ka ba'i grib ma 'dra //
T09D4152:196a-41: skad cig mi g-yo nyid du gyur //
T09D4152:196a-42: de nas bcom ldan 'das ni byang chub shing gi 'og tu bzhugs byas nas //
T09D4152:196a-43: 'phro ba'i mig gi me can dka' bzhin du ni byed rnams kyi ni tshogs //
T09D4152:196a-44: dkar ba min par 'gro ba'i grogs kyis kun nas rab tu bskul bzhin pa //
T09D4152:196a-45: nags kyi me ni kun du chu dang nye las bzhin du zhig par gyur //
T09D4152:196a-46: me tog rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas pa song ba na /
T09D4152:196a-47: bcom ldan 'das de bsam gtan bzhi pa las bzhengs te 'di bsams par gyur te /
T09D4152:196a-48: gal te skye ba sngon yod na //
T09D4152:196a-49: las rnams kyis ni 'jug pa min//
T09D4152:196b-0: @196b las las byung ba'i skye ba med //
T09D4152:196b-1: las med na yang lus can gyi //
T09D4152:196b-2: gzugs dang skal bzang skal ba sogs //
T09D4152:196b-4: 'on te sngon du las yod na //
T09D4152:196b-5: ma skyes pa las ga las te //
T09D4152:196b-7: 'khor ba'i thog ma rtog mi byed //
T09D4152:196b-8: gal te rgyu med 'gro yin na //
T09D4152:196b-9: su zhig las dang nyid smra 'gyur //
T09D4152:196b-10: rgyu med par ni thar pa yang //
T09D4152:196b-11: rtag tu grub pa nyid du 'gyur //
T09D4152:196b-12: rgyu med par ni lus kyang 'di //
T09D4152:196b-13: bskyed pa nyid du 'gyur ba min //
T09D4152:196b-14: la la dbang phyug rgyu yin pa //
T09D4152:196b-15: mi mkhas pa rnams smra bar byed //
T09D4152:196b-16: gal te dbang phyug gzhan gyis byas //
T09D4152:196b-17: 'dir ni dbang phyug nyid ga las //
T09D4152:196b-18: 'on te ma sprul nyid skyes pa //
T09D4152:196b-19: de las gzhan ni cis mi skye //
T09D4152:196b-20: de phyir dbang phyug smra ba 'di //
T09D4152:196b-21: bdag gi slad du don med nyid //
T09D4152:196b-23: yang dang yang du 'khor bzhin pa'i //
T09D4152:196b-24: nam yang mkhas pa rnams kyis ni //
T09D4152:196b-25: thog ma dmigs par 'gyur ba min //
T09D4152:196b-26: nam mkha'i khams 'di ni rlung dang me dang chu
T09D4152:196b-27: dang sa rnams kyis kun nas 'brel pa ni lus
T09D4152:196b-29: de yang rnam par shes pa'i khams la brten nas
T09D4152:196b-30: 'gro ba dang 'ong pa la sogs pa'i bya ba
T09D4152:196b-31: rnams byed do zhes bya ba ste //
T09D4152:196b-32: de ltar gnas pa la skyes pa nye bar btags par bya zhes zer ro //
T09D4152:196b-33: de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang
T09D4152:196b-34: chub thob nas du ma rnams kyis mi shes pa'i
T09D4152:196b-35: rab rib sel bar mdzad de //
T09D4152:196b-36: grong khyer ser skyar byon nas zas gcang ma la legs pa'i lam gsal bar mdzad de /
T09D4152:196b-37: de ltar bcom ldan 'das de 'gro ba ma lus
T09D4152:196b-38: pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar bya
T09D4152:196b-39: ba'i don du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
T09D4152:196b-40: nus kyang shin tu ring por 'khor ba na kun
T09D4152:196b-41: nas 'khor bar gyur to zhes bya ba ste /
T09D4152:196b-42: blo chen de ni byang chub phyir //
T09D4152:196b-43: lag tu gtad ltar sbyin byas te //
T09D4152:196b-44: yun ring shes rab pha rol phyin //
T09D4152:196b-45: dam pa bde bar gnas pa yin //
T09D4152:196b-46: ae ma gal te chos ni mun pa 'joms //
T09D4152:196b-47: bde gshegs kyis gsungs 'di ni rnam dpyod nas //
T09D4152:196b-48: dri mas khyab pa'i lta bas mthong ba'i phyir //
T09D4152:196b-49: skye bo 'di ni gzhan 'dod rten mi 'gyur //
T09D4152:196b-50: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri med gsung yang yod pa zhes bya la //
T09D4152:196b-51: rmongs pa lam ngan song ba'i skye bo 'di ni kun nas 'khor //
T09D4152:196b-52: ri bong mtshan pa mngon gsher la ni gang zhig mi zum pa //
T09D4152:196b-53: dman pa'i blo de song zhing ji ltar lhung bar 'gyur ba min //
T09D4152:197a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni //
T09D4152:197a-4: chos 'dod rnams kyi phreng ba byas pa 'di //
T09D4152:197a-5: skyes pa'i rabs kyi phreng ba byas pa yi //
T09D4152:197a-6: dge ba cung zad gang zhig bdag gis bsags //
T09D4152:197a-7: de yis 'gro ba 'di ni bde gshegs kyi //
T09D4152:197a-8: 'dod pa la dmigs thar pa'i phyir gyur cig / rab 'gro gnya' ral can brgya byin //
T09D4152:197a-9: khra can don kun grub ldan pa //
T09D4152:197a-10: lnga yis lhag pa'i sum cu 'dir //
T09D4152:197a-11: thub pa chen po'i byes rabs rnams //
T09D4152:197a-12: rigs pa sgra yi bstan bcos cha ni rnam pa mang po shes nas sangs rgyas kyis kyang gsungs //
T09D4152:197a-13: phyi ma'i snyan dang ga sa mkhan gyi zla bas
T09D4152:197a-14: sa ni snyan dngags 'od rnams kyis ni rab gsal
T09D4152:197a-15: byas // kha cher nye bar 'tshe ba'i skyon gyis
T09D4152:197a-16: rnam par gdungs pa shes nas phyi rol 'gro 'dod
T09D4152:197a-17: byas // pas // ri dbang kha ba can la
T09D4152:197a-18: seng ge zhabs 'bring las ni srog rnams dor nas
T09D4152:197a-19: byas // pas // mtho ris song // rgyal po'i
T09D4152:197a-20: sras slob dpon seng ge zhabs 'bring pas mdzad pa'i
T09D4152:197a-21: skyes pa'i rabs kyi phreng ba rdzogs so /
T09D4152:197a-24: // / dge slong dpal ldan blo gros 'byung gnas zhes bya mkhas pa ni //
T09D4152:197a-25: sems can rnams la chos dang zang zing kun nas 'god mdzad cing //
T09D4152:197a-26: tshad ma dang ni lung dang rgyud rnams du ma la 'dris pas //
T09D4152:197a-27: 'gro ba'i mnga' bdag gi ni spyod pa 'di la
T09D4152:197a-28: gnyis po dag / gzhal du med cing dri ma
T09D4152:197a-29: med pa kun nas bsags te de las 'di //
T09D4152:197a-30: nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa'i dri ma chog bzhin du myur spangs sngon du 'gro ba ni //
T09D4152:197a-31: de dang de yi skyes rabs yongs bzung 'gro ba sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni gdon byas te //
T09D4152:197a-32: mthar yang thub dbang rnams bzhin mtha' dag bya byas
T09D4152:197a-33: sangs rgyas khams gsum du ni khyed 'byung shog /
T09D4152:197a-34: lcang lo can gyi bum pa zhes bya mkhas dang
T09D4152:197a-36: gang zhig tshul khrims 'byung gnas skad gnyis pas ni 'di ltar cho ga bzhin //
T09D4152:197a-37: bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i spyod pa shin tu rnam dag yangs pa ni //
T09D4152:197a-38: skye bo ma lus pa la phan pa'i don du de yis yang dag bsgyur /
T09D4152:197a-40: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta aa lam ka de ba'i zhabs dang /
T09D4152:197a-41: bod kyi lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong tshul khrims
T09D4152:197a-42: 'byung gnas sbas pas dpal gyi sgye'u ri'i rtsa chos
